original: Is NOT currently showing interest in a society
Is currently showing interest in a society
Merchants from this county are upset after having lost privileges due to conducting dishonest business.
translation: 这个领地的商人因为做生意不诚信而失去特权，所以感到沮丧。

original: This character is busy seeking out and exhorting traders to conform to a stricter protocol of action.
translation: 这个角色正忙于寻找和劝告商人遵守更严格的行为守则。

original: This character is known for speaking up when their vassals are directly being influenced by other people.
translation: 这个角色因为保护封臣不受其他人的干涉而出名。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nIt has come to the attention of the heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] that merchants from your lands have been acting with deceit and dishonesty while conducting trade with our merchants. We are certain that you will make sure that this behavior will cease immediately.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]近日听闻，来自你领土上的商人与天朝商人交易时有欺诈与不守信用的行为。我们相信你会立即制止这一行为。

original: We need to restrict the privileges of the major trade guilds.
translation: 我们需要限制主要贸易行会的特权。

original: I'll have [target_marshal.GetFirstName] seek out and deal with the worst troublemakers.
translation: 我会派[target_marshal.GetFirstName]查办那些惹麻烦的家伙。

original: How our merchants conduct their trade is no business for the crown.
translation: 无论我们的商人如何进行贸易都与王权无关。

original: I should make sure that I'm in good standing with [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我需要确保自己在[From.GetFirstName]风评良好。

original: Your vassal, [From.GetTitledFirstName], was less than impressed by your intrusion on merchant rights in the cities of [From.GetHerHis] lands. [From.GetSheHeCap] has now made a public statement on how this action was an unjustified use of power in an area of [From.GetHerHis] responsibility.
translation: 你的封臣，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，对你在[From.GetHerHis]城市里侵犯商人权利的行为感到不满。[From.GetSheHeCap]现在已公开宣称此举是在[From.GetHerHis]辖区内滥用权力。

original: [From.GetHerHisCap] merchants had to be kept in line!

Last night, [chinese_courtier.GetBestName] and I ended up having discussions until dawn, about [chinese_courtier.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]. I must have made a good impression, as [chinese_courtier.GetSheHe] told me that [chinese_courtier.GetSheHe] will be sending a letter, praising the hospitality [chinese_courtier.GetSheHe] has received.
translation: 昨晚我和[chinese_courtier.GetBestName]讨论到天亮，主要关于[chinese_courtier.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]。我一定给他留下了不错的印象，[chinese_courtier.GetSheHe]说[chinese_courtier.GetSheHe]会寄一封信，感谢[chinese_courtier.GetSheHe]受到的热情招待。

original: I need to make sure that everyone knows about this.
translation: 我要让每个人都知道这件事。

original: I have noticed that [chinese_courtier.GetBestName] has grown increasingly aggravated during the last couple of weeks, and today something extra unthoughtful slipped my tongue which caused [chinese_courtier.GetHerHim] to storm off exclaiming that the Emperor would hear about this.
translation: 我注意到[chinese_courtier.GetBestName]过去几周对我的态度越发恶化，今天我不小心脱口而出的考虑不周的话让[chinese_courtier.GetHerHim]大发雷霆，声称天子会知晓这些言语。

original: This might upset our relations with [offmap_china.Governor.Offmap.GetShortName].
translation: 此举或会恶化我们与[offmap_china.Governor.Offmap.GetShortName]的关系。

original: All trade post provinces in the realm of §Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§! gains §G100%§! increased trade income for 25 years.
translation: 在 25 年内，§Y[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]§!领地内的所有贸易站省份得到 §G100%§! 的贸易收入加成。

original: What does it take to bring down this beast?!
translation: 到底怎么做才能打倒这头野兽？！

original: A $SETTLEMENTTYPE|Y$ holding has finished construction in $PROVINCE|Y$
Did NOT have $STATUS|Y$ as its previous status
Did NOT have $POLICY|Y$ as its previous policy
Current status does NOT have the $FLAG|Y$ flag
Previous status does NOT have the $FLAG|Y$ flag
Current policy does NOT have the $FLAG|Y$ flag
Previous policy does NOT have the $FLAG|Y$ flag

translation: 不是一名地图外的统治者
是一名地图外的统治者

original: Is NOT governor for an offmap title
translation: 不是一个地图外头衔的都护

original: Is governor for an offmap title
translation: 不是一个地图外头衔的统治者

original: Shows the realm of the governor, the tributaries, and the diplomatic range of [Root.GetShortGenericName]
translation: 显示[Root.GetShortGenericName]的都护府领地，朝贡国与外交范围。

original: §RYou need to select a third party§!
Warscore from occupation is limited to $VALUE$ for attackers with this casus belli
translation: 在这个宣战理由下，进攻方通过占领土地获得的战争分数最多为 $VALUE$

original: Warscore from occupation is limited to $VALUE$ for defenders with this casus belli
translation: 在这个宣战理由下，防御方通过占领土地获得的战争分数最多为 $VALUE$

original: Sieges and occupation has reduced the effect of the trade route by $VALUE|Y$% in this province
translation: 围攻和占领贸易线路将会降低整个省份 $VALUE|Y$% 的贸易利润

original: The hostilities in this province reduces the effects of the trade route by $VALUE|Y$% downstream
translation: 这个省份的战乱减少了这条贸易路线下游 $VALUE|Y$%的贸易利润

original: If enabled, you will receive occasional updates about what happens in [Root.GetShortGenericName]
translation: 启用后，你将偶尔地接收到在[Root.GetShortGenericName]发生的事件

original: Rulers may sign Peace Deals with the [Root.GetName], to ensure that they will not be the target of an invasion.
translation: 统治者可能会与[Root.GetName]签订和平协议以确保不会成为入侵目标。

original: This is your current §Y[Root.GetCurrency]§! with the §Y[Root.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty§!!
[Root.GetCurrency] can be gained by giving tribute to [Root.GetFullName], and can be used to gain a variety of boons.
translation: 向[Root.GetFullName]朝贡能够获得[Root.GetCurrency]，可以用来请求丰厚的赏赐。

original: The value of the $ROUTE|Y$ will be set to $VALUE|Y$% of its normal value
The base value of the $ROUTE|Y$ will be set to $VALUE|Y$

$ROUTE|Y$
§RA situation near the source of the §!$ROUTE|Y$§R is causing it to be inactive. Given time, this is likely to change.§!
translation:
$ROUTE|Y$
§R来自§!$ROUTE|Y$§R源头的的变动使得商路日益萧条，假以时日，可能会有所改观。§!

original: Some counties have great potential for trade due to their strategic position on a trade route.\nThe owner of the province may build a trade post to reap great economic benefits.
translation: 由于其在贸易线路上的战略位置，有些省份具有巨大的贸易潜力。\n省份的拥有者可以建立贸易站以获得巨大的经济效益。

original: \nGrace is gained by §YPaying Tribute§! to the current Emperor, you can use accumulated Grace to §GAsk for Boons§!. Any Grace you have accumulated will be passed on to your heir during succession.\n§RAll Grace is lost should the Dynasty change in China!§!
translation: \n皇恩可以通过向天子§Y进贡§!获取，你可以用积累的皇恩来§G请求恩赐§!。你积累的皇恩可以继承。\n§R但是如果中国改朝换代，你所有的皇恩都会清零！§!

original: Does not show interest in joining the $SOCIETY$
Does not care if others do not follow their religion
translation: 不在乎别人是否信仰他们的宗教

original: Does not get opinion penalties with people of other religions
Does not get opinion penalties with vassals of other government types
translation: 不会因政体不同而受到封臣好感惩罚

original: §Y[Actor.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not in a defensive pact against §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§!

translation: 任何相邻的独立统治者

original: Has demesne size §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of demesne limit
translation: 已有直辖领规模占直辖领上限的§Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§!

original: Realm size is §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of $WHO|Y$'s realm size
translation: 领地大小是$WHO|Y$领地大小的§Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§!
针对其他朝贡国的战争

original:
To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], you are a [Root.GetManWoman] blessed with prosperous lands and a beautiful family! It would honor me greatly to take care of either the county of [selling_province.GetName] or your [marriage_child.GetDaughterSon], [marriage_child.GetTitledFirstName]. This would ensure a lasting peace between us.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致尊敬的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
我的[Root.GetLordLady]，您真是一位有福的[Root.GetManWoman]，土地富饶、家庭圆满！如果能让我管理[selling_province.GetName]，或照顾您的[marriage_child.GetDaughterSon][marriage_child.GetTitledFirstName]，将会是我莫大的荣幸。这会确保我们之间的长久和平。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], your prosperous lands mark you as a [Root.GetTitle] of impressive abilities. I have an offer for you which would ensure a lasting peace between us. Let me rule the county of [selling_province.GetName] in your name, and no one shall dare to touch it again.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致尊贵的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
[Root.GetLordLady]，您繁荣兴旺的领地彰显了您作为[Root.GetTitle]的出众能力。我向您提出一项将臻至你我之间长久和平的请求：让我以您的名义管理[selling_province.GetName]省份，从此再也不会有人敢于染指这片土地了。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: [selling_province.GetName] is a fine county, indeed. It can be yours for the right price.
translation: [selling_province.GetName]确实是一块不错的领地。付出合适的价钱，你就可以拥有它。

original: Offer your county §Y[selling_province.GetName]§! to the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the price of §G[selling_province.price.GetValue]§!¤. If [From.GetSheHe] accepts, [From.GetSheHe] will become your vassal and you will be protected from raiding adventurers for 10 years.\n
translation: 以 §G[selling_province.price.GetValue]§!¤ 的价格将你的领地提供给§Y[selling_province.GetName]§!的冒险家§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。如果[From.GetSheHe]接受，[From.GetSheHe]将成为你的附属，你将在 10 年内免受劫掠。\n

original:
Offer the county §Y[selling_province.GetName]§!, which is ruled by your vassal §Y[selling_province.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§!, to the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! for the price of §G[selling_province.price.GetValue]§!¤. If [From.GetSheHe] accepts, [From.GetSheHe] will become your vassal and you will be protected from raiding adventurers for 10 years.

However, your remaining vassals will be displeased, resulting in the following effect:
translation:
将你的封臣§Y[selling_province.Holder.GetTitledFirstName]§!统治的省份§Y[selling_province.GetName]§!以 §G[selling_province.price.GetValue]§!¤ 的价格卖给冒险家§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!。如果[From.GetSheHe]接受了这一请求，[From.GetSheHe]将成为你的封臣而你将在十年内免于冒险活动的威胁。

然而，你的其他封臣对此将感到不快，造成以下效果：
[marriage_child.GetFirstName]会教你如何成为一个出色的[marriage_child.GetHusbandWife]。

original: Through the marriage, you form a non-aggression pact with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
translation: 通过联姻，你与§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!签订了互不侵犯条约。

original: A threat dressed up in compliments is still a threat, [GetRootFromInsult]!
translation: [GetRootFromInsult]！话说得再好听，也还不是在威胁我！

original: Refuse to make a deal with the adventurer §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

To the wise and noble [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I would be a fool not to accept such a generous offer. I will proudly serve as your vassal, and [selling_province.GetName] shall prosper in my care. This I swear!

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致聪慧而高贵的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
不接受如此慷慨的提议就太蠢了。很荣幸成为您的封臣，我发誓[selling_province.GetName]将在我的治理下繁荣兴旺。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I am glad we managed to solve this peacefully.
translation: 我很高兴我们顺利和平解决了这个问题。

original: If it will ensure peace, I must agree.
translation: 如果这能确保和平，我会同意的。

original: Outrageous! We will meet again on the battlefield!
translation: 可恶！你给我等着，我们战场上见！

original: All other vassals opinion of §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-15§! for §Y5§! years. §Y(Sold Vassal County)§!\n
translation: 所有其他封臣对待§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的看法改变了 §R-15§!，持续 §Y5§! 年。§Y（出售封臣省份）§!\n

original: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! declares [From.GetHerHis] intentions of trying to seize land from your realm by force with [From.GetHerHis] band of thieves and robbers.
translation: §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!宣布了[From.GetHerHis]企图：用[From.GetHerHis]强盗团伙的武力攫取你的土地。

original: The liege of these lands has settled an adventurer who protects the realm from raiders.
translation: 这片土地的领主招安了一位冒险家以保护他的国家免受劫掠者的侵害。

original: The [From.GetJobTitle] of the [From.Liege.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Liege.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the [Root.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]
The [From.GetTitle] of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] sends [From.GetHerHis] greetings to the [Root.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
May peace and unity always bless your realm
translation: 愿你长治久安，邦泰民安

original: May strength and vigor bless your rule
translation: 愿你身康体健，享国千秋
愿你民康物阜，繁荣昌盛

original: May the Divine guide your path
translation: 愿你聪明睿智，神灵庇佑
愿你福祚绵长，得天眷命

original: May good health be with you
translation: 祝你长命百岁，仙福永享

original: [Root.GetCouncillorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nTo strengthen the relationship between our nations, my [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress] has sent me on a mission to your demesne. It would honor me to visit your court and [From.GetCGMission].
translation: [Root.GetCouncillorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n为了加强两国之间的友善关系，我的[From.Liege.GetMasterMistress]派遣我出使您的领地。如能拜访您的宫廷并且[From.GetCGMission]将令我万分荣幸。

original: [Root.GetCouncillorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nTo further solidify the bonds between our nations and ensure peaceful cooperation, my [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress] has sent me on a mission to your demesne. I shall visit your court and [From.GetCGMission].
translation: [Root.GetCouncillorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n为进一步增进我们两国之间的联系并确保长久安宁的合作关系，我的[From.Liege.GetMasterMistress]派遣我出使您的领地，我将拜访您的宫廷并且[From.GetCGMission]。
与你的外交官讨论政治

original: oversee the training of new troops

translation: 学习你军队的军事理论

original: set up trade agreements with your local merchants
translation: 和你所在的当地商人签订贸易协定

original: teach your subjects about the Heavenly Order
The servants of the [From.Liege.GetTitle] are always welcome in my realm.
translation: 我的领地一直都欢迎来自[From.Liege.GetTitle]的人。

original: I have no time to entertain guests at present.
translation: 我现在没有时间招待客人。

original: The [From.GetJobTitle] of §Y[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§!, §Y[From.GetTitle]§!, will pay a visit to your demesne.\n
Your refusal is a great insult to §Y[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]§! and [From.Liege.GetHerHis] [From.GetJobTitle] §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n

After a tour of [Root.Capital.GetName] and a fortnight at my court, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s visit has reached its end. Thanks to the meticulous preparations made by my [corresponding_councilor.GetJobTitle], [corresponding_councilor.GetTitledFirstName], everything went smoothly. The [From.GetJobTitle] has returned home with [From.GetCGMissionOutcome] for [From.GetHerHis] [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress].
translation: 参观完[Root.Capital.GetName]，在我的宫廷里呆了两个星期后，[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetDynName]的访问结束了。由于我的[corresponding_councilor.GetJobTitle]，[corresponding_councilor.GetTitledFirstName]的精心准备，一切都进行得很顺利。[From.GetJobTitle]已经回国并为[From.GetHerHis][From.Liege.GetMasterMistress]带去了[From.GetCGMissionOutcome]。

original: As the welcoming feast ends, [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] and I retreat to finish our conversation in private, observing the moon from the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] walls. Suddenly, bright lights streak across the sky, and the [From.GetJobTitle]'s visage turns ashen. 'Bad omen,' mutters the translator and the two [From.GetMenWomen] make a hasty departure.
translation: 欢迎宴会结束后，[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetDynName]与我退出餐厅，在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding]城墙上赏月、谈天。突然，天空中划过一道明亮的闪电，[From.GetJobTitle]脸色一沉。「这是凶兆。」翻译官嘀咕道，两位[From.GetMenWomen]匆匆离开。

original: Wait, come back! We were getting on so well!
translation: 等等，别急着走！咱们处的还不错！

original: §Y[From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]§! departs immediately as [From.GetSheHe] believes [From.GetHerHis] visit has been cursed by Heaven.
translation: 由于§Y[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetDynName]§!相信与[From.GetHerHis]会面被上天所诅咒，因此[From.GetSheHe]立即离开了。

original: The preparations for [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s arrival tomorrow are well under way, but I find myself pondering what more I could do to make [From.GetHerHim] feel welcome. Even though a proficient translator has been summoned, would it not be a nice gesture for me to greet [From.GetHerHim] in [From.GetHerHis] native tongue?
translation: 对明天[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetDynName]到来的筹备正顺利进行，但我在思考如何能让[From.GetHerHim]感到宾至如归。虽然我已经传唤了一位老练的翻译官，但如果我能用[From.GetHerHis]当地语言来招呼[From.GetHerHim]是否更好呢？

original: How fortunate that I already know the basics of the language!
translation: 我已经基本掌握了这门语言，真是太幸运了！

original: It would be unwise. I cannot hope to rival the translator's skill.
translation: 这是不明智的。我不能指望我的翻译能力比得上翻译官。

original: a successful night of study. Your greeting tomorrow will be impeccable.
translation: 今晚的学习大获成功，我敢保证您明天的觐见不会被挑出任何失礼的地方。
§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!获得了「§Y外语掌握者§!」，并取得了 §G+1§! 点学识能力以及 §G+1§! 点外交能力。

original: you falling asleep while studying, causing you to be late to the audience tomorrow.
translation: 你学着学着居然睡着了，结果第二天觐见时迟到了。

original: you making a good attempt at the greeting.
you making a flawed attempt at the greeting.
translation: 你在觐见时有不当之举。

original: As you are multilingual, you greet the visitor flawlessly.\n
translation: 你用多种语言完美地接待了客人。\n

original: I asked the translator to not only instruct me in the proper pronunciation, but also teach me the grammar and meaning behind the words. It took many hours, but the pleased look on [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName]'s [FromFrom.GetFaceDescription] face as I greet [FromFrom.GetHerHim] in flawless Chinese proves that it was worth the effort.
translation: 我要求翻译官不仅要教我正确的发音，还得教我一些语法和成语的意思。这花费了几个小时，但是在我用完美的汉语向[FromFrom.GetHerHim]问好时，[FromFrom.GetJobTitle][FromFrom.GetDynName]那张[FromFrom.GetFaceDescription]脸上露出的欣慰的笑容，这证明我之前的努力都是值得的。

original: Language holds more power than most [Root.GetMenWomen] understand.
translation: 语言的力量比大多数[Root.GetMenWomen]认为的要大。

original: 'My [Root.GetLordLady], please wake up!' I sit up with a start. Where am I? My eyes dart around the room. The library! 'The guests are waiting! Forgive me, my [Root.GetLordLady], we didn't know where you were. We've been searching the [Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding] for hours!' I bury my face in my hands. I have not yet received my guests, and the visit is already a disaster...
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，请您醒一醒！」我猛地坐起。我在哪里？我的双眼在房间中急促地扫来扫去。我竟然在图书馆睡着了！「客人正在等待着您！请您原谅我，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我们不知道您到底在哪里。我们已经在整个[Root.Capital.Capital.GetHolding]上下搜索了好几个小时了！」我将我的脸埋在双手之中。我到现在还没有接待我的客人，这次访问早已经成了一场灾难……

original: Curse those early risers, the sun is barely up!
translation: 诅咒那些早起的人，天明明才亮！

original: I spent an hour reading the greeting which the translator had prepared for me before going to bed, and as I dressed this morning, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] was there to help me with the pronunciation. I have no idea what the elaborate phrases mean, but at least they come out somewhat smoothly as I greet [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName].
translation: 在睡觉之前，我花费了一个小时读了翻译官给我准备的问候词。在今天早上换装的时候，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]早已站在那里准备帮助我纠正发音。我并不知道那些复杂的成语都是什么意思，但是至少我在问候[FromFrom.GetJobTitle][FromFrom.GetDynName]的时候比较流畅地将它们说了出来。

original: I spent an hour reading the greeting which the translator had prepared for me before going to bed. However, as I stood before [FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName] this morning, it was as if someone had wiped the words from my mind! I forgot every other word and stuttered something awful...
translation: 在睡觉之前，我花费了一个小时读了翻译官给我准备的问候词。然而，今天早上我站在[FromFrom.GetJobTitle][FromFrom.GetDynName]面前时，我感觉如同有谁在我的脑海中擦除了所有词汇！我忘记了所有的准备好的东西，只结结巴巴地说出了一些糟糕的词语。

original: I have never been so mortified!
This option is available to you because you have the modifier §YMultilingual§!.\n\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你有§Y外语掌握者§!修正。\n\n

original: I had my servant buy an exquisite garb of Chinese silk with the proper accessories in preparation for [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]'s arrival. However, as I welcomed [From.GetHerHim] and [From.GetHerHis] entourage, the sight of my new robe seemed to displease [From.GetHerHim]! Later, the translator told me I wore several attributes exclusive to the [From.Liege.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]'s family.
translation: 我差遣仆人买了一套带着华丽饰品的丝绸衣服来迎接[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetDynName]的到来。然而，在我欢迎[From.GetHerHim]与[From.GetHerHis]随行人员时，我的新长袍使[From.GetHerHim]面露不悦！随后，翻译官告诉我，我穿了[From.Liege.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]家族的御用品。

original: Guards! Find me the merchant responsible!
translation: 卫兵！把那个商人给我找来！

original: As I am walking in the gardens with my guest [From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName] I comment on the sunny skies. The translator repeats my words and after a moment of thought, [From.GetDynName] replies with ardent enthusiasm. Apparently [From.GetSheHe] thinks my pleasantries are a metaphor for the enlightened nature of the heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]!
translation: 在我和我的客人，[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetDynName]，在我的花园中散步的时候，我评论了一下阳光明媚的天空。翻译官重复了我的话语，经过了短暂的思考之后，[From.GetDynName]怀着激动的热情回答了我。显然，[From.GetDynName]以为我的客套话是一种对天朝[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]的开明天性的一种隐喻。

original: I never knew talking about the weather could be so fruitful!
translation: 我从来都不知道谈论天气会有这么好的效果！

original: The [From.GetTitle] of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the [Root.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has generously decided to send you a skilled physician from [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] court. [chinese_doctor.GetDynName] will serve you well.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n至高无上的[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]皇帝陛下仁慈而慷慨地决定，将来自[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis]宫廷，以其精湛医术而享有盛名的医生[chinese_doctor.GetDynName]赐予你，他定能给予你莫大的帮助。

original: Send my most sincere gratitude to the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].
Does NOT have a Court Physician
Send a gift of coin to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously accepted your gift. The generosity of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will not be forgotten.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]仁慈地接受了你的礼物。[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族的慷慨将被铭记。

original: Has NOT gifted money to the §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]§! within the last 15 years
translation: 在过去的15年内没有赠送金钱给§Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]§!

original: May there forever be harmony between the houses of [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] and [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName].

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has decided that there shall be no war and strife between our two nations. [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] infinite mercy and wisdom is an inspiration to us all.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，已经决定停止两国间的一切战争与冲突行为。[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]无上仁慈与智慧鼓舞着我们所有人。

original: Does NOT have a non-aggression pact or peace deal with the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! and its §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!\n
translation: 和§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!与§Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!没有互不侵犯条约或和平协定\n

original: \nDuring the peace deal, the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! and its §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§! will not declare war on you. It will last for §Y50§! years or until the dynasty of the [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle], [Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName], ends.
translation: \n在和平协议期限内，§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!以及它的§Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!将不会对你宣战。这将持续§Y50§!年或者直到[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]的[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName]朝统治终结。

original: Has a realm county bordering the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]\n
Has a realm county bordering a nation which is a tributary of the [Root.Offmap.GetFullName]\n
translation: 领地有省份与[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]的朝贡国接壤\n

original: Has a realm county bordering the Eastern edge of the map\n
translation: 在地图东部边界拥有领地省份\n

original: Has a coastal realm county in India\n
translation: 在印度有一个沿海领地省份\n

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], sends [From.GetHerHisCap] sincerest regards and accepts your pledge of allegiance. May the bond between our two nations last for all time.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，致以[From.GetHerHisCap]诚挚问候并接受贵国的效忠。希望两国能邦交永睦，世代通好。

original: I am but a humble servant of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].
translation: 我不过是[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]的卑微的仆人。

original: Does NOT already have a suzerain\n
This character is a well of theoretical knowledge used to invent and design all sorts of structures and machines, as well as the practical know-how required to construct them.
translation: 这名角色既拥有发明和设计建筑及机器的理论知识，也拥有创造它们的实践经验。

original: This character is excellent at making sure resources are distributed, transported and used in the most efficient of ways.
translation: 这个角色非常擅长确保资源以最有效的方式被分配、运输和使用。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has generously granted your request. The sage scholar-bureaucrat [chinese_administrator.GetDynName] will join your court. [chinese_administrator.GetHerHisCap] administrative skills will serve you well.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，慷慨地准许了你的请求。贤明的士大夫[chinese_administrator.GetDynName]将会来到你的宫廷。[chinese_administrator.GetHerHisCap]管理技巧将会很好地为你服务。

original: Has earned an academic degree by passing the imperial examinations in China
translation: 已在中国通过科举考试获得功名

original: This character has employed a Chinese scholar-bureaucrat who assists with the administration of building projects.
translation: 这个角色雇佣了一名帮助其管理建筑工程的中国士大夫

original: A scholar-bureaucrat will arrive at your court.\n
translation: 一个士大夫将到达你的宫廷。\n

original: Has NOT requested a boon from §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]§! within the last year\n
translation: 在过去的一年里还没有请求§Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]§!赐予赏赐\n

original: Has NOT sent tribute to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]§! within the last year\n
§Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§! has NOT granted you a boon within the last year
translation: §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!在过去的一年里还没有赐予你赏赐

original: Paying tribute to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§! is currently available.
The Chinese Empire will not attack this ruler while the peace deal is active.
translation: 中国不会在和平协议有效期内进攻这个统治者。

original: Does NOT have a Master Engineer
A master engineer will join your court. While employed, they will build constructions and machines throughout your demesne, adding various bonuses to your economy, military, and technology.
translation: 一个将作大匠会加入您的宫廷。在雇佣期内，他将会在您的各个直辖领内建造建筑和机械，并且对您的经济，军事和科技给予多种增益。

original: The master engineer will construct wonders of Chinese ingenuity throughout your demesne, such as dry docks and blast furnaces.
translation: 将作大匠会在你的领地建设那些充满中国智慧的奇迹，如干船坞和高炉。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has generously granted your request. The master engineer [chinese_master_engineer.GetDynName] will enlighten your nation.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]慷慨地答应了你的请求。将作大匠[chinese_master_engineer.GetDynName]将来教化你的国家。
是一位来自天朝的将作大匠

original: A paper mill has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
translation: 将作大匠§Y[From.GetDynName]§!在§Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§!建成了一座造纸坊。

original: A fireworks guild has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
translation: 将作大匠§Y[From.GetDynName]§!在§Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§!建成了一个烟花作坊。

original: A dry dock has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
translation: 将作大匠§Y[From.GetDynName]§!在§Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§!建成了一座干船坞。

original: An administrative outpost has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
translation: 将作大匠§Y[From.GetDynName]§!已在 §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! 建成一个哨所。

original: A blast furnace has been built in §Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§! by Master Engineer §Y[From.GetDynName]§!.
translation: 将作大匠§Y[From.GetDynName]§!在§Y[jd_build_province.GetName]§!建成了一座高炉。

original: In this factory the worker produces paper, a cheap and light material upon which to write anything from poems to official documents.
translation: 在这个作坊里，工人生产纸——一种廉价而轻盈的材料，可以书写从诗歌到官方文件在内的任何东西。

original: The cunning artisans of the fireworks guild create substances which both delights nobles at extravagant feasts and strikes fear in the hearts of their liege's enemies.
translation: 那些烟火工会灵巧工匠们创造出了一种化学制品——既可以在奢华的酒宴上取悦贵族们，的同时，也可以让一些不怀好意的领主对此感到恐惧。

original: The dry dock in the port of this province makes the construction, maintenance and repairs of ships significantly easier.
translation: 这个省份港口的干船坞使得船只的建造、维护和修理明显变得更容易。

original: An educated bureaucrat and their assistants have set up an outpost here, administrating the local affairs in the efficient Chinese fashion.
translation: 一位受过教育的官僚和他的助手在这里设立了一个衙门，以高效的中国方式管理当地事务。

original: This great Chinese blast furnace provides vast quantities of iron at an excellent level of quality.
translation: 这座巨大的中国高炉提供了大量的优质铁。

original: This military mastermind has a thorough education in Chinese strategy of war.
translation: 这位将军系统全面地学习过中国兵法。

original: A strategist joins your court. From time to time, they will attempt to teach other soldiers about Chinese strategies.\n
translation: 一位兵法家加入了你的宫廷。他偶尔会把中国兵法传授给其他指挥官。\n

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. The skills of [chinese_strategist.GetDynName] will be at your disposal, in the war room as well as on the field of battle.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，已经仁慈地满足了你的愿望。[chinese_strategist.GetDynName]的技艺为你所用，在沙盘之中亦或在战场之上。

original: §Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§! has been teaching your commander §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! about Chinese strategy. §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §Y'Way of the Dragon'§!.
translation: §Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§!教给了你的指挥官§Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§!中国的兵法。§Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§!得到了§Y龙韬§!特质。

original: §Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§! has been teaching your commander §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! about Chinese strategy. §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §Y'Way of the Dog'§!.
translation: §Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§!教给了你的指挥官§Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§!中国的兵法。§Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§!得到了§Y犬韬§!特质。

original: §Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§! has been teaching your commander §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! about Chinese strategy. §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §Y'Way of the Tiger'§!.
translation: §Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§!教给了你的指挥官§Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§!中国的兵法。§Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§!得到了§Y虎韬§!特质。

original: §Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§! has been teaching your commander §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! about Chinese strategy. §Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§! gains the trait §Y'Way of the Leopard'§!.
translation: §Y[commander_teacher.GetDynName]§!教给了你的指挥官§Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§!中国的兵法。§Y[commander_student.GetTitledFirstName]§!得到了§Y豹韬§!特质。

original: This man is a prince of the Chinese imperial family.
This woman is a princess of the Chinese imperial family.

[Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] has decided to grant the house of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] the greatest honor. [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] daughter, the [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] Princess [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName], will become the bride of [imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]决定授予[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]最高的荣誉。[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]女儿，[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective]公主[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName]，将会下嫁[imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] has decided to grant the house of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] a great honor. [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] nephew, the [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] Prince [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName], will become the groom of [imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]决定授予[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]最高的荣誉。[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]侄子，[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective]皇子[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName]，将迎娶[imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: We are honored. The arrival of [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName] is much awaited.
translation: 对[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince][imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName]的到来，我们期待已久，诚惶诚恐。

original: §Y[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]§! is on [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetHerHis] way to the upcoming wedding and will arrive in a few weeks' time.
translation: §Y[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]§!正在赶往即将到来的婚礼，并将在几周内到达。

original: Becoming your [Root.GetHusbandWife] is a great honor, [From.GetTitledFirstName].
An imperial prince of the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! arrives to marry §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.
An imperial princess of the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! arrives to marry §Y[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]§!.

Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince], [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the silk banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName]'s eyes are cast low as [From.GetSheHe] exits to greet you, but for the shortest moment they dart up to meet yours. The tiniest of smiles plays at the corners of [From.GetHerHis] mouth, and a soft blush tints [From.GetHerHis] cheeks. The sight is a balm to your frayed nerves. Surely, you can make this work.
translation: 每个人都对[From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective]天朝[From.GetDynName]氏[From.GetPrincessPrince]殿下[From.GetHerHis]到来感到惊奇。不是因为[From.GetSheHe]来得突然——[Root.Capital.GetName]的宫廷忙碌地准备了数个星期——不是的，人们只是对于[From.GetHerHis]宏伟队伍感到震惊。当那些站在你身边的人开始对那些丝绸旗帜和帝国士兵闪闪发光的盔甲低声细语时，你的目光则越过那精心装饰的肩舆，看向了你未来的[From.GetHusbandWife]。\n\n[From.GetFirstName][From.GetPrincessPrince]走出乘舆向你致意，[From.GetSheHe]一直双眼低垂，却飞快地抬起目光与你的视线交汇了刹那。[From.GetHerHis]嘴角绽放出一抹微笑，微微红晕浸染[From.GetHerHis]脸颊。这景象抚慰了你紧绷着的神经。不要慌，你行的。

original: Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince], [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the silk banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName] does not wait for the servants to open the litter door. [From.GetSheHeCap] gets out on [From.GetHerHis] own and strides towards you, no hesitation slowing [From.GetHerHis] step. As you meet [From.GetHerHis] steady gaze, it is clear that you are looking at a [From.GetManWoman] who will either become your strongest ally, or your most dangerous enemy.
translation: 每个人都对[From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective]天朝[From.GetDynName]氏[From.GetPrincessPrince]殿下[From.GetHerHis]到来感到惊奇。不是因为[From.GetSheHe]来得突然——[Root.Capital.GetName]的宫廷忙碌地准备了数个星期——不是的，人们只是对于[From.GetHerHis]宏伟队伍感到震惊。当那些站在你身边的人开始对那些丝绸旗帜和帝国士兵闪闪发光的盔甲低声细语时，你的目光则越过那精心装饰的肩舆，看向了你未来的[From.GetHusbandWife]。\n\n[From.GetFirstName][From.GetPrincessPrince]等不及仆从们打开轿门，[From.GetSheHeCap]自己就离开了[From.GetHerHis]乘舆向你大步走来，[From.GetHerHis]步履一点都不犹豫。你与[From.GetHerHis]沉稳目光交汇，你意识到眼前的这个[From.GetManWoman]要不然是你的左膀右臂，否则就会是你的心腹之患。

original: Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince], [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the silk banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n[From.GetPrincessPrince] [From.GetFirstName]'s face shines like a sun as [From.GetSheHe] steps down to greet you. [From.GetHerHisCap] gaze wanders across the crowd, acknowledging each and every courtier in your personal retinue, before locking eyes with you. Murmurs of approval confirm that you are not alone to be struck by the [From.GetPrincessPrince]'s charm.
translation: 每个人都对[From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective]天朝[From.GetDynName]氏[From.GetPrincessPrince]殿下[From.GetHerHis]到来感到惊奇。不是因为[From.GetSheHe]来得突然——[Root.Capital.GetName]的宫廷忙碌地准备了数个星期——不是的，人们只是对于[From.GetHerHis]宏伟队伍感到震惊。当那些站在你身边的人开始对那些丝绸旗帜和帝国士兵闪闪发光的盔甲低声细语时，你的目光则越过那精心装饰的肩舆，看向了你未来的[From.GetHusbandWife]。\n\n[From.GetFirstName][From.GetPrincessPrince]的脸庞像太阳一样煜煜生辉，[From.GetSheHe]走下问候你。[From.GetHerHisCap]目光扫过人群，向你扈从中的每一位廷臣致意，然后与你的目光交汇。赞同的低语证实了你不是唯一被[From.GetPrincessPrince]的魅力打动的人。

original: Everyone is amazed by the arrival of the imperial [From.GetPrincessPrince], [From.GetHerHis] [From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] highness [From.GetDynName]. Not that [From.GetSheHe] has not been expected – the court in [Root.Capital.GetName] has been busy with the preparations for weeks – no, they are simply astounded by the grandeur of [From.GetHerHis] procession. While those standing close to you begin to whisper about the silk banners and the gleaming armor of the imperial soldiers, you have your sight trained on the intricately decorated litter approaching, holding your future [From.GetHusbandWife].\n\nIt is no mere [From.GetManWoman] who steps down from the litter, but a creature of pure, ethereal grace. [From.GetSheHeCap] does not walk across the courtyard to meet you – [From.GetSheHe] glides. Awe mingles with a tiny sliver of dread as you look upon [From.GetHerHis] emotionless face. How has a [Root.GetManWoman] like you come to deserve such a noble [From.GetBrideGroom]?
translation: 每个人都对[From.GetChineseComplimentAdjective]天朝[From.GetDynName]氏[From.GetPrincessPrince]殿下[From.GetHerHis]到来感到惊奇。不是因为[From.GetSheHe]来得突然——[Root.Capital.GetName]宫廷忙碌地准备了数个星期——不是的，人们只是对于[From.GetHerHis]宏伟队伍感到震惊。当那些站在你身边的人开始对那些丝绸旗帜和帝国士兵闪闪发光的盔甲低声细语时，你的目光则越过那精心装饰的肩舆，看向了你未来的[From.GetHusbandWife]。\n\n从肩舆中走下来的不仅仅是一位[From.GetManWoman]，而纯粹是飘渺优雅的化身。[From.GetSheHeCap]并未走过院子来见你——[From.GetSheHe]倒像是御风而来。而当你看着[From.GetHerHis]不露声色的脸时，你感到自己敬畏中混杂着一丝惶恐。像你这样的[Root.GetManWoman]怎么会配得上这样一位高贵的[From.GetBrideGroom]？

original: My [GetFromRelation], [From.GetTitledFirstName], has now married the imperial [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]. The grand ceremony and the foreign [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince] will be the talk of the realm for many years to come.
translation: 我的[GetFromRelation]，[From.GetTitledFirstName]，已经与帝国的[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince][imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetDynName]成婚。宏大的典礼和这位异国[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetPrincessPrince]将在未来许多年里成为境内人民谈论的话题。

original: I wish them happiness and many healthy children.
translation: 我祝愿他们幸福美满，早生贵子。

original: Taoism is a polytheistic religion originating in China. While traditionally regarded as founded by Laozi the Supreme Old Lord in the 4th century BC, some elements and practices can be traced to prehistoric folk religions across the Middle Kingdom. The followers revere Tao, the underlying natural order of the Universe – the active expression of Tao for an individual is Te, the inner virtue. Taoists also value life over death, and believe it possible to achieve immortality, through various methods, including spiritual practices and alchemy. In the game, the strong focus on good governance within Taoist society means all Taoist characters get a bonus to Stewardship.
translation: 道教是一种发源于中国的多神教。虽然传统上被认为是由太上老君老子在公元前四世纪建立的，但一些元素和实践可以追溯到遍布中原的史前民间宗教。其追随者尊崇「道」——宇宙的内在自然秩序；而其主观表现形式则是「德」——个人内在的德性。比起死后的世界，道教信徒更注重现世，他们相信通过包括精神修习和炼丹术在内的各种方法可以求得长生。在游戏中，对道教社会内善治的强烈关注体现为所有道教角色都得到了管理能力加成。

original: Yuanshi Tianzun the celeste Venerable of the Primordial Beginning
Te is respected by the clergy and monastics of your religion. Like Prestige it is added to your score on the death of a ruler.
translation: 德 被你宗教的神职人员和修士所看重。就像威望一样，它会在统治者死亡时加入你的分数。

original: As 'the Grand Axe of Craftsmanship', the position of Court Architect holds much prestige.
translation: 拥有高超工艺水准的宫廷营建师在其位置上具有崇高的威望。

original: Also known as 'the other carriage' due to the Zhangshi rarely sharing a carriage with their superior. Nominally the Chief Secretary of a governor, the exact duty of Zhangshi, and the power this position holds, varies greatly.
translation: 长史又被称作别驾，指长史很少与其上级同乘一车。名义上是地方长官的首席幕僚，而他们的具体职责与职权变化相当大。

original: The Staff Officer of an army, the position of Canjun is granted to trustworthy deputies in a military body or sometimes a political arm, and is a prestigious title to hold.
translation: 参军即军队的参谋官，被授予给值得信赖的副手，该官职不仅限于军队也存在于政府系统中，是一个享有盛名的头衔。

original: In the annals of ancient history, Yuhou are explained as the Watchers of Mountains and Lakes. While the title can imply a considerable amount of power, it is in itself a grand gesture to be deemed worthy of the title.
translation: 古代历史记载中的虞候是指掌管山泽的官员。虽然这一头衔也代表了一定的权利，但能够胜任也是莫大的荣幸。

original: As the official recorder of history, Historiographer is a title which can be granted to a learned person – their responsibility is to keep a record of important events, for the sake of future generations. However, some might also argue that it is to ensure that a ruler feels worthy of being chronicled.
translation: 史官作为官方的历史记录者，该头衔被授予博学多识之人——职责是将国家大事记载下来，供后人引以为鉴。然而，有些人可能认为他们是在给统治者歌功颂德。

original: My [adventurous_spirit.GetRootRelation] [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName] has offered to travel to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName], on a mission to bring glory to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. 'Please, my [Root.GetLordLady]', [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] says. 'Let a humble servant strengthen your relations with the [the_protector_general.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]!'
translation: 我的[adventurous_spirit.GetRootRelation][adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]提出了前去[the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]游历的想法，并带着为[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]增光的使命。「我的[Root.GetLordLady]，我恳求您，」[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]说，「让我这样一个谦卑的仆人去加深您与[the_protector_general.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]的关系吧！」

original: What a brilliant idea! Go, with my blessing.
translation: 好主意！带着我的祝福出发吧。

original: §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! lights up like the sun, before rushing off to pack [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] belongings.\n
translation: §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§!像太阳一般意气风发，然后急匆匆地收拾[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis]行李去了。\n

original: I think [back_up_target_1.GetTitledFirstName] is better suited for the journey.
§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! looks disappointed, as §Y[back_up_target_1.GetTitledFirstName]§! is ordered to go in [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] stead.\n
I'm sorry, but [back_up_target_2.GetTitledFirstName] would give a better impression of us...
translation: 我很抱歉，但[back_up_target_2.GetTitledFirstName]会给他们留下更好的印象。

original: §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! looks disappointed, as §Y[back_up_target_2.GetTitledFirstName]§! is ordered to go in [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] stead.\n
Absolutely not! You are needed here, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName].
This character is currently out traveling and seeing the world.
translation: 这个角色正在游历世界。

original: One morning I wake up before my guards have attempted to rouse me. I hear excited chatter coming from the main hall, and as I open the [Root.GetChamberOpening] there is a bustle of servants filling the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. '[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] has returned from the court of the [the_protector_general.GetTitle]!' they gossip.
translation: 这天早晨我在侍卫来唤醒我之前就醒来了，我听到大厅里传来喋喋不休的议论声，我打开[Root.GetChamberOpening]，看到一群喧闹的仆人挤满了[Root.GetCapitalHolding]。「[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]已经从[the_protector_general.GetTitle]的宫廷回来了！」他们叽叽喳喳地打听着。
[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]带着礼物来了吗？真是太好了！

original: §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! is proud to bring souvenirs from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName].\n
translation: §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§!对能从[the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]那里带来纪念品感到自豪。\n

original: 'The [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] is a fascinating place, my [Root.GetLordLady]' [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] says, as I turn the foreign coins over in my hand. [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHeCap] arrived this morning, and besides the obvious souvenirs, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] comes carrying many a tale from [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels – everyone in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding] wants to know everything.
translation: 「[the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]是一座美丽的城市，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」，[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]一边说，一边把一小堆精美的外国钱币放到我的手心。[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHeCap]今早回到了故乡，除了那些奇异的纪念品外，[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]还从旅行经过的国度带回来了许多传奇故事——现在[Root.GetCapitalHolding]里的每一个人都想知道关于东方的一切！

original: The journey of §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] was a success!\n

[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] returned to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] late last night, seemingly exhausted from the journey. Today, during the briefing, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] simply appears relieved to be home again. Just as I begin to worry about the impression [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] must have made throughout [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] offers me a sealed letter of greeting from the [the_protector_general.GetTitle] [the_protector_general.GetHerselfHimself]!
translation: [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]已经于昨天傍晚回到了[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]，似乎因为长途旅行的艰辛疲累不堪。今天作简报时，[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]仅仅是为能够回到家园感到如释重负。当我开始担心[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]在[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis]旅行中可能已经造成的影响时，[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]提供了一封来自[the_protector_general.GetTitle]本人亲笔的贺信。

original: [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName] has returned from [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels. When my council inquire about [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] impressions of the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] lets out an exasperated sigh. Then [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] unleashes a tirade about [adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeChineseConvoTopic].
translation: [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName]从[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis]旅程中归来。当我的内阁询问[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis]对[the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]的印象时，[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]发出了愤怒的叹息。接着[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]发布了一番长篇大论，关于[adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeChineseConvoTopic]。

original: This is not what I had hoped for...
You lose a bit of grace.\n

[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName] has finally returned from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]! However, when asked about [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] adventures, [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] just mutters, mostly about [adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeChineseConvoTopic].
translation: [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName]终于从[the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]回到了故乡！然而，当被问及[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis]冒险经历时，[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]只是嘟囔几句，主要关于[adventurous_spirit.GetNegativeChineseConvoTopic]。

original: I should have sent someone else in [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]'s stead.
Oh, how lovely! Welcome to the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]!

translation: 一位名叫§Y[new_found_lover.GetTitledName]§!的[new_found_lover.GetManWoman]加入了你的宫廷。\n

original: You invited a stranger to our [Root.GetCapitalHolding]?
translation: 你邀请了一个陌生人到我们的[Root.GetCapitalHolding]来？

original: You gain some grace. §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! is not pleased.\n
translation: 你获得了一些皇恩。§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§!很不高兴。\n

original: There is something different about [adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName] – as we discuss [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] travels to the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] speaks passionately about [adventurous_spirit.GetChineseConvoTopic]. 'Oh, my [Root.GetLordLady]. You must let me go back', [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] pleads.
translation: 正当我们讨论起[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis]前往[the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]的旅程时，[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]表现得有些异样。[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]激动地讲起了[adventurous_spirit.GetChineseConvoTopic]。「哦，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。您必须让我回去」。[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]请求道。

original: If this is what you want...
What, you want to live there?!
I... can understand the desire to follow your dreams.
translation: 我……可以理解你追逐梦想的愿望。

original: §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! will leave your court forever, taking [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] immediate family with [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHim].\n
translation: §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§!将永远离开你的宫廷，并将[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis]直系亲属跟随[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHim]一并带离。\n

original: Out of the question, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]! You belong here in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName].
Oh, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]. Surely, you don't mean that?
You gain some grace. §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§! will get over it.\n
translation: 你获得了一些皇恩。§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledFirstName]§!的思念之情会逐渐消失的。\n

original: But... How can you ask me to send you away again, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]?
translation: 但是……你怎么能要求我再次送你回去，[adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]？

original:
This option is available due to the high opinion §Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName]§! has of you.

Your [adventurous_spirit.GetRootRelation] bows [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] head in shame, assuring you that [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] will remain at court.
translation:
这个选项可用是因为你与§Y[adventurous_spirit.GetTitledName]§!的良好关系。

你的[adventurous_spirit.GetRootRelation]羞愧地低下了头，向你保证[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]会留在宫廷里。

original: Perhaps [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] at least enjoyed [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] last days abroad.\n
translation: 也许[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]至少享受了在国外最后的日子。\n

original: left their old life behind to travel to the Chinese Empire
translation: 抛弃了过去的生活，旅行到中国开启了新的人生

original: left their old life behind to travel to the Chinese Empire, on the order of $KILLER$
translation: 在$KILLER$令下抛弃了过去的生活，旅行到中国开启了新的人生

original: §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! will leave [This.GetHerHis] current life behind and make a new one for [This.GetHerselfHimself] in the distant East.\n
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledName]§!将会抛下[This.GetHerHis]一切，在遥远的东方开启[This.GetHerselfHimself]新的生活。\n

original: how the realm is so wealthy, and every inch of the Middle Kingdom seems to be used to house or nourish its people
translation: 这个国度多么富饶，中国的每一寸土地似乎都盖了房子，或者被用来滋养着它的人民

original: how the paper they write on is so strangely white and soft
translation: 他们用来写的纸白得不可思议而且很柔软

original: how the Middle Kingdom is so full of life, and there are people everywhere
translation: 中原是如此的富庶安康，人口殷实。

original: the entertainment found in the streets of one particular Chinese town – there would be jugglers, marionettes, acrobats, as well as shadow plays and mysterious storytellers
translation: 在一个中国小镇的街道上发现的娱乐活动——有杂耍者，提线木偶，杂技演员，以及皮影戏和说书人

original: the Chinese custom of celebrating their gods' birthdays – they hold festivals, where both actors and priests paint their faces and perform songs of magic ritual together
translation: 中国庆祝各路神仙诞辰的习俗——举办节日，让演员和僧侣们都化上妆，表演戏法。

original: how any water route through a Chinese town seems to be constantly crowded by traffic, with ships and boats everywhere
translation: 每条流淌过中国城镇的水道都被大船小舟挤得熙熙攘攘

original: how the Chinese have some truly artisan pottery – one type is made to look as if it has shattered, yet it somehow holds together, as if by magic
translation: 中国人有真正的手工陶器。它们看起来好像已经粉碎了，但却能以某种方式结合在一起，就像魔法一样

original: the melody of the Chinese language, and the delicate intonations of certain words
translation: 中国语言的声调，以及某些词语的微妙语调

original: the magnificent architecture of the many religious buildings found throughout the realm
translation: 遍布整个王国的许多宏伟的宗教建筑

original: the details of a religious ceremony, involving water-turtles being thrown back into the water they were fished from
translation: 将钓起的水龟放回水里的宗教仪式细节

original: a pleasure trip made on a beautiful lake, and the magnificent landscape of the Empire
translation: 在一个美丽的湖上的快乐之旅，以及帝国壮丽的景色。

original: the construction of certain Chinese boats, with fine carvings painted in bright colors, and how they always carry names such as 'Hundred Flowers' or 'Golden Lion'
translation: 中国建造的一些船只，她们有着精美的雕刻和鲜艳的色彩，而且这些船总是取例如「百花」或「金狮」这样的名字。

original: the food of the Middle Kingdom, involving delicious shellfish, vegetables, fruit, and sweetmeats
translation: 中华帝国的食物，有美味的贝类、蔬菜、水果和甜食

original: the intricacies of Chinese government and the seemingly supernatural efficiency displayed by its scholar-officials
translation: 天朝政府结构错综复杂，由士大夫们以近乎超自然地效率运行着。

original: the level of literary and artistic sensibility the Chinese display, and the elegance of their calligraphy
translation: 中国人展现出的文艺审美水平和书法的典雅

original: their incessant use of firecrackers, constantly scaring [This.GetHerHis] wits out of [This.GetHerHim]
translation: 他们不停地放鞭炮，[This.GetHerHis]心绪一直被吓得[This.GetHerHim]不知所措。

original: how there was always people, too much people, and [This.GetSheHe] still has trouble hearing [This.GetHerselfHimself] think
translation: 太多人，到处都是人，[This.GetSheHe]一直困扰于听不到[This.GetHerselfHimself]的心声。

original: poor weather and an impenetrable language barrier
translation: 恶劣的天气和难以逾越的语言障碍

original: altruism, and the value of everyday kindness
translation: 利他主义和日行一善的价值

original: the hypocrisy of society's obsession with selflessness
the modern tendency to underestimate the value of prayer and contemplation
translation: 低估祈祷和沉思价值的现代倾向

original: the pains and pleasures of being human
translation: 作为人类的痛苦和快乐

original: witty insights and observations on human behavior
translation: 对人类行为的诙谐见解和观察

original: social norms and the value of being straightforward, rather than pretending politeness
translation: 社会规范和直截了当的价值，而不是假装礼貌

original: grooming routines, and the many ways one can comb one's hair
translation: 梳洗习惯和梳理头发的多种方式

original: shallowness, and certain people's fascination with grooming routines
translation: 某些人对梳理习惯的肤浅和迷恋

original: the intricacies of spoken language, and the differences between intonation and melody
translation: 语言的复杂性，以及语调和旋律的不同之处

original: the complexities of the human mind, and whether certain animals can truly count as sentient or not
translation: 人类思维的复杂性，以及某些动物是否真的可以算作有知觉的动物

original: humor, and particularly when it arises as the result of logical fallacies
translation: 幽默，尤其是当它表现为逻辑谬误的结果

original: the elitism of people who insist on using fancy words to say simple things
translation: 坚持用华丽辞藻表述简单事物的人群的优越感

original: the importance of a strict personal exercise regime, and how it seems to come natural to some people
translation: 严格的个人锻炼制度的重要性，以及对某些人来说是如何的自然

original: perceptions of beauty, and the silly notion that it is aided by the physical strength of a person
translation: 对美的感知，以及认为它由人的身体力量所辅助的愚蠢的观念

original: physical ailments, and what a nuisance they are
boredom, and the inconvenience of being confined to one's chamber, due to illness
translation: 无聊，以及由于生病而被限制在自己的房间里的不便

original: the stinging of a fresh wound, and the constant reminder it is
translation: 不断地提醒着新伤口的刺痛

original: the judgment from some people, in regards to being [This.GetMediumDisabilityDesc]
the pains of living every day, and the encompassing pressure we are all constantly under
translation: 每天生活的痛苦，以及我们一直在承受的压力

original: the privilege of a good education, and the comfort that comes from excelling in academia
translation: 良好教育的特权，以及学术成果斐然的愉悦之处

original: the privilege of a good education, and the similarity of our backgrounds
translation: 良好教育的特权，以及我们背景的相似性

original: how a diplomatic education benefits everyone, if done right
translation: 做好外交教育人人受益

original: the importance of well-educated military personnel within one's entourage
translation: 受过良好教育的军事人员的重要性

original: how it's easy to underestimate the actually very tangible value of good stewardship
translation: 为什么总是很容易低估良好管理的实际价值

original: how much fun it was to undergo an education that involved reading, but also between the lines
translation: 接受一项涉及阅读的教育是多么有趣，但字里行间也有很多乐趣

original: the smell of old tomes, and the strictness of our respective childhood tutors
translation: 旧书的味道，还有我们童年时期的尊敬的严师

original: the longing to spend more time in the gardens, and the most recent additions of to its scenery
translation: 渴望花更多的时间在花园里，以及欣赏其最近增添的景观

original: hunting, and the elusiveness of a certain white beast
translation: 狩猎，以及某种白色野兽的不定行踪

original: poetry, alliterations, and our favorite stanzas
translation: 诗歌，头韵，和我们最喜欢的诗节

original: how I should spend more time with my falcons, and what it would be like to soar through the sky like they do
translation: 我应该多花些时间和我的猎鹰在一起，不知像他们那样翱翔在天空会是什么样的感觉

original: the intangible qualities of the fabric of our reality, and how little we actually know about it
translation: 我们对现实生活中无形的素质知之甚少

original: the joy of meeting a fellow scholar
translation: 遇见一位学者同伴的喜悦

original: how being a councilor is not always a walk in the park, yet ultimately worth it
translation: 作为一名内阁成员并非轻而易举但最终还是值得

original: how being on the council of [Root.Liege.GetTitledName] is sort of a drag sometimes
translation: [Root.Liege.GetTitledName]的内阁成员有时会有点麻烦

original: the surprisingly mild weather, compared to last year
translation: 与去年相比温和到令人惊讶的天气

original: unable to keep a straight back
Offer up one of your courtiers, to be sent to live out their life in the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!, in the service of the Emperor.\n
translation: 将一位廷臣送去§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!为天子服务，他将在中国度过余生。\n

original: Has NOT sent a concubine in 20 years
translation: 过去20年里没有进贡侍妾

original: Offer up one of your courtiers, to be sent to live out their life in the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!, in the service of the Emperor.\n
translation: 将一位廷臣送去§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!为天子服务，他将在中国度过余生。\n

original: Has NOT sent a eunuch in 20 years
translation: 过去20年里没有派遣宦官

original: The heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously accepted your gift. [person_sent_as_tribute.GetImpressionOfTribute]. \n\nThe generosity of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will not be forgotten.
translation: 至高无上的[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]陛下已经展示了他的仁德，欣喜地接受了你的贡品。[person_sent_as_tribute.GetImpressionOfTribute]。\n\n[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族的慷慨与大度将被长久铭记。

original: I can see how my choice of tribute might seem miscalculated...
translation: 我看我对贡品的选择可能是错误的……

original: We will try to make use of the tribute you sent us
translation: 我们会试着让你送给我们的贡品发挥作用的

original: However, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] does not seem very sharp
However, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] is, so far, not very likable
translation: 然而，[Person_Sendas_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]到目前为止，还不太讨人喜欢

original: However, for fear of scaring our subjects, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] will be performing [person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis] duties away from the public eye
translation: 然而，为了避免吓到我们的臣民，[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]将隐秘地进行[person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis]任务

original: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] illustrates well the level of the educational system you keep in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]
translation: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]清楚地反映了[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的教育体系水平

original: However, we were hoping [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] would prove more capable within the sphere of [person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis] interests
translation: 尽管不尽人意，我们仍希望[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]将在[person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis]感兴趣的领域创造更多的价值

original: However, it is disappointing that the child seems wildly uninterested in worldly knowledge
translation: 然而，令人失望的是，孩子似乎对世俗知识不感兴趣

original: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] has only a modest education, but might still do well at our court
translation: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]只接受过中等教育，但也能在我们的宫廷里好好的工作

original: While not very impressed by [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName], we are flattered to receive your [person_sent_as_tribute.GetRootRelation]
translation: 虽然不太喜欢[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]，但我们很荣幸能收到您的[person_sent_as_tribute.GetRootRelation]

original: It is satisfactory, how [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] occasionally comes off as well-spoken
translation: 令人欣慰的是，现在[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]有时也能说得很好

original: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] could, with some training, become somewhat skilled in the military arts
translation: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]经过一些培训，可以在军事方面有一定的进步。

original: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] shows something of an aptitude, and will be trained by our scholar-bureaucrats
translation: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]显露了一些天分，将来可以由士大夫们教导他

original: It is satisfactory that, while not obvious, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] shows signs of a sly intellect
translation: 令人满意的是，虽然不明显，但[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]表现得像一个狡猾的聪明人

original: It is adequate, how [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] might grow into a learned [person_sent_as_tribute.GetManWoman]
translation: 准确地说，[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]有那么些可能成为一个博学的[person_sent_as_tribute.GetManWoman]

original: While seemingly lacking in intellectual prowess, [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] possess an admirable physique, and will suffice for manual labor
translation: 虽然看起来缺乏智谋，但[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]拥有令人叹服的体格，能够胜任体力劳动

original: The wits of [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] has a good chance of being entertaining to us
translation: 这位名为[person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]的宦官才智很不错，我们很满意

original: It is fitting that you have sent a rather aesthetically pleasing subject to serve us
translation: 感谢你送来的这位颇有魅力的宦官，他很适合这里的工作

original: We will hopefully enjoy the architect you have sent us
translation: 但愿我们能欣然接受你派遣给我们的建筑师

original: We shall hopefully enjoy the strategist you have sent us

original: Pray we enjoy the scholarly mind of [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]

original: We shall probably enjoy the faqih you have sent us

translation: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName]一定会因为[person_sent_as_tribute.GetHerHis]教育背景而留下好印象

original: We are flattered to receive a close relative of yours

original: It pleases us, how [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] appears very articulate

original: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] seems skilled in the military arts, and will surely be of use to us

original: [person_sent_as_tribute.GetTitledFirstName] seems to possess a well-organized mind, and will serve our bureaucrats well
