original: Has a relative eligible for marriage

A loud sneeze interrupts [Root.GetMyMarshalName] [Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]'s speech on the importance of camp hygiene. 'I am sorry, my [Root.GetLordLady],' mutters [Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName], the [Root.GetSpymasterName], casting a quick glance at the cat on my lap. 'If you could only leave the creature out of our meetings, this would not happen again, I swear.'
translation: 一个巨大的喷嚏声打断了[Root.GetMyMarshalName][Root.job_marshal.GetTitledFirstName]的关于营地卫生的发言。「我很抱歉，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」[Root.job_spymaster.GetTitledFirstName]轻声说道，然后[Root.GetSpymasterName]快速扫了一眼盘在我大腿上的猫：「如果您能在开会的时候不让这个东西参加的话，我就不会再犯了，我发誓。」

original: How dare you blame little innocent Mittens?!
translation: 你怎么敢责怪无辜的小猫呢？！

original: Perhaps you are right, [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]. The council is no place for a cat.
translation: 也许您是对的，[Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]。内阁容不得猫的存在。

original: I am awoken by a soft pat on my cheek. 'Oh, Mittens. Are you having trouble falling asleep?' She jumps down from my bed and starts pawing at the door. 'Let's go to the kitchen and get you some warm milk.' But as I close my bedroom door behind me, Mittens heads in the opposite direction.
translation: 我被面颊上的轻挠唤醒了，「哦，小猫，你睡不着吗？」她跳下我的床，开始不停地抓挠门板。「我们去厨房给你弄点热牛奶吧。」但当我走近身后的卧室门时，小猫的爪子却指向了相反的方向。

original: Follow Mittens down the dark corridor.
translation: 沿着黑暗的走廊走下去。

original: Go to the kitchen, she is sure to follow.
translation: 去厨房，她一定会跟上的。

original: As I round a corner, I spot Mittens' fluffy tail as she squeezes through the chamber door of my [Root.GetSpymasterName], [Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName]! I enter, finding Mittens curled up on [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] chest, licking [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] face, but [Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName] does not react. The [Root.job_spymaster.GetManWoman] before me is completely still, not even breathing, and [Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis] face is strangely swollen...
translation: 当我转过墙角，我一眼认出了小猫蓬蓬的尾巴，她正在挤进[Root.GetSpymasterName][Root.job_spymaster.GetFullName]的房门！我一进门就看到小猫蜷曲在[Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis]胸口舔[Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis]脸，然而[Root.job_spymaster.GetFirstName]没有任何反应。我面前的[Root.job_spymaster.GetManWoman]一动不动，连气儿都没了，[Root.job_spymaster.GetHerHis]脸也肿得怪怪的……

original: You have discovered a murder, Mittens! Clever kitty!
translation: 你发现了一件谋杀案，咪咪！聪明的猫！

original: Apparently, it was not bad enough when that stupid animal glared at us from the saftey of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]'s lap. Now it has its own chair, and a seat on the council, to boot! The [FromFrom.GetTitle] has informed us that the former [FromFrom.GetSpymasterName] was poisoned, but a servant who helped move the body insist that the [FromFrom.GetSpymasterName] was suffocated...
translation: 显然，那头牲畜仗着[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的势头向我们翻白眼还不是最糟的。现在它坐着椅子，还在内阁有了席位！[FromFrom.GetTitle]告知我们前任[FromFrom.GetSpymasterName]被投毒了，但搬运尸体的仆人坚持说[FromFrom.GetSpymasterName]是被闷死的……

original: Is anyone on the council safe? This is a catastrophe!
translation: 内阁里还能有活人吗？这真是一场灾难！
小猫§Y咪咪§!现在成为间谍总管。

original: China will launch both Tributary wars and Major Invasions. Chinese Adventurers can spawn.
translation: 中国既会发起要求朝贡的战争，也会发动大举入侵。也会出现中国的冒险者。

original: China can NOT launch Tributary wars or Major Invasions. Chinese Adventurers can spawn.
translation: 中国无法发起朝贡战争或大举入侵，但仍会出现中国冒险者。

original: China will launch Tributary wars but will NOT launch Major Invasions. Chinese Adventurers can spawn.
translation: 中国会发起要求朝贡的战争，但不会发动大举入侵。会出现中国的冒险者。

original: China will NOT launch Tributary wars or Major Invasions. Chinese Adventurers can NOT spawn.
translation: 中国不会发起朝贡战争或大举入侵。中国的冒险者不会产生。

original: Only characters within China's Diplomatic Range can use Grace Actions.
translation: 只有在中国外交范围内的角色可以使用皇恩行为。

original: Any character in the world can use Grace Actions.
translation: 全世界任何角色都可以使用皇恩选项。

original: Characters can, through spending Piety and Gold, start Border Dispute wars targeting single counties.
translation: 角色可以通过花费虔诚和金钱，以单一省份为目标，开启边界争端战争。
角色不能发起边界争端。

original: Bön is the ancient indigenous pre-Buddhist religion of Tibet. It is shamanistic and animistic in nature with multiple deities. After the introduction of Buddhism to Tibet, Bön adopted many of its elements.
translation: 苯教是吐蕃前佛教时代的古老本土信仰。它具有萨满教和泛灵论的色彩，相信自然界存在多个神灵。在佛教传入吐蕃后，苯教吸收了许多佛教元素。

original: You can choose a personal patron from among the many lesser deities of the Bön faith.
translation: 你可以从苯教的众多神灵中选择一个守护神。

original: I should dedicate myself to a particular deity so that I may rule more effectively.
translation: 我应该向某位神灵奉献自己，以便更有效的统治。

original: Shenlha Okar, Wisdom of the White Light
Choosing any of these as a personal deity would be a testament to my piety.
translation: 选择它们中任何一个作为我的个人神明将是我虔诚的证明。

original: Kula Kari, God of the Mountain

§Y$TARGET$§! is weak and in need of protection, they would be better off in your realm! By spending a significant amount of §YPrestige§! you can go to war to forcibly make them your Vassal, as long as they are of a §Ylower tier§! than you, at or below §Y30 Realm Size§! and where the ruler is either of your §YReligion§! or §YCulture Group§!.
translation: §Y$TARGET$§!现在实力弱小且需要保护，在你的治下他们会生活得更好！通过花费大量的§Y威望§!，只要他们的§Y头衔阶层§!低于你，领土面积小于或等于 §Y30§!，并且此地的统治者属于与你相同的§Y宗教组§!或相同的§Y文化组§!，你就可以发动战争强令他们成为你的封臣。

original: The §Y$TITLE$§! is, de jure, a vassal of §Y$CLAIMANT$§!. By spending a significant amount of §YPrestige§!, we can go to war for the entire duchy.
translation: §Y$TITLE$§!是§Y$CLAIMANT$§!的一个法理封臣。我们可以消耗一大笔§Y威望§!来发动战争夺取整块公国！

original: You are very powerful, and so is §Y$TARGET$§! - it is time to show them who is the strongest! By spending a significant amount of §YPrestige§! and §YPiety§! you can go to war for an entire Kingdom, as long as they are as strong as you or stronger.
translation: 你国力雄厚，§Y$TARGET$§!也是如此——是时候向他们展示谁才是最强之人！通过消耗一大笔§Y威望§!和§Y虔诚§!，你可以以一整个王国为目标而宣战，只要他们不比你弱小。

original: §Y$TARGET$§! holds land in a Duchy you are pretender to. By spending §YPiety§! and §YGold§! you can go to war over any County that is part of a Duchy you hold land in, as long as the Duchy has no holder. This Casus Belli is only available to characters of Count or Duke tier.
translation: §Y$TARGET$§!持有你所觊觎之公国的领土。只要这个公国头衔无人持有，你就可以花费§Y虔诚§!和§Y金钱§!，发起获取该公国下属土地的战争。这宣战理由只提供给伯爵或公爵级的角色。

original: §Y$TARGET$§! is not of your religion, but has Counties in their realm following the true faith. They must be liberated from their oppressors!
translation: §Y$TARGET$§! 是个异教徒，但是他领地里的人民却尊崇真正的信仰。我们应当让那些受压迫的人得到解放！

original: The §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§! will be liberated under a new ruler of the §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! religion! This ruler will become your §YTributary§!.
translation: §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!将会被来自§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!信仰的新领主所解放！这位领主将会成为您的§Y朝贡国§!

original: My heart burns with fervor upon hearing of the poor [Root.Religion.GetName] souls being oppressed in the realm of [liberate_target.GetBestName]. [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] intended for all true believers to be free to decide their own fate, but if [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] is preoccupied with divine things perhaps I should carry out the will of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]?
translation: 当我听说[liberate_target.GetBestName]领地内的[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒们的灵魂受到压迫时，心中顿时充满了火热与痛苦。虽然[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]定意要让他所有真信徒能自由地决定自己的命运，但如果[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]专注神圣的事业，那我是否应该执行[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]的旨意？
我必须解放我的[Root.Religion.GetName]兄弟姐妹！

original: I have better things to do...
Gain one use of the §YLiberate Religion§! Casus Belli, to be used on any valid target of your choosing.
translation: 获得一个§Y宗教解放§!宣战理由，可用于你选择的任何有效目标。

original: You decide that your time is better spent elsewhere. You will not be presented with this opportunity again.
translation: 因为你决定把时间花在别的地方，所以不再会有这种机会。

original: That [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has declared war upon me with the presumed notion to free hostages I have rightfully captured! This gives me just cause to execute them, if I so wish...
translation: 那个[GetRootFromInsult][From.GetBestName]已经以解救人质这个未经考虑的借口对我悍然发动战争，而那些人本是被合法扣押的！这恰好给了我处决他们的理由，如果我愿意的话……

original: This war must end, offer to send their people back.
translation: 这场战争必须结束，提议放他们回国。

original: I must make an example, execute [chosen_captive.GetFirstName].
How dare they? Execute ALL captives!
translation: 他们竟敢如此？处决所有俘虏！

original: We shall meet on the battlefield.
[From.GetBestName] has sent an envoy with an offer - if we were to end this war, [From.GetSheHe] will release all the captives and allow them safe passage to our court!
translation: [From.GetBestName]已经派遣了一位使节提出提议：如果我们结束这场战争，[From.GetSheHe]将释放所有的俘虏，并将他们安全地护送至你的宫廷！

original: Ha! I am in this for the loot and plunder, the war is still on!
translation: 哈！我在这里是就是为了烧杀抢掠，给我继续打！

original: [From.GetBestName] has accepted our offer to release the captives, the war is over!
translation: 战争结束了！[From.GetBestName]已经接受了我们释放俘虏的提议。

original: [From.GetBestName] had the guts to deny our offer. Apparently, the lives of the captives do not mean anything to [From.GetHerHim] - it was all a ruse to declare war!
translation: [From.GetBestName]有勇气拒绝我们的提议。很明显，俘虏的性命对[From.GetHerHim]而言一文不值。宣战完全是一个诡计！

original: Let us see if they mean little to [From.GetHerHim] when they are all dead!
translation: 让我们看看如果她们都死了[From.GetHerHim]是否会无动于衷？

original: Disaster! In response to our declaration of war that [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has beheaded [chosen_captive.GetFirstName]! We should have seen this coming...
translation: 灾祸！作为对我们的宣战的回复，[GetRootFromInsult][From.GetBestName]已经将[chosen_captive.GetFirstName]斩首！我们本应想到这一点的……

original: In response to our declaration of war that [GetRootFromInsult] [From.GetBestName] has has all captives beheaded! We should have seen this coming...
translation: 作为对我们的宣战行为的回应，[GetRootFromInsult][From.GetBestName]已经将所有俘虏斩首！我们本应预见到这一点的……

original: This is a war of vengeance now!

[This.GetTitledFirstName] wants to see the authority of the §Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§! Religion strengthened, as it is currently below §Y30%§!.\n\nWhile this Ambition is active, [This.GetTitledFirstName] might be presented with special war opportunities.
translation: [This.GetTitledFirstName]想要看到§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!的宗教权威加强，因为它现在低于 §Y30%§!。\n\n当这个野心成立时，[This.GetTitledFirstName]可能有特殊的宣战机会。

original:
To complete the ambition you need to perform §Y3§! of the following tasks:
 §Y*§! Win a Holy War
 §Y*§! Successfully defend against a Holy War
 §Y*§! Construct a Temple
 §Y*§! Convert a Province to [This.Religion.GetName]
 §Y*§! Complete a Special Opportunity
Note that you can complete the same task multiple times.

Tasks currently completed: §G[This.strengthen_religion.GetValue]§!
translation:
为了完成这个野心你必须完成以下任务中的 §Y3§! 项：
§Y*§! 赢得一场圣战
§Y*§! 防御一场圣战
§Y*§! 建筑一座神殿
§Y*§! 让某个省份转教成[This.Religion.GetName]
§Y*§! 完成一次特殊机遇
注意同一个任务可以多次完成。

目前完成的任务数：§G[This.strengthen_religion.GetValue]§!

original: You can choose to dispute any County that borders you. Beware that choosing to wage a conquest not backed by a Claim carries hefty penalties - the penalties are the highest when attacking someone following your religion, fairly high while attacking someone of your religious group and still significant when attacking someone of another religious group.
translation: 你可以选择去入侵任何与你接壤的伯爵领。但是要注意在没有宣称的情况下发动侵略将要付出沉重的代价——当你攻击同宗教的领主时所付出的代价是最高的，其次是攻击与你在同一宗教组的，最次的是攻击其他宗教组的领主，但代价依然沉重。

original: The opinion of all §YLanded Characters§! of your §YReligious Group§! in your §YRealm§! and the realm of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-15§! for §Y10§! years. §Y(Declared Unjust War)§!
translation: 所有在你§Y境内§!属于你的§Y宗教组§!的§Y有地角色§!以及§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!境内对你的看法将改变 §R-15§! 持续 §Y10§! 年。§Y（发动不义战争）§!

original: The opinion of all §YLanded Characters§! of the §Y[From.Religion.GetName]§! religion in your §YRealm§! and the realm of §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§! changes by §R-15§! for §Y10§! years. §Y(Declared Unjust War)§!
translation: 所有在你§Y境内§!信奉§Y[From.Religion.GetName]§!的§Y有地角色§!以及§Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!境内对你的看法将改变 §R-15§! 持续 §Y10§! 年。§Y（发动不义战争）§!

original: China can, by way of war, force realms to submit to them.
translation: 天朝可以通过战争迫使他国屈从。

original: China can, by way of war, force realms to pay them tribute.
translation: 天朝可以通过战争迫使他国朝贡。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! forces §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! to submit and become their subject.\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! will usurp §YCounties§! until [Root.GetHerHis] §YDemesne Limit§! is reached!\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!用武力强制§Y[This.GetTitledName]§!臣服并成为他们的境内之民。\n§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!将篡夺§Y伯爵领§!直到[Root.GetHerHis]§Y直辖领§!达到上限！\n

original: $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to Make $DEFENDER$ a Tributary State

§Y$TARGET$§! is weak, but if they would just pay you tribute in the form of gold and soldiers you could protect them!

Through war you can force any realm that you or one of your §YTributary States§! border to pay you §Y20%§! of their income and §Y15%§! of their levy reinforcements as tribute.
Will only break free if the §YSuzerain§! has §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§!, is §RNOT§! §YIndependent§!, has §Rless§! §YRealm Size§! than the §YTributary State§! or §Rdeclines a defensive§! §YCall to Arms§! from the §YTributary State§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can §RNOT§! be called to war.
translation:
§Y$TARGET$§!十分虚弱，但是如果他们以金钱和士兵的形式向你交付贡税，你就会提供保护！

你可以通过战争强迫任何你或你§Y朝贡国§!的邻国缴纳 §Y20%§! 收入和 §Y15%§! 的征召兵补员以作为贡赋。
只有在§Y宗主国§!拥有§R负§!§Y威望§!、§R不是§!§Y独立统治者§!、§Y领土规模§!§R小于§!§Y朝贡国§!，或者是§R拒绝防御性§!§Y朝贡国§!的§Y战争召唤§!的时候才会脱离朝贡。
这种类型的§Y朝贡国§!§R不可以§!被召入战争。

original:
§Y$TARGET$§! is rich and should pay tribute to you!

Through war you can force any realm that you border to pay you §Y40%§! of their income as tribute.
This type of §YTributary§! will §Rbreak free§! upon the death of the §YSuzerain§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can be called to war.
translation:
§Y$TARGET$§!很富裕因此应当向你朝贡！

你可以通过战争强迫任何位于你边界的邻国缴纳 §Y40%§! 收入以作为贡赋。
这种类型的§Y朝贡国§!在§Y宗主§!死亡时会§R脱离朝贡§!。
这种类型的§Y朝贡国§!可以被召入战争。

original: $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to Make $DEFENDER$ a Tributary State

§Y$TARGET$§!'s realm is weak and no match for me, it is time for them to pay tribute or be crushed underneath the thundering hooves of my horde!

Through war you can force any realm that you or one of your §YTributaries§! border to pay you §Y50%§! of their income as tribute.
Will only break free if the §YSuzerain§! has §Rnegative§! §YPrestige§!.
This type of §YTributary§! can be called to war.
This type of §YTributary§! can call you into their wars, but you are not forced to accept their §YCall to Arms§!.
translation:
§Y$TARGET$§!的领地如此虚弱，根本不是我的对手，是时候让他们朝贡了，否则我游牧民的雷霆铁蹄将会碾碎他们！

你可以通过战争强迫任何你或你§Y朝贡国§!的邻国缴纳 §Y50%§! 收入以作为贡赋。
只有在§Y宗主§!拥有§R负§!§Y威望§!的情况下才会脱离朝贡。
这种类型的§Y朝贡国§!可以被召唤加入战争。
这种类型的§Y朝贡国§!会召唤你加入他们的战争，不过你并不一定要响应他们的§Y战争召唤§!。

original: My §YSuzerain§! is weak and unable to prevent me from simply not paying them further tribute.
translation: 我的§Y宗主§!软弱无力，无法阻止我不向他们进贡

original: Our Tributary State of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has apparently decided to stop paying us tribute - [From.GetTitledFirstName] calls us "weak" and claims that we are "unable to defend [From.GetHerHis] realm", what nonsense!
translation: 我们的朝贡国[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]决定停止向我们朝贡——[From.GetTitledFirstName]称我们「软弱」并宣称我们「无法保护[From.GetHerHis]领地」，多么可笑！

original: Perhaps it is time to make [From.GetHerHim] get back in line...
translation: 也许是时候做出决定了。让[From.GetHerHim]回到队伍里……

original: The §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§! is in a weakened state and unable to prevent me from simply not paying them further tribute.
translation: §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!处于虚弱状态，无力阻止我停止交纳贡赋。

original: Has NOT sent an artifact in 10 years
translation: 没有在 10 年内送出宝物

original: There are several prominent Taoist schools. Which should I follow to become a better ruler?
translation: 这里有几个著名的道家学派。哪一个能让我成为一个更好的统治者？

original: The Shangqing School of Supreme Clarity, the Quanzhen School of Complete Perfection and Zhengyi Dao the Way of Orthodox Unity are all very prominent schools, which should I follow to become a better [Root.GetManWoman]?
translation: 上清派、全真派和正一道都是十分显赫的学派，为了成为一个更好的[Root.GetManWoman]，我又该追随哪一派呢？

original: Zhengyi, to strengthen myself with spells and magic!
translation: 正一，用符咒与法术强化自己！

original: Quanzhen, to pursue perfection through discipline!
Shangqing, to infuse my spirit with wisdom!

translation: 重新谈判互不侵犯条约：

original: This is the current §YInfluence§! of the $SOCIETY|Y$.

To the clever [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I have considered your offer together with my closest advisors, and I am afraid to say I cannot accept these terms. [selling_province.GetName] is a fine county, but I think you will agree that the benefits of granting it to me peacefully far outweigh the sum of gold you request.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致睿智的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]：
我与我亲密的顾问考虑了你的提议，恕我不能接受。[selling_province.GetName]是块宝地，你应当明白将它和平转交给我的好处远远大于你所要求的黄金。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Dressed in a white gown, [From.GetFirstName] screams hysterically as [From.GetSheHe] is bound to the stake emerging from the piled firewood. Frenzied [Root.GetDWMagicianPlural] scream praise to [Root.GetDWDevil] as you approach with your blazing torch held high. At the appointed hour you throw the torch into the oil-soaked wood, the fire roars to life, and suddenly [From.GetFirstName]'s earlier screams seem quiet in comparison.
translation: 穿着一身白色长袍的[From.GetFirstName]歇斯底里的尖叫着，因为[From.GetSheHe]被绑在火刑架上。当你高举着炽热的火把接近时，[Root.GetDWMagicianPlural]尖叫的更恐怖了，声音似乎能传到[Root.GetDWDevil]。但当你准时将火把扔进浸过油的木堆中时，冲天的火光让一切都安静了下来，[From.GetFirstName]之前的尖叫飘散在风里，了无踪迹。

original: I will find the White Bear.
I will find the White Tiger.
I will find the White Lion.

The [Root.GetName] is experiencing a period of internal stability, and trade with the East is profitable. Without any large-scale disasters or powerful enemies prosperity is able to spread, and the military might of China stands ready to defend both its own wealth and its loyal tributaries.
translation: [Root.GetName]正处于内部安定时期，且与东方的贸易颇有利益。因为没有大规模灾难或是强大的敌人，繁荣得以传播，而中国的军事力量也准备好保卫其财富以及它忠诚的朝贡国们。

original: Civil unrest runs rampant in the [Root.GetName], and it has thrown the trade routes with the East into disarray. China's armies are occupied internally in an attempt to keep the peace, and unless the unrest is quelled soon a full-blown civil war may well erupt at any moment.
translation: 一场动乱在[Root.GetName]国内蔓延。它已经把丝绸之路的东段破坏了。为了维持秩序，中国军队已经全部被调回本土，除非动乱平息，不然一场全面内战随时可能爆发。

original: Civil war has erupted in the [Root.GetName], and trade with the East suffers as a result. The Empire's armies are arrayed against one another, and the ruling dynasty itself is threatened. Intrepid generals may well seek their fortune in the West, beyond China's borders.
translation: [Root.GetName]爆发了一场内乱，导致东方贸易受挫。帝国的军队陷入内讧，统治的王朝也受到威胁。强大的将军或许会越过中国边界，前往西方寻求财富。

original: The Mongol hordes of the north pour into China. The mighty Chinese armies are occupied with their desperate defense of the Empire, and the fighting has greatly disrupted trade as well as caused a mass exodus of refugees. Scions of the current dynasty may well flee westward if the war goes poorly enough.
translation: 北方的蒙古部族侵入了中国，强大的中国军队正殊死防御着帝国，这场战争极大地扰乱了贸易秩序，同时导致了大量的难民流离失所。当战况恶劣时，正统王朝的后裔可能向西流亡。

original: A terrible disease wracks the [Root.GetName], leaving thousands lying dead in its wake. Trade has ground to a halt as the Chinese economy has been forced to its knees, and even the Empire's armies have been decimated to but a shadow of their former glory.
translation: 一场可怕的大瘟疫在[Root.GetName]爆发了，它首次出现就带走了成千上万的人命。中国的经济已经陷入崩溃，贸易也停滞了，甚至就连帝国的军队也遭受了毁灭性的打击，无力对抗全盛时期的敌人了。

original: The [Root.GetName] has reached untold power and wealth. As China flourishes, the trade routes with the East bring not only valuable goods in previously unheard-of quantities, but also rich and abundant examples of Chinese culture. An Emperor of China in this Golden Age may well rightfully consider [Root.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself] the [Root.Ruler.GetMasterMistress] of the known world.
translation: [Root.GetName]已经得到了无穷无尽的力量和财富。随着中国的繁荣昌盛，东方的贸易路线不止带来了前所未闻的珍贵商品，还带来了富有和充裕的华夏文明的例证。在这个黄金时代中国皇帝会更加认为[Root.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself]是这个已知世界的[Root.Ruler.GetMasterMistress]。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has decreed that it is in the [offmap_china.GetName]'s interests that a new, vibrant city be established on the trade routes to the West. This would be a feat worthy of favourable trade agreements, as well as [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] personal notice.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]已经降下旨意，在西方贸易路线上建立一座富有活力的新城市，于[offmap_china.GetName]大有裨益。立此大功可以换得有利的的贸易协定，当然还有[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]垂青。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has decreed that it is in the [offmap_china.GetName]'s interests to bestow favourable trade agreements on the [Root.GetTitle] most worthy of such association. They may well also find themselves blessed with [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] personal appreciation.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]已经降下旨意，赐给[Root.GetTitle]有利的贸易协定。能得到[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]青睐，他们也会感激涕零。

original: I doubt that failure is an option...
translation: 我怀疑失败也是一种选择……

original: To win the competition you must be the first to construct a new city holding in a Silk Road province before five years have passed.
translation: 要想赢得比赛，你必须是五年内第一个在丝绸之路建成一个新的城市的人。

original: To win the competition you must have the highest §YPrestige§! among all competitors after five years have passed.
translation: 要赢得这场竞赛，你必须在五年之后拥有所有参与者中最高的§Y威望§!！

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice your efforts in the creation of the city of [trade_competition_new_city.GetName]. To show [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] appreciation [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] has decided to grant you preferential treatment in trade.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]很高兴看到您在建造[trade_competition_new_city.GetName]城中付出的的努力。为了表达[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]欣赏，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap]决定在贸易中赐予你优惠待遇。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice [trade_competition_city_winner.GetName]'s efforts in the creation of the city of [trade_competition_new_city.GetName]. Your own failure to encourage trade with the West, however, have not gone unnoticed either.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]很高兴看到[trade_competition_city_winner.GetName]在建造[trade_competition_new_city.GetName]时付出的巨大努力。同样你在促进与西方贸易上的失败我们也有所了解。

original: Ah, to be recognized by the Emperor!
I must try harder next time.
translation: 我下次一定要再努力一点。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most displeased to find no efforts have been made to erect a new center of trade upon the trade routes with the West. [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] disappointment with his chosen [Root.GetTitle]s is great, and this failure will not soon be forgotten.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]对与西方建造在贸易路线上一个新的贸易中心没有进展龙颜大怒。对选择[Root.GetTitle][offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]失望溢于言表，这个失败不会被很快遗忘。

original: Pleasant rumors from the [offmap_china.GetName] have reached my court that I am being considered the most worthy among those competing for the Emperor's favor.
translation: 来自[offmap_china.GetName]的令我愉快的传闻来到了我的宫廷，我被认为是争取皇帝青睐的最有价值的角色之一。

original: Rumors from the [offmap_china.GetName] have reached my court that [trade_competition_halftime_winner.GetTitledName] is being considered the most worthy among those competing for the Emperor's favor.
translation: 我的宫廷收到了来自[offmap_china.GetName]的传言，说[trade_competition_halftime_winner.GetTitledName]从诸多竞争者中脱颖而出，得到了皇帝的垂青。

original: Continue having the highest prestige of all contestants to win the competition.
translation: 继续拥有在所有参赛者中最高的威望以赢得比赛。

original: I must work harder to be deserving...
translation: 我必须更加努力地工作以获得应得的回报。

original: Obtain a higher prestige than the other contestants to win the competition.
translation: 获得比其他选手更高的威望以赢得比赛。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice the esteem you command among your peers. To show [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] appreciation [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] has decided to grant you preferential treatment in trade.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]很高兴看到您在同行中受到的尊敬。为了表达[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]欣赏，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap]决定在贸易中赐予你优惠待遇。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice the esteem [trade_competition_city_winner.GetName] commands among [trade_competition_city_winner.GetHerHis] peers. Your own lacking prestige, however, has not gone unnoticed either.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]很高兴看到[trade_competition_city_winner.GetName]在同行中受到的尊敬，至于你的声名不显我们同样了然于心。

original: This character is well-versed in the Way of the Dragon, focusing on perfecting their authority over the troops, as well as embodying the centralized, decisive command over a battlefield, unfettered by overbearing advisors or delegation of command to others.
translation: 这个角色深谙龙韬，关注对部队的绝对控制以及在战场上贯彻统一决策的命令，不受傲慢顾问和他人钦使的约束。

original: This character is well-versed in the Way of the Dog, focusing on the training, supply, and management of forces made up of various types, and how to use them in a determined, concentrated attack when the enemy is weakest.
translation: 这个角色深谙犬韬，关注训练、补给和多兵种部队的管理，并用他们在敌人最弱的时刻给予致命一击。

original: This character is well-versed in the Way of the Tiger, focusing on speed, maneuvrability, misdirection, and when and how best to commit troops of various types in a decisive engagement to defeat the enemy.
translation: 这个角色深谙虎韬，主要注重速度、机动性、误导，以及在决定性交战中何时何法投入各种部队，以击败敌人。

original: This character is well-versed in the Way of the Leopard, focusing on how best to use the terrain to one's advantage, and how to use novel siege weapons to defeat a fortified enemy.
translation: 这个角色非常熟悉豹韬，专注于如何最好地利用地形，以及如何使用新奇的攻城武器来击败坚不可摧的敌人。

original: By creating the Holy Order Followers of Arjuna, all [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers will be able to hire them and use them in the struggle against those religions that would do us harm.
translation: 创建阿周那军众，所有[Root.Religion.GetName]的统治者将有权雇佣他们并投入对那些对我们有害的宗教的战争！

original: The Holy Order §YFollowers of Arjuna§! is established.
translation: 骑士团§Y阿周那军众§!已经成立。

original: By creating the Holy Order Chosen of Ashoka, all [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers will be able to hire them and use them in the struggle against those religions that would do us harm.
translation: 创建无忧王精兵，所有[Root.Religion.GetName]的统治者都将有权雇佣他们并投入对那些对我们有害的宗教的战争！

original: The Holy Order §YChosen of Ashoka§! is established.
translation: 骑士团§Y无忧王精兵§!已经成立。

original: By creating the Holy Order Bulls of Rishabha, all [Root.Religion.GetName] rulers will be able to hire them and use them in the struggle against those religions that would do us harm.
translation: 创建勒沙婆神牛军，所有[Root.Religion.GetName]的统治者都将有权雇佣他们并投入对那些对我们有害的宗教的战争！

original: The Holy Order §YBulls of Rishabha§! is established.
translation: 骑士团§Y勒沙婆神牛军§!已经成立。

original: The [leader_of_arjuna.Religion.GetName] faith is one of the oldest religions in the world, yet nothing will last forever unless it is defended. Therefore, a great effort has been made to establish a new holy order. They call themselves the [leader_of_arjuna.PrimaryTitle.GetName].\n\nLead by a fearless warrior named [leader_of_arjuna.GetFirstName], they swear to answer the call of all devoted followers of [leader_of_arjuna.Religion.GetHighGodName]. To help them in their wars against the infidels and prove themselves worthy of the name Arjuna.
translation: 虽然[leader_of_arjuna.Religion.GetName]信仰是世界上最古老的宗教之一，但若无人守护它就不能万古长存。为此，一个新的骑士团在万般努力后成立了。他们自称[leader_of_arjuna.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。\n\n在一位名为[leader_of_arjuna.GetFirstName]的无畏战士的带领下，他们发誓回应所有[leader_of_arjuna.Religion.GetHighGodName]的追随者的召唤，帮助他们对抗异教徒并证明自己配得上阿周那的名号。

original: Praise [Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]! They shall lead us to victory!
translation: 赞美[Root.Religion.GetRandomGodName]！他们将带领我们取得胜利！

original: They might be necessary if we are to defend our faith.
translation: 我们需要他们捍卫我们的信仰。

original: Ha! As if such rabble would save them!
translation: 哈！好像这帮乌合之众能救得了他们一样！

original: To safeguard the teachings of Buddha, many have banded together to form a new holy order. They have named themselves the [leader_of_ashokas.PrimaryTitle.GetName], after the great emperor of the same name.\n\nGuided by the leadersip of a cunning warrior known as [leader_of_ashokas.GetFirstName], the order vow to be the sword of any [leader_of_ashokas.Religion.GetName] ruler struggling against foreign conquerors and turn the tide of battle.
translation: 为了守护佛陀留下的教义，很多信徒团结在一起组建了新的骑士团，他们自称[leader_of_ashokas.PrimaryTitle.GetName]，以伟大的皇帝的名字来命名。\n\n在一位狡猾的战士[leader_of_ashokas.GetFirstName]领导下，这个教团发誓成为[leader_of_ashokas.Religion.GetName]统治者抵御外来侵略者的利剑，从而扭转战局。

original: Followers of the [leader_of_rishabha.Religion.GetName] faith have always followed the central tenet of showing respect to all living creatures and to refrain from violence. But even the most peaceful of men must occasionally go to war.\n\nAs such, a new order has been founded, named the [leader_of_rishabha.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. They swear loyalty to all [leader_of_rishabha.Religion.GetName] rulers against those who would do them harm. A most devout [leader_of_rishabha.GetManWoman], named [leader_of_rishabha.GetFirstName], has pledged [leader_of_rishabha.GetHerselfHimself] to undertake the leadership of the order to preserve their way of life.
translation: [leader_of_rishabha.Religion.GetName]的信徒一直遵循着对所有生物的尊重和克制的中心原则，但即使是最和平的人也必须为自己的权利斗争。\n\n因此，一个新的骑士团已经建立，名曰[leader_of_rishabha.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。他们向所有的[leader_of_rishabha.Religion.GetName]统治者宣誓效忠并进攻所有想要伤害他们的人。一位最虔诚的[leader_of_rishabha.GetManWoman][leader_of_rishabha.GetFirstName]已承诺，[leader_of_rishabha.GetHerselfHimself]将会为了维护他们的生存之道承担起领导的责任。

original: Does NOT have the temporary flag $FLAG|Y$
$TRIBUTARY|Y$ is no longer a tributary of $SUZERAIN|Y$ because $UNLANDED|Y$ is now unlanded.
translation: 因为$UNLANDED|Y$已经没有土地，$TRIBUTARY|Y$不再是$SUZERAIN|Y$的朝贡国。

original: $TRIBUTARY|Y$ is no longer a tributary of $SUZERAIN|Y$ because $CHAR|Y$ became a vassal of $LIEGE|Y$.
translation: 因为$CHAR|Y$成为了$LIEGE|Y$的封臣，$TRIBUTARY|Y$不再是$SUZERAIN|Y$的朝贡国。

original: $TRIBUTARY|Y$ is now a tributary of $SUZERAIN|Y$ due to the inheritance between $DEAD_CHAR|Y$ and $INHERITOR|Y$
translation: 因为$DEAD_CHAR|Y$为$INHERITOR|Y$所继承，$TRIBUTARY|Y$现在是$SUZERAIN|Y$的朝贡国了。

original: $TRIBUTARY|Y$ is no longer a tributary of $SUZERAIN|Y$ because $DEAD_CHAR|Y$ died
translation: 由于$DEAD_CHAR|Y$的去世，$TRIBUTARY|Y$不再是$SUZERAIN|Y$的朝贡国

original: $TRIBUTARY|Y$ is no longer a tributary of $SUZERAIN|Y$ because $DEAD_CHAR|Y$ died
translation: 由于$DEAD_CHAR|Y$的去世，$TRIBUTARY|Y$不再是$SUZERAIN|Y$的朝贡国

original: As the titles of $DEAD_CHAR|Y$ have passed to a vassal of a $NEW_TOP_LIEGE|Y$, $SUZERAIN|Y$ is no longer able to claim tribute from them.
translation: 由于$DEAD_CHAR|Y$的头衔传到了$NEW_TOP_LIEGE|Y$的封臣手中，$SUZERAIN|Y$无法再让他们朝贡了。

original: §YSuzerain§! didn't honor a defensive §YCall to Arms§!
translation: §Y宗主§!没有响应防御性的§Y战争召唤§!

original: §YSuzerain§! didn't honor a defensive §YCall to Arms§! against their allies
translation: §Y宗主§!没有响应针对他们盟友的防御性的§Y战争召唤§!
$ENEMYLIST$。\n\n拒绝将会花费我们 §R$PRESTIGE$§! 威望。

original: $ENEMYLIST$.\n\nDeclining would cost us §R$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige, §RWILL break our Alliance§! with $ACTOR|Y$ and §RWILL make us an Alliance Breaker§! in the eyes of the world.
translation: $ENEMYLIST$。\n\n拒绝将会花费我们 §R$PRESTIGE$§! 威望，并且与$ACTOR|Y$之间§R将会解除同盟§!，而且全世界都§R会认为我们是背离盟约者§!。

original: $ENEMYLIST$.\n\nDeclining would cost us §R$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige, and §RWILL break our Alliance§! with $ACTOR|Y$.
translation: $ENEMYLIST$。\n\n拒绝将会花费我们 §R$PRESTIGE$§! 威望，并且与$ACTOR|Y$之间§R将会解除同盟§!。

original: $ENEMYLIST$.\n\nDeclining would cost us §R$PRESTIGE$§! Prestige, and our Tributary $ACTOR|Y$ §RWILL break free§!.
translation: $ENEMYLIST$.\n\n拒绝将会花费我们 §R$PRESTIGE$§! 威望，而且我们的朝贡国$ACTOR|Y$ §R将会脱离朝贡§!。

original: \n§RWe WILL LOSE the following Tributaries§!, as they are on the other side of the war: $TRIBUTARIES$.
translation: \n§R我们将失去以下朝贡国§!，因为他们站在战争的另一方：$TRIBUTARIES$。

original: \n§RWe WILL BREAK the following Alliances§! as they are on the other side of the war: $ALLIES$.
translation: \n§R我们将打破以下盟约§!，因为他们在战争的另一边： $ALLIES$。

original: \n($TRIBUTARY_TYPE$ cannot declare war on each other)
We are too weak to rebel yet
Are you sure you want to §Rdestroy§! §Y[From.GetName]§!? It will be forever lost, and removed from §Y[This.GetBestName]§!'s §YTreasury§!
translation: 你确定要§R摧毁§!§Y[From.GetName]§!吗？它将永远消失，并从§Y[This.GetBestName]§!的§Y宝库§!中移除。

original: The new $ARTIFACT|Y$ $CHARACTER|Y$ received was destroyed because they already had one.
translation: $CHARACTER|Y$获得的新$ARTIFACT|Y$被摧毁了，因为他们已经有了一个。
宝物在继承过程中被损坏
多个宝物在继承过程中被损坏

original: During the transfer of power, $CHARACTER$ lost their $ARTIFACT$ and others\nFull List: $FULL_LIST$
translation: 在交接权力时，$CHARACTER$失去了他们的$ARTIFACT$及其它物品。\n清单：$FULL_LIST$

original: Khurmazta (Zarvana) is syncretic form of Zoroastrianism which was practiced among the Sogdians. It mixes Zoroastrianism with Hinduism, Buddhism and various pagan religions. Aside from Khurmazta, lesser deities such as Weshparkar, God of Wind, are worshipped and made offerings, usually in form of small statues.
translation: 胡天派是粟特人所信奉的祆教混杂形式。它融合了祆教、印度教、佛教和多种原始多神教。除了胡天神（诸神之王）外，次级神灵如风神维什帕卡，通常以小雕像的样式也受到崇拜与供奉。

original: §Y*§! Rulers may select a lesser deity to honor
translation: §Y*§! 统治者需要选择崇拜一个守护神

original: You can choose a personal patron from among the many lesser deities of Zarvanan faith.
translation: 你可以在察宛信仰的亚神中选择一个作为你的守护神。

original: Desert enviroment requires hardy mounts and equally hardy riders to control them. In times of war, these warriors provide vital cavalry support to a tribal ruler.
translation: 沙漠环境需要强壮的坐骑以及同样强壮的骑手去控制它们。在战争时期，这些战士们为部落领主提供重要的骑兵支援。

original: These stables provide a ruler with a cadre of mobile mounted troops, ideally suited for skirmish warfare.
translation: 这些马厩为领主提供一只精英级别的马上机动部队，非常适合小规模的冲突战斗。

original: Call forth warriors to defend the Miaphysite faith.
translation: 召集战士来保卫基督合性派信仰。

original: Form the Order of Saint Anthony

As the world is plunged into a period of holy wars, [From.GetTitledName] has called forth the greatest warriors of the land to defend the Patriarch of Alexandria. This newly formed order of Saint Anthony will safeguard the Miaphysite faith against all heathens.
translation: 由于世界陷入了圣战的时代，[From.GetTitledName]召集了这片土地最伟大的战士们来保卫亚历山大牧首。最新成立的圣安东尼骑士团会保卫基督合性派信仰，抵抗所有异教徒。

original: The Order of Saint Anthony is formed
translation: 圣安东尼骑士团成立了

original: Armies can attempt to take besieged Holdings by storm if the Fort Level is lower than 6.
translation: 如果围攻中的领地要塞等级低于 6，军队可以尝试强攻。

original: Armies can always attempt to take besieged Holdings by storm.
translation: 军队随时可以尝试采取强攻攻取领地。

original: Armies cannot take besieged Holdings by storm.
translation: 军队无法采取强攻攻取领地。

original: Not possible to Assault Holdings with a Fort Level of $LEVEL|Y$ or above
translation: 不能攻击要塞等级在 $LEVEL|Y$ 或以上的领地

original: Call forth warriors to defend Nestorian faith.
translation: 召集勇士们守护聂斯脱里派信仰。

original: Form the Order of Saint Addai

As the world is plunged into a period of holy wars, [From.GetTitledName] has called forth the greatest warriors of the land to defend the Nestorian Patriarch. This newly formed order of Saint Addai will safeguard the Nestorian faith against all heathens.
translation: 在这个风起云涌的时代，大圣战正在酝酿。[From.GetTitledName]召集了全国最精锐的勇士，来保卫我们的聂斯脱里派信仰。这支全新的军队被命名为圣亚戴骑士团，他们将迎着异教徒的刀剑，为信仰而战。

original: The Order of Saint Addai is formed

Manichaeism is a Gnostic religion founded by the alleged Prophet Mani who was put to death by Sassanid Shahanshah Bahram I in 277 A.D. His 'Religion of Light' incorporated elements of Christianity, Zoroastrianism, Buddhism and Gnosticism. In the game, Manichaeism is regarded as Zoroastrian heresy with its own special mechanics. The formal head of the religion is Yamag, who normally resides in Samarkand.
translation: 摩尼教是由所谓的先知摩尼所创立的诺斯底主义宗教，他于公元277年被萨珊王朝万王之王巴赫拉姆一世处决。他的「光之宗教」综合了基督教、祆教、佛教和诺斯底主义的元素。在游戏中，摩尼教被认为是祆教的异端，教首被称为阎默，通常定驻于撒马尔罕。

original: As the age of Crusades and renewed Jihad looms, it is your duty to call forth warriors to defend the Manichean faith.
translation: 随着十字军远征和新吉哈德时代到来，你有责任召集勇士们守卫摩尼教信仰。

original: Hold a Bema festival to celebrate life of the prophet Mani.
translation: 举办庇麻节来纪念先知摩尼的生平。

original: Bema is the most important religious event for us Manicheans. It is held in honor of the Prophet Mani and his suffering at the hands of Shahanshah Shapur I. During vernal equinox, we gather to remember the deeds of our prophet.
translation: 庇麻节是我们摩尼教最重要的宗教活动，是为了纪念先知摩尼，他在萨珊王朝沙普尔一世的支持下传播他的宗教。在春分时节，我们聚集在一起，缅怀先知的事迹。

original: You have been invited to join your liege, [From.GetTitledFirstName], at the Bema feast [From.GetSheHe] is hosting this year. This ritual dinner is held during vernal equinox and involves remembering the life and death of our Prophet Mani.
translation: 你的君主[From.GetTitledFirstName]邀请你参加今年由[From.GetSheHe]举办的庇麻节。仪式盛宴举行于春分时节，主题是缅怀先知摩尼的生平事迹。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has refused your invitation to the Bema festival, claiming [From.GetSheHe] has other plans.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]拒绝了你关于庇麻节的邀请，[From.GetSheHe]声称有其他的计划。

original: The festival begins. The five-stepped altar has been covered in precious fabrics. Guests have fasted before the festival to purify themselves for the holy occasion. As the Mahistan leading the ceremony kneels in prayer, everyone else does the same and bows their heads.
translation: 仪式开始了。这座五层台阶的祭坛上覆盖着珍贵的布料，宾客们在仪式前禁食，使自己在这神圣的场合保持洁净。一名默奚悉德主持仪式，跪下祈祷，其他人也跟着照做，低头致敬。

original: Bema goes on for a long time, with prayers, remembrance of Mani's deeds and studying of the holy books. All those in attendance feel humbled by the wisdom of our Prophet. Truly, Mani, the Seal of the Prophets, was a blessing for all mankind.
translation: 庇麻仪式进行了很长一段时间，祈祷、缅怀摩尼的事迹、学习经典。在先知的智慧面前，所有参与者都表现得谦虚谨慎。诚然，摩尼带来的启示，是全人类的福分。

original: The Bema lasts well into the night, but all good things must end. You return home to celebrate the rest of Passover, but you and most of the other guests seem to agree that the Bema dinner was well worth the trip.
translation: 庇麻节持续到深夜，但凡事终有结束，美好的事情也不例外。你回到住处去庆祝这个送魂归天节的剩余部分，你和其他大多数客人达成了共识，参加庇麻节晚宴是一趟值得的旅行。

original: §LChinese Emperors have varying interests and tastes. This has a big impact on all actions when trying to gain the Emperor's Grace. The Emperor takes note both of your own qualities (e.g. Culture) and those of your specific offering (e.g. a Concubine)...§!
translation: §L天子有着不同的兴趣和品味。这对所有试图获取皇恩的的行为有着很大的影响。天子会同时关注你的特质（例如文化）和你的某个贡品（例如侍妾）……§!

original: The current Imperial Dynasty is $DYNASTY|Y$, of $CULTURE|Y$ origins.
translation: 现在的皇朝是$DYNASTY|Y$，出自$CULTURE|Y$文化。

original: Various events may occur for both sides during sieges.
translation: 围攻期间攻防双方都有可能发生各种事件。

original: No regular siege events may occur for either side.
translation: 任何一方都不会出现常规围攻事件。

original: Siege events may affect only the defenders.
translation: 围攻事件仅可能影响防御方。

original: Plotting to kill other players or their close relatives is disabled.
translation: 禁止密谋暗杀其他玩家或他们的近亲。

original: Players can use all Invasion Casus Bellis freely.
translation: 玩家可以自由使用所有入侵宣战理由

original: All Invasion Casus Bellis except Prepared Invasions and those granted by a Religious Head are disabled for players.
translation: 除了准备入侵及宗教领袖所给予的外，所有入侵宣战理由对玩家不可使用。

original: Players can freely Press the Claims of other characters.
translation: 玩家能自由索取其他人的宣称。

original: Players cannot Press the Claims of other characters.
translation: 玩家不能索取其他角色的宣称。

original: Players can only Press Duchy or lower Claims of other characters.
translation: 玩家只能对其他角色索取公爵级或者更低级的宣称。

original: Players are alerted about Childhood and Education Focuses for all children at court.
translation: 玩家将收到宫廷中所有孩子的童年与教育重心的选择提醒。

original: Players are alerted about Childhood and Education Focuses for close relatives of their own dynasty.
translation: 玩家将收到关于他们家族近亲的童年和教育重心的选择提醒。

original: Players are only alerted about their own character's and their primary heir's Childhood and Education Focuses.
translation: 玩家只会收到自己的角色和主要继承人的童年和教育重心的选择提醒。

original: Invite your vassals to celebrate the Sadeh festival.
translation: 邀请你的封臣来庆祝撒答节。

original: According to legend, Persian king Hushang discovered the secret of fire in the hallowed past and brought it to benefit all people. We Mazdans celebrate this with the 'Jashn-e-Sadeh' festival. It is held to honor fire and to defeat the forces of darkness, frost, and cold.
translation: 根据传说，波斯王胡珊阁发现了火的秘密并将其拿去造福人类。我们通过「迦辛撒答节」纪念此事。举办它同时也为了赞美火并抵御黑暗，寒冷和野兽的力量。

original: Your liege, [From.GetTitledName], has sent you an invitation to a Jashan-e-Sadeh festival, so that the whole realm might celebrate the glory of fire and wish for the return of spring!
translation: 你的领主，[From.GetTitledName]，寄给你一张参加迦辛撒答节的请帖，这个节日是为了崇拜火焰的伟大并祈求春天来临。

original: Your vassal, [From.GetTitledName], has refused your invitation to the Sadeh festival...
translation: 你的封臣，[From.GetTitledName]，拒绝了你的撒答节邀请……

original: A festive mood is in the air! Bonfires are being built near the temples and lakes, fathers have taken their sons to gather wood for the pyres, while the women prepare food for the festival.
translation: 空气里弥漫着节日的气息！篝火被架设在靠近寺庙和湖的地方，父亲带着儿子收集木材来建设柴堆，同时妇女们为了节日正准备着佳肴。

original: Whoever does not give a branch, may God not grant their wish!
translation: 那些不愿给出树枝的人，愿主拒绝他们的愿望！

original: All is ready for the Jashn-e-Sadeh. The temples are full of worshippers, people gather wood for the fires and a festive mood is growing.
translation: 所有关于撒答节的一切都准备好了。庙里充满了信徒，人们为火焰收集了木材，节日气氛正在变浓。

original: I must make sure bring some wood too
translation: 我必须确保也带些木头

original: A group of priests carry the sacred fire to the throne room. Your vassals follow them and are directed to their seats by servants.
translation: 一群祭司把圣火带到正殿王座。你的封臣们会跟随他们并被仆人安排到各自的位置上。

original: Let us celebrate the glory of Ohrmazd!
translation: 让我们庆贺奥尔马兹德的荣耀！

original: A group of Mobads has brought forth a sacred fire from a nearby temple. You and other guests follow them to your liege's feast hall and take your designated seats in the banquet table.
translation: 一众穆贝德祭司从附近的寺庙带来了圣火。你和其他客人跟从他们前往你的领主的宴会厅，你坐在宴桌旁一个指定的座位上。

original: The celebrations are finally over. You have feasted on bountiful food while outside the bonfires have burned out, having successfully driven away the demons of frost and cold. Soon the light of summer shall be upon us!
translation: 庆典活动终于结束了。在外面篝火熊熊燃烧的时候，你已经好好的美餐一顿，成功驱赶走了霜冻和冰冷的恶魔。很快夏日的阳光就会照耀在我们身上。

original: The feast is over. Priests carry the sacred fire back to the temple while outside the bonfires have burned out, having successfully driven away the demons of frost and cold. Soon the light of summer shall be upon us!
translation: 盛宴结束了。当外面篝火熊熊燃烧的时候，祭司们将圣火带回了寺庙，成功驱赶走了霜冻和冰冷的恶魔。很快夏日的阳光就会照耀在我们身上。

original: As part of the Jashn-e-Sadeh, the Mobads bless their communities with Atash Niyayesh - the litany of fire. As a sovereign, you are expected to attend the ceremony in your capital.
translation: 作为撒答节的一部分，穆贝德祭司们以阿塔什·尼亚什，火之连祷，祝福在座的人们。作为君主，人们都期待你参加首都的庆典。

original: It is for the glory of Zurvan!
As part of the Jashn-e-Sadeh, the Mobads bless their communities with Atash Niyayesh - the litany of fire. As a guest of your liege's, you are expected to attend.
translation: 作为撒答节的一部分，穆贝德祭司们以阿塔什·尼亚什，火之连祷，祝福在座的人们。作为领主的贵客，你也被邀请参与其中。

original: It is for the glory of Zurvan!
Heathens are no match for light of Zurvan!
translation: 异教徒不配享受祖尔万之光！
穆贝德祭司们喜欢我的礼物

original: I will attend, but I won't enjoy it...
translation: 我会参加，但我不会喜欢它的……

original: I don't think my seizure inspired confidence in the people...
translation: 我认为没收不能激起人们的信心……

original: My rule is example to everyone!
translation: 我的统治是每个人的榜样！

original: The peasants should feel honored that I showed up!
translation: 农民应该对我的到来感到荣幸！

original: I shall frolic with some attractive peasants afterwards!
translation: 之后我会和一些漂亮的农民一起玩乐！

original: I will also honor Zoroaster with a poem...
translation: 我也会用一首诗歌来颂扬琐罗亚斯德……

original: I shall also go and gather Camelthorn for the fire...
translation: 我也要去采集些骆驼刺来生火……

original: This blessing shall aid me in battle!
translation: 这祝福将会在战斗中帮助我！

original: Talking with the Mobads is always fascinating.
translation: 和穆贝德祭司们交谈真是令人沉醉。

original: I think I'll mingle with the commoners...
translation: 我想我会混入平民中的……

original: This is a waste of my time...
translation: 这简直是在耽误我的时间……

original: An excellent opportunity to talk to the other lords!
translation: 一个与其他领主交谈的绝佳机会！

original: This kind of festival is quite relaxing...

§YCounty Loot§!
Tax Modifier: $PERC$
Loot Protected by Fort Level: §Y$FORT_PROT$¤§!
Max Loot: §Y$MAX_LOOT$¤§!
Possible Loot: §Y$LOOT$¤§!
translation:
§Y省份内的战利品§!
税收修正：$PERC$
因要塞等级被保护的数额：§Y$FORT_PROT$¤§!
最大劫掠数额：§Y$MAX_LOOT$¤§!
潜在的劫掠数额：§Y$LOOT$¤§!

original: §LThis value represents the amount of lootable wealth owned by the population. Hostile armies will deplete this value, which lowers the tax income until the County can recover.§!
translation: §L这个数值表示基于省份人口提供的可掠夺财富的金额，遭受掠夺时将会被洗劫一空，并降低该省份税收，直到从创伤中完全恢复。§!

original: The Educator acts as a teacher and mentor to children. By default, rulers act as Educators to all children at court. However, if there is a Teacher (Honorary Title) assigned, the Teacher will be the default Educator instead. You can also assign a specific character as the Guardian of a child. If a Guardian is assigned, the child goes to live in the same court as the Guardian, and it's not possible to declare war on someone who has a close relative child in their court.
translation: 教育者作为孩子的教师和指导者。默认情况下，统治者作为宫廷里所有孩子的教育者。然而，如果指派了教师（荣誉头衔），教师则会是默认的教育者。你也可以指定一个特定的角色作为孩子的监护人。如果指定了监护人，孩子会去和监护人住到同一个宫廷里，而且，孩子的近亲将无法向这个宫廷的主人宣战。

original: China is currently open to trade and interested in acquiring friends and tributaries within its sphere of influence.
translation: 天朝现在正在开放商路并且积极获取盟友及影响力范围内的朝贡国。

original: China has turned inward and is mostly ignoring its primitive neighbors. All actions to gain the Emperor's Grace or request boons are invalid. New Tributary states will likely not be accepted.
translation: 中华帝国已经关上了他的国门，转向内部事务，几乎完全忽略未开化的邻居们，所有想获得天子恩典或请求赏赐的行为都不可用。新的朝贡国很可能不被接受。

original: The Emperor is showing a rare interest in the rest of the world. China might aggressively seek to gain new Tributary states, or even stage a major invasion to 'pacify the West'.
translation: 天子对天下之外的世界展现出罕见的兴趣。中国也许会侵略性地寻求一个新朝贡国，甚至发动一次大入侵以「平定西域」。

original: An enormous horde of Jurchen horse warriors has descended upon China from the cold and unforgiving Northeast. The mighty Chinese armies are preoccupied with a desperate defense against the fierce invaders. The war is disrupting trade along the Silk Road and could cause a mass exodus of refugees. Should the Jurchens triumph, it is possible that scions of the current Dynasty may flee westward with the remnants of their forces.
translation: 一个拥有大量女真骑兵的巨大部族正从冰冷无情的东北南下中原。强大的中国军队正专注于防卫其这孤注一掷的猛烈入侵。这场战争破坏了沿丝绸之路的贸易，并可能造成了大量难民外逃。如果女真人胜利，那么当朝皇族后裔有可能与他们残存的军力向西流亡。

original: A new Dynasty has risen in China as the House of [FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName] has been supplanted by the House of [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]. However, the new [From.GetEmperorEmpress], [From.GetDynName], apparently seeks to pursue the same [From.Offmap.GetPolicy] Policy as [From.GetPossPronoun] predecessor. [From.GetDynName] likes [From.Offmap.GetLike] and dislikes [From.Offmap.GetDislike].
translation: 随着[FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName]朝被[From.GetOnlyDynastyName]朝取代，一个崭新的王朝在中国兴起。而这位[From.GetDynName]王朝的[From.GetEmperorEmpress]显然与[From.GetPossPronoun]前任有着同样的[From.Offmap.GetPolicy]追求。[From.GetDynName]偏好[From.Offmap.GetLike]，厌恶[From.Offmap.GetDislike]。

original: A new Dynasty has risen in China as the House of [FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName] has been supplanted by the House of [From.GetOnlyDynastyName]. The new [From.GetEmperorEmpress], [From.GetDynName], favors an [From.Offmap.GetPolicy] China, and is abandoning the [From.Offmap.GetPrevPolicy] Policy of [From.GetPossPronoun] predecessor. [From.GetDynName] likes [From.Offmap.GetLike] and dislikes [From.Offmap.GetDislike].
translation: 一个新的中国王朝建立起来了，[FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName]朝失去的天命被[From.GetOnlyDynastyName]家获得。新的[From.GetEmperorEmpress]，[From.GetDynName]更推崇[From.Offmap.GetPolicy]中国政策，因此放弃了[From.GetPossPronoun][From.Offmap.GetPrevPolicy]政策。[From.GetDynName]本人更喜欢[From.Offmap.GetLike]而讨厌[From.Offmap.GetDislike]。

original: [FromFrom.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.GetDynName], the Chinese '[FromFrom.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven', has died and been succeeded by [From.GetDynName]. Like [From.GetPossPronoun] predecessor, the new [From.GetEmperorEmpress] is known to believe in an [From.Offmap.GetPolicy] China. Apparently, [From.GetSubjectPronoun] takes a special interest in [From.Offmap.GetLike] but frowns on [From.Offmap.GetDislike].
translation: [FromFrom.GetEmperorEmpress][FromFrom.GetDynName]，上天的[FromFrom.GetSonDaughterCap]，驾崩了，[From.GetDynName]继承了皇位。而这位[From.GetEmperorEmpress]像[From.GetPossPronoun]前任一样信奉一个[From.Offmap.GetPolicy]的中国。据说[From.GetSubjectPronoun]对[From.Offmap.GetLike]有着特殊的兴趣，但对[From.Offmap.GetDislike]蹙眉不悦。

original: [FromFrom.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.GetDynName], known for [FromFrom.GetPossPronoun] [From.Offmap.GetPrevPolicy] Policy, has died and [From.GetDynName] now sits upon the Dragon Throne. It is said that [From.GetSubjectPronoun] especially appreciates [From.Offmap.GetLike] but despises [From.Offmap.GetDislike]. Unlike [From.GetPossPronoun] predecessor, the new [From.GetEmperorEmpress] is known to favor the idea of an [From.Offmap.GetPolicy] China.
translation: 以[FromFrom.GetPossPronoun][From.Offmap.GetPrevPolicy]政策闻名的[FromFrom.GetEmperorEmpress][FromFrom.GetDynName]业已驾崩，由[From.GetDynName]继承大统。据说[From.GetSubjectPronoun]十分欣赏[From.Offmap.GetLike]，但厌恶[From.Offmap.GetDislike]。不同于[From.GetPossPronoun]前任，这位新[From.GetEmperorEmpress]以其[From.Offmap.GetPolicy]的治国方针而闻名。

original: An Expansionist [From.GetEmperorEmpress]? This could get ugly...
translation: 一个扩张主义的[From.GetEmperorEmpress]？这可不是件好事……

original: China has abandoned its [FromFrom.GetPrevPolicy] ways and is now open to trade and business as usual.
translation: 中国现在放弃了[FromFrom.GetPrevPolicy]的政策并如往常一样开放商路。

original: China has gone from [FromFrom.GetPrevPolicy] to Isolationist. The [FromFrom.Ruler.GetSonDaughterCap] of Heaven, [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName], is turning [FromFrom.Ruler.GetPossPronoun] back on the barbarian world that surrounds China's perfection in order to [GetChinaIsolationPastime].
translation: 中国已从[FromFrom.GetPrevPolicy]转向闭关锁国。中华帝国的皇帝[FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]为了[GetChinaIsolationPastime]，已对围绕着中土的蛮夷关闭了边境。

original: The great [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] of China has suddenly taken a keen interest in the rest of the world, particularly the West. This new Expansionist Policy could bode ill for neighboring rulers who are not in China's good graces.\n\nThe Dragon is awake.
translation: 中国伟大的[FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress][FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]突然对世界的其他部分有了兴趣，特别是西方。这个新的扩张政策可能是那些还没有获得中国宠爱的周边统治者的噩兆。\n\n巨龙觉醒。

original: Time for the [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] to contemplate [FromFrom.Ruler.GetPossPronoun] navel...
focus on the imperial peach gardens
divine the secrets of the I Ching
The status quo in China is over
The period of Unrest in China has come to an end and the surviving militant peasants have returned to till their fields
translation: 中国的动荡时期已经结束，存活的兵农回家种田

original: The Great Famine in China is finally over
translation: 中国的大饥荒终于结束了

original: The Pale Rider is done reaping his terrible harvest in China and the Devastating Plague appears to have receded
translation: 苍白骑士结束了其在中国的可怕收割，毁灭性的瘟疫似乎已经消退

original: The Mongol hordes have given up on their ill-fated invasion of China
translation: 蒙古部落已经放弃了他们对中国坎坷重重的入侵

original: The Jurchen hordes have given up on their ill-fated invasion of China
translation: 女真部落已经放弃了他们对中国坎坷重重的入侵

original: The Chinese Civil War is over and the last rebel bastion has fallen
translation: 中国内战已经结束，最后一个叛军堡垒已经陷落

original: The Chinese Golden Age appears to be over
translation: 中国的盛世似乎结束了

original: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Popular uprisings have broken out in [GetRandomChineseRegion] and large groups of disgruntled peasants have taken up arms, led by [GetRandomChineseFaction]. Trade has been halved along the Silk Road and China will not be able to defend its Tributary states.
translation: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]。此起彼伏的民众暴动在[GetRandomChineseRegion]爆发，大群不满的农民在[GetRandomChineseFaction]的带领下武装起来。丝绸之路的贸易额已减半，中国再无能力保护它的朝贡国。

original: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. The Pale Rider is sowing his deadly seeds in China - a Devastating Plague has broken out in [GetRandomChineseRegion]. No goods travel along the Silk Road as the merchants fear infection. Even so, the deadly scourge is spreading quickly, and the troubles of China could soon be ours... China will not be able to assist its Tributary states.
translation: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]。苍白骑士正在中国散播死亡之种——中国的[GetRandomChineseRegion]爆发了毁灭性的瘟疫。由于商人害怕感染，丝绸之路已经停止了货物流通。即便如此，致命的灾难仍在迅速蔓延，中国的瘟疫可能很快就会传入我们境内……在瘟疫期间，中国将无法派出军队保护其朝贡国。

original: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Civil War now rocks China as a rebellious governor has managed to gather support from the local military officers in [GetRandomChineseRegion]. Silk Road profits are halved and Tributary states can use this opportunity to break free - China will not be able to assist them should they be attacked anyway.
translation: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]。中原内战已经打响，叛乱的都督得到了[GetRandomChineseRegion]当地军官的支持。丝绸之路的收益减半，朝贡国可以借此机会脱离朝贡关系——就算不脱离朝贡关系，中国现在也无力援助被攻击的朝贡国。

original: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Harmony and progress are blossoming throughout China under the benevolent rule of [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]. New types of precious silks and other wondrous new wares have started to flow along the increasingly safe routes of the Silk Road, whose wealth has doubled!
translation: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]。在[FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]的仁慈统治下，中国进入了社会和谐、经济繁荣的新时代。新种类的珍贵丝绸和美轮美奂的陶瓷开始沿着丝绸之路日益安全的路线向西方流通，丝绸之路的贸易收入翻倍了！

original: With China already suffering from the [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus], a great Mongol Horde has decided to exploit the situation and has crossed into Northern China. Will the fierce horsemen from the endless steppes manage to break the Dragon's back?
translation: 在中国已经遭受[offmap_china.GetPrevStatus]之际，一个庞大的蒙古部落决定趁势而起，现已进入中国北方。来自无尽草原的凶悍骑兵能折断巨龙的脊梁吗？

original: Right when China is experiencing an almost unprecedented [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus], a great Mongol Horde has crossed into Hebei, intent on conquering the whole empire, but the Dragon is mighty and the fierce steppe warriors are in for a titanic struggle.
translation: 正当中国正在经历一场几乎前所未有的[offmap_china.GetPrevStatus]时，一个庞大的蒙古部落已经越过边界进入河北，意图征服整个帝国，但巨龙是强大有力的，凶悍的草原勇士陷入了艰巨的斗争中。

original: After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers, the veteran armies of China finally managed to win a decisive battle near [GetRandomChineseRegion]. The Mongol Khagan was slain and his Kheshig guards slaughtered to the last man.
translation: 经过多年不断的涉及数十万的士兵的冲突与较量，久经沙场的中国军队最终还是赢得了在[GetRandomChineseRegion]附近的决战。蒙古可汗被杀，他的怯薛卫士也无人生还。

original: Beware the Dragon of the East...

After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers, the Mongols finally stand triumphant. The decisive battle was fought near [GetRandomChineseRegion]. The Mongol Khagan now sits upon the Dragon Throne as [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetDynName], founder of a new Dynasty! However, China is likely to suffer Unrest for many years to come...
translation: 经过连年的战乱不休、尸骨遍地，蒙古人成为了最后的赢家。关键战役发生在[GetRandomChineseRegion]。现在蒙古可汗[offmap_china.Ruler.GetDynName][offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]坐在龙椅上，成为一个新王朝的开创者！然而，中国很可能会在未来的许多年里遭受动荡……

original: With China already suffering from the [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus], an additional misfortune has struck the Middle Kingdom - the Jurchen tribes from the Yalu river have united under a great Khagan. A great horde of fierce horse warriors is now crossing into China from the Northeast. Clearly, this is no ordinary raid to test the Chinese defenses.
translation: 在中国经历了[offmap_china.GetPrevStatus]的浩劫后，又一道厄运打击了中原——来自鸭绿江的女真诸部已统合在一名伟大可汗的麾下。由凶悍的马上战士组成的游牧大军正穿过东北向帝国内部进发。很明显，这不是一次对帝国边境防御的普通袭扰。

original: Right when China is experiencing an almost unprecedented [offmap_china.GetPrevStatus], a great Jurchen Horde has crossed the Liao river, invading the Northeast. However, the Dragon is mighty and the fierce steppe warriors are in for a titanic struggle, for the great riches of the Divine Land are defended by a million well-equipped soldiers...
translation: 中国正在经历一场前所未有的[offmap_china.GetPrevStatus]，此刻一支强大的女真部落已经渡过辽水，直欲径取幽燕。然而神州幅员万里，民丰物赡，带甲百万，岂能轻易向蛮夷屈服？凶猛的草原战士已经陷入了一场鏖战……

original: After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers, the veteran armies of China finally managed to win a decisive battle near [GetRandomChineseRegion]. The Jurchen Khagan was slain and his elite guards slaughtered to the last man.
translation: 经过多年不断的涉及数十万的士兵的冲突与较量，久经沙场的中国军队终于在邻近[GetRandomChineseRegion]的地方成功地赢得了一场决定性的战役。女真可汗被杀，他的精锐卫队也无人生还。

original: After years of constant warfare and battles involving hundreds of thousands of soldiers, the Jurchens finally stand triumphant. The decisive battle was fought near [GetRandomChineseRegion]. The Jurchen Khagan now sits upon the Dragon Throne as [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName], founder of a new Dynasty! However, China is likely to suffer Unrest for many years to come...
translation: 经过多年不断的涉及数十万的士兵的冲突与较量，女真人终于胜利了。这场决定性的战役是在[GetRandomChineseRegion]附近进行的。现在，女真可汗[FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName][FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]坐在龙椅上，成为一个新王朝的开创者！然而，中国很可能会在未来的许多年里遭受动荡……
这些女真人听上去很危险……

original: The long period of Unrest and sporadic popular uprisings in China has turned into a full-blown Civil War! Many think that [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] is weak and has lost the Mandate of Heaven. Even as [FromFrom.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun] cowers in [GetRandomChineseRegion], massive rebel armies are on the move, attacking loyalist strongholds. Still, the rebels have not yet gathered under a single leader, and different factions are even fighting each other. Silk Road profits are halved and Tributary states can use this opportunity to break free - China will not be able to assist them should they be attacked anyway.
translation: 中国长期的动乱与零星的民众暴动已经演变成全面内战！许多人认为[FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress][FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]虚弱不堪，已经失去了天命。即使[FromFrom.Ruler.GetSubjectPronoun]逃到了[GetRandomChineseRegion]，大量的叛军仍在进军，攻击忠于朝廷的城池。然而，叛军还未被团结到一个领袖的旗帜下，仍在因为起各种内讧而甚至攻击彼此。丝绸之路的收益减半，朝贡国可以利用这次机会脱离朝贡——反正中国现在也无力援助被攻击的朝贡国。

original: The Chinese Civil War has come to an abrubt end. [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName] utterly crushed the main rebel army in [GetRandomChineseRegion], ending the long years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances between loyalists, rabble-rousing monks, dynastic pretenders and an overly ambitious governor. Things are slowly returning to normal in the Middle Kingdom and the Silk Road is safe again.
translation: 天朝的内战戛然而止。[FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName][FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]在[GetRandomChineseRegion]击溃叛军主力，结束了多年的战乱，终止了保皇派、暴动的僧众、觊觎皇位的宗室和野心勃勃的都督间不停变换的结盟与战争。中土的情况正在逐渐正常化，丝绸之路再一次变得安全。

original: Good, I could use some new silk clothes!
translation: 太棒了，我们需要一些新的绫罗绸缎！

original: After years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances, the Chinese Civil War is finally over. The foreign dynasty has fallen and China is once more ruled by a native Han [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]. [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName], the former governor of [GetRandomChineseRegion], defeated not just the loyalist armies, but several rival rebel factions. Things are slowly returning to normal in the Middle Kingdom and the Silk Road is safe again.
translation: 经过多年扑朔迷离的战事与尔虞我诈的盟誓后，中国内战终于结束了。在前[GetRandomChineseRegion]都督将前朝顽孽和叛贼势力一并击败后，外来王朝被推翻，这位汉人[FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress][FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]坐了龙庭。中国一切逐渐归于常态，丝绸之路也再度安全无虞了。

original: After years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances, the Chinese Civil War is finally over. A warlike Taoist monk from [GetRandomChineseRegion] has emerged victorious and now rules as [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]. A man of the people, the new [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] has cleaned out the corrupt bureaucrats of the old regime. Things are slowly returning to normal in the Middle Kingdom and the Silk Road is safe again.
translation: 经过多年扑朔迷离的战事与尔虞我诈的盟誓后，中国内战终于结束了。一个来自[GetRandomChineseRegion]的善战道士获得了最终的胜利，登基为[FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress][FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]。这位出身布衣的新[FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]业已扫除了旧政权的腐败官僚。中国一切逐渐归于常态，丝绸之路也再度安全无虞了。

original: Curses, there goes my Peace Deal with China!
translation: 该死的，我和中国达成的和平协议没了！

original: After years of confusing warfare and shifting alliances, the Chinese Civil War is finally over. The old regime has fallen and [FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] [FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName], a pretender prince of the old [FromFrom.Ruler.Dynasty.GetName] has emerged victorious and now sits upon the Dragon Throne. Things are slowly returning to normal in the Middle Kingdom and the Silk Road is safe again.
translation: 经过多年扑朔迷离的战事与尔虞我诈的盟誓后，中国内战终于以旧政权垮台告终。而[FromFrom.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress][FromFrom.Ruler.GetDynName]。一位曾经的[FromFrom.Ruler.Dynasty.GetName]王子获得了胜利，坐在了龙椅上。中国的事态正在慢慢恢复正常，丝绸之路又安全了。
§Y*§! 女性可以担任间谍总管职务

translation: §Y*§! 传教效率低下\n§Y*§! 统治者无法发动圣战

original: This character is the guardian of a masterless dog who defends his home from evil spirits.
translation: 这个角色是一只无主之犬的保护者，这只狗保护他的家庭免于恶灵侵犯。

original: This character has taken in a dog into his house which defends him from evil spirits.
translation: 这个角色接纳了一只狗，这只狗将保护他免于恶灵侵犯。

original: This character has taken in a hedgehog into his house which happily in return hunts down vermin.
translation: 这个角色收养了一只刺猬，这只刺猬消灭害虫作为报答。

original: This character is the guardian of an otter which ensures the wellbeing of the realm.
translation: 这个角色是一只水獭的守护者，水獭保证了国内的稳定。

original: Confucian Bureaucracies rely on a set of strict imperial examinations to select their rulers. Candidates are tested on their knowledge of the Confucian Classics - though merit, previous achievements and recommendations from prominent aristocrats also play a major role in the selection process. Rulers tend to be very skilled stewards.
translation: 儒家官僚体系依靠一套严格的科举考试来选择他们的统治者。候选人在儒家经典知识方面接受了测试，尽管德行、先前的成就和名门望族的建议也在选择过程中起着重要的作用。统治者往往是非常熟练的管理者。

original: Can only build §YSilk Road Trade Posts§! in certain Counties along the §YSilk Road§!\n   Open the §YTrade Zones Mapmode§! to see valid Counties
translation: 只能在§Y丝绸之路§!的特定地区修建§Y丝路贸易站§!\n请打开§Y贸易区地图§!查看。

original: This is a rudimentary but effective trade office, controlling all trade that passes by the trade post.
translation: 这是一个简单但重要的贸易司，控制着通过贸易站的所有贸易往来。

original: The trade offices have been rebuilt and are now a permanent fixture on this part of the silk road.
translation: 贸易司已被重建并将作为该段丝绸之路上的一处永久设施。

original: This is an extensive network of grand trade offices, which not only controls the flow of wares in and out of the trade post, but also acts to promote the glory of their owner.
translation: 这是一个庞大的高级贸易司网络，不仅控制着贸易站商品的流动往来，还能为它的主人带来荣耀。

original: A small band of mercenaries are permanently stationed in this trade post, acting as guards and protecting the traders from outside threats.
translation: 一小群雇佣兵永久驻扎在这个贸易点上，充当护卫，保护商人免受外来威胁。

original: Plenty of mercenaries are permanently stationed in this trade post, acting as guards and protecting the traders from outside threats.
translation: 大量雇佣兵永久驻扎在这个贸易点上，充当护卫，保护商人免受外来威胁。

original: An enormous amount of mercenaries are permanently stationed in this trade post, acting as guards and protecting the traders from outside threats.
translation: 庞大的雇佣军永久驻扎在这个贸易点上，充当护卫，保护商人免受外来威胁。

original: §Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is unaffected\n§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can raise Chinese Regiments to help them in wars
translation: §Y*§! 丝绸之路带来的价值不受影响\n§Y*§! 帝国的朝贡国可以招募中国军团来帮他们打仗

original: §Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is reduced by §R25%§!\n§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Chinese Regiments to help them in wars\n§Y*§! This Status might result in a §RCivil War§!
translation: §Y*§! 丝绸之路带来的价值减少了 §R25%§!\n§Y*§! 帝国的朝贡国§R不可§!招募中国军团来帮他们打仗\n§Y*§! 这种情况可能会造成一场§R内战§!

original:
§Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is reduced by §R50%§!
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Chinese Regiments
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can Break Free without opposition from China
§Y*§! Might end with China getting a §RNew Dynasty§!, resetting all §YGrace§!
translation:
§Y*§! 丝绸之路带来的价值减少了 §R50%§!
§Y*§! 帝国的朝贡国§R无法§!招募中国军团
§Y*§! 朝贡国可以脱离朝贡体系，不必担心中国的反对
§Y*§! 内战可能会以中国的§R改朝换代§!结束，此时所有§Y皇恩§!将被重置

original:
§Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is reduced by §R50%§!
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Chinese Regiments
§Y*§! Chinese refugees might appear in your court
§Y*§! Might end with China getting a §RNew Dynasty§!, resetting all §YGrace§!
translation:
§Y*§! 丝绸之路的价值减少了 §R50%§!
§Y*§! 帝国的朝贡国§R不可§!招募中国军团
§Y*§! 中国难民可能会出现在你的宫廷
§Y*§! 当中国§R改朝换代§!后，所有§Y皇恩§!将被重置

original:
§Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is reduced by §R50%§!
§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Chinese Regiments
§Y*§! Chinese refugees might appear in your court
§Y*§! Might end with China getting a §RNew Dynasty§!, resetting all §YGrace§!
translation:
§Y*§! 丝绸之路带来的价值减少了 §R50%§!
§Y*§! 帝国的朝贡国§R不可§!招募中国军团
§Y*§! 中国避难者可能会出现在你的宫廷
§Y*§! 当中国§R改朝换代§!后，所有§Y皇恩§!将被重置

original: §Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is reduced by §R75%§!\n§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Chinese Regiments
translation: §Y*§! 丝绸之路带来的价值减少了 §R75%§!\n§Y*§! 帝国朝贡国§R不可§!招募中国军团

original: §Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is reduced by §R90%§!\n§Y*§! Imperial Tributaries can §RNOT§! raise Chinese Regiments
translation: §Y*§! 丝绸之路带来的价值减少了 §R90%§!\n§Y*§! 帝国朝贡国§R不可以§!招募中国军团

original: §Y*§! The Silk Road is §RClosed§!\n§Y*§! China will §YNOT§! declare any wars\n§Y*§! The §YSend Tribute§! and §YRequest Boon§! decisions are §RDisabled§!
translation: §Y*§! 丝绸之路现在已经§R关闭§!\n§Y*§! 中国将§Y不会§!发起任何战争\n§Y*§! §Y进贡§!和§Y请求恩赐§!的决议现在§R不可用§!

original: §Y*§! The Silk Road is §GOpen§!\n§Y*§! China might stage §YMajor Invasions§!
translation: §Y*§! 丝绸之路现在§G开放§!\n§Y*§! 中国也许会发动§Y大举入侵§!

original: I should dedicate myself to a particular deity so that I may rule more effectively. Desi would bless the realm with wealth while Parn would bring me good fortune. Nanaiya, Goddess of fertility, would ensure that my dynasty never ends.
translation: 我应该更加专注崇拜某一尊神祇，以使我的统治更为高效。戴西会保佑我的领地更为富饶，班则会给我带来好运。生育女神纳奈雅可以确保我的子嗣永远延续。

original: Choosing any of these as a personal deity would be a testament to my piety. Weshparkar, God of wind, both creates and destroys. Wishaghn, God of victory, would guide my armies in battle and Zurvan, the eternal God of time, would offer me divine wisdom.
translation: 从中挑选一个守护神是对我虔诚的证明。维什帕卡，风之神，司掌创造与毁灭。韦勒斯拉纳，胜利之神，指引我的军队。祖尔万，永恒的时间之神，授予我神圣的智慧。
§B「碧玉之龙」：§! 边界争端战争

original: All new Casus Bellis introduced in Jade Dragon can be used.
translation: 可以使用所有在「碧玉之龙」中新增的宣战理由。

original: The following Casus Bellis can NOT be used: De Jure Duchy Claim, Ducal County Conquest, Force Vassalization, Great Realm Conflict, Liberate Religion and Permanent Tributary.
translation: 无法使用以下的宣战理由：收复法理公国，统一公国，强迫臣服，伟大征服，宗教解放，永久朝贡。

original: Tributaries of China can raise a special regiment of Chinese troops to assist them in defensive wars.
translation: 作为中国的朝贡国，可以请求一支特殊的中国军团来帮助他们进行防御战争。

original: Must be the Primary Defender in a war
translation: 必须是一场战争中的主要防御方

original: Must NOT already have raised a Chinese Regiment
Must NOT have raised a Chinese Regiment in the last year
translation: 过去一年没有招募过中国军团

original: A disastrous harvest has caused the Chinese agriculture to buckle under the population. The calamity has caused most trade to cease, and even as their numbers dwindle, the [offmap_china.GetName]'s once-mighty armies have been burdened with relief efforts for the suffering.
translation: 严重的歉收导致粮食不能满足人口需求。这场灾难导致大多数贸易停止，当发生人口减少的饥荒时，[offmap_china.GetName]曾经强大的军队肩负起赈灾的工作。

original: You have recently sent a Eunuch to China, you will be able to send another one on: §Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_eunuch_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 你最近向天朝进贡过一名宦官，下一次可进贡的时间为：§Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_eunuch_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!

original: You have recently sent a Concubine to China, you will be able to send another one on: §Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_concubine_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 你最近向天朝进贡过一名侍妾，下一次可进贡的时间为：§Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_concubine_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!

original: You have recently sent a Gift to China, you will be able to send another one on: §Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_gift_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 你在近期向天朝进贡过，下一次可进贡的时间为：§Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_gift_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!

original: In an endeavor to turn us into a tributary state of the [From.Offmap.GetFullName], the [From.GetTitledName] is declaring war on us! Their army is marching towards our realm and the people of [Root.Capital.GetName] fear that we may be facing a long and bloody struggle if we are to avoid bending our knees to the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName].
translation: [From.Offmap.GetFullName]试图让我们成为朝贡国，[From.GetTitledName]向我们宣战了！他们的军队已经向我们的边界开来，如果我们不向[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]屈膝的话，[Root.Capital.GetName]的人民担心我们可能将面对长期而血腥的斗争。

original: Intending to enforce their subjugation as a tributary state of the [From.Offmap.GetFullName], the [From.GetTitledName] has declared war upon [chinese_invasion_target.GetFullName]! [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] armies are already marching towards the realm of [chinese_invasion_target.GetTitledFirstName], and it seems possible that this spells the end of [chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] independence.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]对[chinese_invasion_target.GetFullName]宣战以逼迫其成为[From.Offmap.GetFullName]的朝贡国，[From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人军队已经开始朝[chinese_invasion_target.GetTitledFirstName]境内集结，这可能会是[chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]独立地位的终结。
愿[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]保佑我们度过这一关。

original: This is our chance to prove ourselves. Let them come!
translation: 证明我们的机会到了。放他们过来！
愿这些人们的神明护佑他们。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has decreed that the fury of heaven shall reign down upon us! The Chinese armies have begun their march for our lands, and rumors of their military might are already spreading throughout our own regiments. We are soon to face the full wrath of the [From.Offmap.GetFullName].
translation: [From.GetTitledName]宣布天子的震怒将会粉碎我们！中国军队开始向我国进军，关于他们军事实力的谣言已经传遍了我们的军队。我们很快就要面对[From.Offmap.GetFullName]的熊熊怒火。

original: [From.GetTitledName] has decreed that the fury of heaven shall reign down upon [chinese_invasion_target.GetTitledName]! The Chinese armies have begun their march, and the [chinese_invasion_target.GetTitle], if not hiding out in [chinese_invasion_target.Capital.GetName], can only hope to stand tall, as [chinese_invasion_target.GetHerHis] borders are attacked with the full wrath of the [From.Offmap.GetFullName].
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已经下令对[chinese_invasion_target.GetTitledName]实行讨伐，中国的军队已经开始集结，如果[chinese_invasion_target.GetTitle]没有躲在[chinese_invasion_target.Capital.GetName]，那么当[From.Offmap.GetFullName]的熊熊怒火燃烧到[chinese_invasion_target.GetHerHis]边境时，希望他能表现得更硬气一些。

original: This is their chance to prove themselves! Fascinating!
translation: 这是他们证明自己的机会！好极了！

original: Recent events in the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName] have caused various rebel factions to rise up in and around the Middle Kingdom. One of them is led by [jurchen_invader.GetFirstName], in charge of a [jurchen_invader.Culture.GetName] tribe, descending upon the West from the mountains. Wherever [jurchen_invader.GetSheHe] goes, the countryside is left ablaze. Throughout the region, people are praying for someone to deal with the hostile raiders...
translation: 最近在[the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]发生的事件引发了举国上下各路叛军的反乱。其中之一便是统领[jurchen_invader.Culture.GetName]部落的[jurchen_invader.GetFirstName]，此人翻越群山来到了西域。[jurchen_invader.GetSheHe]所到之处无不是哀鸿遍野。人们企盼有人能解决这个凶暴的劫掠者。

original: The recent turmoil in the Middle Kingdom has left the old House of [PrevRuler.GetOnlyDynastyName] in chaos – removed from the line of succession, Prince [displaced_prince.GetFirstName] now seeks a new future, west of the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]. Rumors say that raiding and looting follow in [displaced_prince.GetHerHis] footsteps...
translation: 中原最近的动乱让[PrevRuler.GetOnlyDynastyName]王朝陷入了混乱——在被剥夺继承权之后，皇子[displaced_prince.GetFirstName]现在正向西开拓自己的势力。传言说他一路烧杀掳掠……

original: [From.GetTitledName] has sent an emissary to us, suggesting that it is time to allow the [From.Offmap.GetFullName] to become our official sovereign. As the Chinese bureaucrat idly twirls his mustache, his translator clarifies: 'It is only the natural progression of our current relationship, my [Root.GetLordLady]'.
translation: [From.GetTitledName]已经遣使而来，对我们说我们是时候向 [From.Offmap.GetFullName]称臣了。这位汉人官员轻轻捻弄着他的胡须，同时他的翻译官解释说：「以我们如今的关系这只是水到渠成罢了，[Root.GetLordLady]」。

original: We would be humbled to serve the great [From.Offmap.GetFullName].
translation: 我们将谦卑地侍奉伟大的[From.Offmap.GetFullName]。

original: [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] will not kneel without a fight!

§YEunuch Requirements§!:
Must be an adult male of great skill, OR a close relative of yours at least 12 years old
Must not hold any land
Must NOT have any of the traits: §YIncapable§!, §YInbred§!, or §YImbecile§!
translation:
§Y宦官要求§!：
必须是有卓越才能的成年男性，或者是你年满十二岁的近亲
不可持有领地
不能有以下任何特质：§Y无能§!，§Y近亲缺陷§!，或者§Y痴呆§!

original:
§YConcubine Requirements§!:
Must be a close relative of yours
Must be adult
Must be younger than 45 year old
Must NOT be married or betrothed
Must NOT have any of the traits: §YIncapable§!, §YInbred§!, §YImbecile§!
translation:
§Y侍妾要求§!：
必须是你的近亲
必须成年
必须小于45岁
不能结婚或者订婚
不能有以下任何特质：§Y无能§!，§Y近亲缺陷§!，或者§Y痴呆§!

original: §RCannot load more than one save as this will cause an OOS.\nRestart the game and rehost to choose a different save or a bookmark§!
translation: §R加载多个存档会导致OOS问题。\n重启游戏并重新建立主机以选择其它的剧本或存档§!

original: Press §GRight Click§! to open Map Mode for $OFFMAP_SHORT|Y$§G.
translation: 按§G右键§!以打开$OFFMAP_SHORT|Y$§G地图模式。

original: died in China at the hands of $KILLER$
Opens a list of the previous rulers of [Root.GetShortGenericName]
Does NOT have the Holding Modifier $MODIFIER|Y$$EXPIRY$
Does NOT have the Character Modifier $MODIFIER|Y$$EXPIRY$
Army size with allies is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y%0$ of $TARGET|Y$
Has been imprisoned for a period $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ days
Has been plotting for a period $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ months

translation: 领地内有$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ $CULTURE|Y$ 个伯爵领
领地内有$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ $RELIGION|Y$ 个伯爵领
领地内有$TITLE|Y$的$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ 个伯爵领

original: Personal Opinion difference between $FIRST|Y$ and $SECOND|Y$ is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$
Clan Sentiment difference between $FIRST|Y$ and $SECOND|Y$ is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$

translation: 共和国拥有$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ 座贸易站

original: Combat rating difference between $FIRST|Y$ and $SECOND|Y$ is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$
Max realm levy size difference between $FIRST|Y$ and $SECOND|Y$ is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$
Time since last war participation is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ days
translation: 自上次参战后已经过了$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ 天
有$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ 个生活方式特质

original: Combined max Manpower and Population is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$
translation: 人力与人口总计最大值$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$

original: Combined Manpower and Population growth is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$

translation: 有来自$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ 个不同家族的封臣

original: Number of titles of tier $TIER|Y$ held is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$
Number of titles in realm is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$
Number of titles of tier $TIER|Y$ in realm is $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$

translation: 省份可拥有$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ 个聚居地

original: Province has room for $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ more settlements
$WHO|Y$ has assigned $COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ of the honorary title $TITLE|Y$

translation: 拥有$COMPARISON$ $VALUE|Y$ 件宝物（目前拥有：$CUR|Y$）

original: Day of birth is $COMPARISON$ the $VALUE|Y$ day of the month
translation: 出生日$COMPARISON$ 该月 $VALUE|Y$ 日

original: Month of birth is $COMPARISON$ the $VALUE|Y$ month of the year
translation: 出生月$COMPARISON$ 此年 $VALUE|Y$ 月

original: Raised Army Levies will automatically start moving to the nearest of these Counties:
translation: 调集的征召兵将自动向以下最近的省份移动：

original: Raised Navy Levies will automatically start moving to the nearest of these Counties:
translation: 调集的征召船只将自动向以下最近的省份移动：

original: * Tributary provides $VALUE|Y$% of their income to their suzerain
translation: * 朝贡国向宗主交纳 $VALUE|Y$% 的月入

original: * Tributary provides $VALUE|Y$% of their reinforcements to their suzerain
translation: * 朝贡国提供$VALUE|Y$%的军队补员给他们的宗主国

original: * Suzerain's Prestige changes by $VALUE|Y$ a month
* Tributary's Prestige changes by $VALUE|Y$ a month
* Suzerain's Piety changes by $VALUE|Y$ a month
* Tributary's Piety changes by $VALUE|Y$ a month
translation: * 朝贡者的虔诚每个月改变 $VALUE|Y$

original: * Tributary relationship breaks when the suzerain dies
translation: * 当宗主去世时朝贡关系会破裂

original: * Tributary relationship breaks when the tributary dies
translation: * 当朝贡者去世时朝贡关系会破裂

original: * Tributary can call their suzerain into wars
translation: * 朝贡国可以请求宗主国加入战争

original: * Suzerain cannot refuse calls into defensive wars
translation: * 宗主不能回绝加入防御战争

original: * Suzerain can call the tributary into wars
translation: * 宗主国可以召唤朝贡国加入战争

original: * Tributary cannot refuse calls into defensive wars
translation: * 朝贡国不能拒绝加入防御战争
