* 朝贡国可以与其他朝贡国作战

original: * Suzerain can intervene in tributary infighting
translation: * 宗主国可以干涉朝贡国之间的战斗

original: * Tributary can call other tributaries into war against their suzerain
translation: * 朝贡国可以召唤其它朝贡国一同反叛宗主国

original: Is NOT in the $RELIGION_GROUP|Y$ religion group
§RFort level prevents sailing on this river§!
translation: §R因要塞等级无法在这条河上航行§!

original: A noble by the name of [escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName] came to court today seeking asylum. [escaped_chinese_noble.GetSheHeCap] claims to have escaped from China after the rest of [escaped_chinese_noble.GetHerHis] family was executed on orders of the Emperor. "Oh great [Root.GetTitle], your merciful nature is known across the land. I implore you to grant me refuge. It would be an untold kindness!"
translation: 今日一个名为[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]的贵族来到你的宫中寻求庇护。[escaped_chinese_noble.GetSheHeCap]声称自己在皇帝下令族灭[escaped_chinese_noble.GetHerHis]满门后逃出中国。「伟大的[Root.GetTitle]，你的仁德名扬四方。我恳求你同意我避难。这会是道不尽的恩情！」

original: Of course you are welcome to stay.
I dare not anger the dragon.
Was there some kind of reward on your head?
translation: 听说朝廷对你有什么悬赏？

original: You send §Y[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]§! away to avoid angering the Chinese Emperor.
translation: 你送走了§Y[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]§! 以免激怒天朝皇帝。

original: You allow §Y[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]§! to stay and secretly send a letter letting the Emperor know.
translation: 你同意§Y[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]§!留下并秘寄一书信让皇帝知晓。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\n It has come to the attention of [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] that you are harboring an enemy of the [offmap_china.GetName]. If [escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName] is not returned at once [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] will be most displeased.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]听闻你藏匿了一名[offmap_china.GetName]的敌人。如果你未及时将[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]送还，[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]将相当不悦。

original: I'm not scared of the Emperor!
translation: 他是中华天子，但我可不怕他！

original: §Y[From.Offmap.Governor.GetTitledFirstName]§! receives a letter with your reply.
§Y[From.Offmap.Governor.GetTitledFirstName]§! receives a letter with your reply.

Despite [escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]'s fears, no emissaries of the Chinese Emperor came looking for [escaped_chinese_noble.GetHerHim]. "The time has come for me to leave. I will never forget your kindness, please take this as a token of my gratitude."
translation: 尽管[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]忧心忡忡，但并没有天朝皇帝的密探前来寻找[escaped_chinese_noble.GetHerHim]。「我想我应该告辞了，您的恩德我永生难忘，请收下它作为我感激之情的见证」

original: Soon after writing to the Chinese Emperor, a very grateful emissary arrived with several guards to escort [escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName] back to the Chinese Empire. "You can't understand what they'll do to me!" screamed [escaped_chinese_noble.GetFirstName] as [escaped_chinese_noble.GetSheHe] was dragged out.
translation: 在你写信给中国皇帝后不久，一位密使带着几名卫士充满感激的来到了你的宫廷，「护送」[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]回到皇帝身边。「你永远不会知道他将会对我做什么！」，当[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFirstName]被拖走时，[escaped_chinese_noble.GetSheHe]绝望地大喊。

original: I'm sure it can't be that bad?

Soon after writing to the Chinese Emperor, an emissary arrived with several guards however [escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName] had escaped the night before! Someone must have warned [escaped_chinese_noble.GetHerHim]. All the emissary said before he left was: "The Emperor will be... displeased"
translation: 在你写信给中国皇帝后不久，一位密使带着几名卫士来到了你的宫廷。然而，[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]居然在昨夜逃走了！一定是有人警告了[escaped_chinese_noble.GetHerHim]。密使临走前只留下一句话；「皇帝陛下一定……相当不悦。」

original: [escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName] was found dead in [escaped_chinese_noble.GetHerHis] room this morning, strangled to death with a length of the finest Chinese Silk. The killer was nowhere to be found but I'm sure I know who is responsible.
translation: 今早，有人发现[escaped_chinese_noble.GetFullName]被一段品质上佳的中国丝绸勒死在位于[escaped_chinese_noble.GetHerHis]房间里。杀手不知所踪，但我确信我知道谁应当为此负责。

original: I should have known you cannot escape the Emperor.
translation: 我早该料到你无法逃离皇帝陛下。

original: was executed on the orders of the Chinese Emperor $KILLER$

I have received word from [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] that [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] is making steady progress in the search for the artifact. [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] believes [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] is closing on the end of the trail, and that [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] will soon be able to present the ancient relic to me in person.
translation: 我得到了[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]传来的消息，[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]在寻找古文物上有大进展。[relic_hunter.GetFirstName]认为[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]很快就能结束追查，[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]将亲自向我展示这个古代遗物。

original: I have received word from [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] that [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] is making steady progress in the search for the artifact.
translation: 我从[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]处得知，[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]搜索宝物的工作正在稳步进行。

original: I have received the regrettable news that [relic_hunter.GetJobTitle] [relic_hunter.GetFirstName] has experienced a setback in [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] search for the artifact, by spending a considerable amount of time following a wrong lead. [relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap] assures me [relic_hunter.GetSheHe] will redouble [relic_hunter.GetHerHis] efforts.
translation: 我刚刚收到了一个令人惋惜的报告，[relic_hunter.GetJobTitle][relic_hunter.GetFirstName]在[relic_hunter.GetHerHis]寻找古文物的任务中遇到重大挫折，耗费了大量的时间去追踪一个错误的线索。[relic_hunter.GetSheHeCap]向我保证[relic_hunter.GetSheHe]将会加大努力。

original: I ordered one of my most trusted servants to take a substantial sum of money from my personal treasury and bring it to the local [Root.GetMOBuilding]. However, as soon as [Root.GetSheHe] left the room I regretted my decision. When my servant returned I could not help myself, and immediately demanded that [Root.GetSheHe] would go and get the money back. Now everyone knows about my greed!
translation: 我让我最信任的仆人从我私人小金库里拿走了一笔数量可观的钱，给了当地的[Root.GetMOBuilding]。但在[Root.GetSheHe]离开后，我后悔了。当仆人回来时，我无法控制自己，然后我立刻让[Root.GetSheHe]把这笔钱要回去。现在所有人都知道我是个小气鬼了！

original: Looter armies only cost Maintenance if you are at War.
translation: 处于战争时，劫掠军只消耗维护费。

original: Looter armies only cost §G$PERC$%§! Maintenance if you are at Peace.
translation: 处于和平时，劫掠军只消耗 §G$PERC$%§! 维护费。

original: Certain extremely ambitious and charismatic characters can gather enough support to go off and attempt to seize kingdoms in foreign lands with a large army of adventurous warriors.
translation: 某些极度雄心勃勃又魅力十足的角色可以获得足够的支持，并且试图在一大群冒险的战士的帮助下在国外开始夺取王国。

original: The Court Tutor will serve as the default Educator for all children at court who don't have an assigned Guardian.
translation: 宫廷教师将担任宫廷中所有没有指定监护人的孩子的默认教育者。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has generously granted your request. A royal seal has been delivered denoting the status of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] as a favored state for imperial goods.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，慷慨地同意了你的请求，一枚皇家印章将会送达，来彰显[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]作为中华帝国货物受惠国的地位。

original: This character has employed a Chinese scholar-bureaucrat who assists with the administration of building projects.
translation: 这个角色聘请了一位帮助主持建筑工程的中国士大夫。

original: Desired by many for its intrinsic value and the beautiful design which displays the height of the [offmap_china.GetFullGenericName], this intricately designed dragon made out of jade by a master [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] craftsman is a very unique treasure.
translation: 这尊巧夺天工的玉制龙像出自一位[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]人巧匠，是件独一无二的珍宝，许多人垂涎它的内在价值与那彰显[offmap_china.GetFullGenericName]气度的华美设计。

original: A golden amulet in the shape of two dragons entwined together, each dragon head adorned with shining gemstones for eyes.
translation: 两只缠绕的龙的形状的金色的护身符，龙头精饰着闪闪发光的宝石眼睛。

original: An inspiring piece of art created by a renowned painter from China, it makes you feel as if you yourself were sitting in the far away lands of the Middle Kingdom.
translation: 由天朝著名画家创作的一件艺术珍品，它让你感到自己仿佛置身于遥远的中原之中。

original: A sculpture from the courts of the [offmap_china.GetFullGenericName], you can imagine the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself] walking past the sculpture approvingly and commanding one be made for [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] own use.
translation: 来自[offmap_china.GetFullGenericName]宫廷的雕塑，您可以想象[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle][offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself]赞赏地走过[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis]这尊雕像以及当初下令制作时的情形。

original: A set of traditional Chinese robes used in diplomatic functions, the wearer of these robes stands out and projects an air of power and authority.
translation: 一套在外交场合使用的传统华夏长袍，穿着这些长袍的人鹤立鸡群，展现了一种权力和权威的气度。

original: This ancient Chinese military text is composed of 13 chapters, each dealing with a different aspect of warfare. It is often considered to be the greatest collection of military tactics and strategy.
translation: 这本中国古代军事著作由13章组成，每一章都涉及到战争的不同方面。它被公认为最伟大的军事战术和战略的集合。

original: Developed thousands of years ago in ancient China, the water clock is a means of tracking time by the movement of water.
translation: 漏刻是在中国古代发展起来的，它是一种通过水的运动来监测时间的方法。

original: A twin-edged straight sword commonly used in China, the Jian is a strong and reliable weapon for any aspiring fighter.
translation: 中国常用的双刃剑，对于任何有抱负的战士来说，中式剑都是一种有力而可靠的武器。

original: One of the Five Classics and said to have been compiled by Confucius himself, The Classic of Poetry is the oldest collection of Chinese poetry in existence.
translation: 《诗经》是五经之一，据说是孔子自己编撰的，是现存最古老的中国诗歌集。

original: One morning I awake to find that an envoy from the [offmap_china.GetFullName] has arrived and wishes to speak with me. "Greetings to the [GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. [GetChineseLetterBlessing]. I am [From.GetFullName] and I come bearing treasures from the Middle Kingdom to barter and trade on behalf of [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. Does this matter interest you?"
translation: 一天早晨，当我醒来的时候，我发现一位来自[offmap_china.GetFullName]的使者抵达了我的宫廷，并有一些话想要像我传达。「向[GetChineseComplimentAdjective][Root.GetTitledFirstName]问好。我是[From.GetFullName]，我以[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitledFirstName]的名义，携带来自中原的珍贵之物前来进行贸易与交换，你对这些感兴趣吗？」

original: One morning I awake to find that [From.GetFullName], the Chinese trader I was gifted by the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle], wishes to speak with me. "Greetings to the [GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. [GetChineseLetterBlessing]. I have recently been sent some treasures from my homeland and have been granted permission to barter and trade on behalf of [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. Does this matter interest you?"
translation: 今天早上我醒来时发现，[From.GetFullName]，那个[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]赏赐给我的中国商人，想要和我聊聊。「向[GetChineseComplimentAdjective][Root.GetTitledFirstName]问好。[GetChineseLetterBlessing]。我最近从我的祖国获得了一些珍宝，并且已经获得了[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitledFirstName]的代销权和交易许可。您对这件事情感兴趣吗？」

original: The [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] is always in need of more eunuchs! Take [chinese_envoy_eunuch_target.GetTitledFirstName].
[chinese_envoy_concubine_target.GetTitledFirstName] will make an excellent concubine for the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle].
translation: [chinese_envoy_concubine_target.GetTitledFirstName]将会成为[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]的一位十分优秀的妃子。

original: We shall send plenty of gold for you to return with!
translation: 我们会送你许多黄金作为临别赠礼！

original: Your baubles and trinkets are of no importance here.
translation: 你的小玩意和饰品在这里并不重要。

original: This will not change the chance of receiving a better artifact as the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] §Glikes [This.GetLike]§! but §Rdislikes [This.GetDislike]§!
translation: 这不能改变收到更好的宝物的机率，因为[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]§G喜欢[This.GetLike]§!而§R不喜欢[This.GetDislike]§!

original: This option is available because you have a courtier to send as a §Yeunuch§!.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你有廷臣可以作为§Y宦官§!被送去。

original: This option is available because you have a courtier to send as a §Yconcubine§!.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你有廷臣可以作为§Y侍妾§!被送去。

original: [FromFrom.GetFullName] nods [FromFrom.GetHerHis] head and bows. "The [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] will be most pleased with this, you truly are a [GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle]!" As [FromFrom.GetFullName] departs I move to inspect my newly acquired [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] treasure.
translation: [FromFrom.GetFullName]点了点[FromFrom.GetHerHis]头并鞠了一躬。「[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]将会十分高兴。你不愧是[GetChineseComplimentAdjective][Root.GetTitle]！」随着[FromFrom.GetFullName]的离开我要去检查我新得到的[FromFrom.Culture.GetName]人宝物。

original: Come the evening everything proceeds exactly as I intended. The food is good, the drinks are flowing and [FromFrom.GetFullName] is smiling the entire night. The following morning, as [FromFrom.GetFullName] departs, [FromFrom.GetSheHe] points to a chest which contains a [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] treasure that [FromFrom.GetSheHe] wishes for me to have as thanks for the feast and for being such a gracious host.
translation: 当夜幕降临之际，一切都如我预料的一般发展。佳肴美酒令人迷醉，整个晚上，[FromFrom.GetFullName]的脸上都浮现着笑容。第二天早上，[FromFrom.GetFullName]离开时，[FromFrom.GetSheHe]指着一个箱子希望我收下，作为[FromFrom.GetSheHe]对盛宴和热情款待的感谢，箱子里面装有一件[FromFrom.Culture.GetName]人宝物。

original: I have always considered myself a [Root.GetManWoman] of refined taste!
translation: 我一直认为自己是一个有精致品味的[Root.GetManWoman]！

original: What a magnificent trinket, I shall certainly put it to good use!
translation: 多么精妙的小物件，我会好好使用它的！

original: It is not my fault [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is so picky!

After [chinese_guest.GetFullName]'s departure I was informed about a note in my room attached to a chest, it reads "To the [GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetTitle], I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at your court and wanted to leave you a token of appreciation on behalf of myself and the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]. I hope it pleases you."
translation: 在[chinese_guest.GetFullName]离开之后，我发现有个贴着纸条的箱子在我的房间，纸条上面写着「[GetChineseComplimentAdjective][Root.GetTitle]，我非常享受在你的宫廷里度过的时光，所以给你留下了些东西以表谢意，代表我，以及[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]。希望它能让你满意。」
必须持有至少一个§Y美德§!\n
必须持有至少两个§Y美德§!\n
必须持有至少三个§Y美德§!\n
没有§Y残暴§!、§Y愤世嫉俗§!或其它§Y恶习§!\n

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

You are most wise, I shall henceforth continue my [From.SecretReligion.GetName] practices in secret.

Your fellow servant of [From.SecretReligion.GetHighGodName],
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

您是最明智的，我今后将继续秘密奉行[From.SecretReligion.GetName]。

您的同道，[From.SecretReligion.GetHighGodName]之仆，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

I will not cower and hide in fear! I shall practice my [From.Religion.GetName] beliefs for all the world to see and people with stronger wills than you will join me in the open.

Your fellow servant of [From.SecretReligion.GetHighGodName],
[From.GetTitledFirstName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

我不会因为退缩并躲藏在恐惧里，我会践行我的[From.Religion.GetName]信仰，让世人见证，比你意志更坚定的人会公开加入我的行列。

你的同道，[From.SecretReligion.GetHighGodName]之仆，
[From.GetTitledFirstName]

original: What a fool! [From.GetSheHeCap] will be the death of me!

The screeching of men and clanging of swords outside my room wakes me from my sleep! They break down the door and barge into my room and slowly approach my bed. One says that I am "Possessed" and another that I "Consort with [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]". Some still seem uneasy over what they are about to do but their leader silences them as they put a bag over my head and drag me away...
translation: 屋外人们的尖叫和武器的碰撞声吵醒了我！他们冲了进来，慢慢地接近我的床。一个人说我「中了魔障」，另一个人说我「勾搭上[Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]」。一些人对他们即将要做的事情很不安，但他们的领头人制止了他们。一个袋子被套在我的脑袋上，然后我被他们拽走了……

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice the esteem you command among your peers. To show [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] appreciation [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] has decided to grant you a rare [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] treasure.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]注意到你对周围的人很尊重。为了表示[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]感谢，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap]决定赐你一件稀有的[From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人宝物。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName] has been most pleased to notice the esteem you command among your peers. Know that the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName] thinks very highly of you.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetFullName]注意到你对周围的人很尊重。[offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]很看好你。

original: This option is available because you have the §YScholarly Theologian§! or §YMastermind Theologian§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y渊博的神学家§!或§Y神学的大师§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YTough Soldier§!, §YSkilled Tactician§! or §YBrilliant Strategist§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y坚强的战士§!，§Y优秀战术家§!或§Y天才战略家§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YHumble§!, §YContent§! or §YGardener§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y谦卑§!，§Y安于现状§!或§Y园丁§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YGregarious§!, §YAttractive§!, §YCharismatic Negotiator§!, §YMidas Touched§! or §YGrey Eminence§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y合群§!，§Y魅力非凡§!，§Y魅力非凡的说客§!，§Y点石成金者§!或§Y幕后操控人§! 特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YGluttonous§!, §YDrunkard§! or §YHedonist§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y暴食§!，§Y酒鬼§!或§Y享乐主义者§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YLustful§!, §YSeducer§! or §YSeductress§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y色欲§!，§Y勾引大师§!或§Y魅惑大师§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YStressed§! or §YDepressed§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y紧张不安§!或§Y沮丧消沉§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YTheologian§!, §YDetached Priest§! or §YDutiful Cleric§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y神学家§!，§Y清高的圣职§!或§Y尽职的教士§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YCynical§!, §YSlothful§! or §YArbitrary§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为拥有§Y愤世嫉俗§!，§Y懒惰§!或§Y专断§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YHedonist§!, §YDrunkard§!, §YGluttonous§!, §YLustful§!, §YSeducer§! or §YSeductress§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y享乐主义者§!，§Y酒鬼§!，§Y暴食§!，§Y色欲§!，§Y勾引大师§!或§Y魅惑大师§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YCynical§! or §YArbitrary§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y愤世嫉俗§!或§Y专断§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YTheologian§!, §YDetached Priest§!, §YDutiful Cleric§!, §YScholarly Theologian§! or §YMastermind Theologian§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y神学家§!，§Y清高的圣职§!，§Y尽职的教士§!，§Y渊博的神学家§!或§Y神学的大师§!特质。

original: This option is available because you have the §YGregarious§!, §YCharismatic Negotiator§! or §YUnderhanded Rogue§! trait.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y合群§!，§Y魅力非凡的说客§!或§Y狡猾的无赖§!特质。

original:
The [From.GetTitle] of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the traitorous [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName].

The heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], wishes for you to understand that [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetSheHe] can not tolerate such a lack of honor or loyalty from [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] Tributaries.
Your actions will be dealt with.
translation:
[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]的[From.GetTitle]写了一封信给背信弃义者[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[Root.GetTitle]。

至高无上的[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]希望你能明白[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetSheHe]不能容忍[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis]朝贡国这样无耻且不忠的背叛。
你的行径将被处理。

original: During [From.GetHerHis] visit to my court, the [From.GetJobTitle] of [From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName], [From.GetTitledName], has been going on and on about what a benevolent and peaceful ruler our liege [From.Host.GetTitledName] is. But other members of the court have informed me of what a shameless and deceitful liar both [From.GetSheHe] and our liege are.
translation: 在[From.GetHerHis]来访期间，[From.Host.PrimaryTitle.GetName][From.GetJobTitle]，[From.GetTitledName]，不停地吹嘘我们的领主[From.Host.GetTitledName]是一个多么仁慈和蔼的统治者。但宫廷的其他人却告诉我无论是[From.GetSheHe]还是我的领主都是十分无耻狡诈的骗子。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] continues to secretly practice the [Root.SecretReligion.GetName] religion.

It seems that even [satanists_inductor.GetBestName] can not reach me here in the confines of my cell. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I attempt to get conformable in my new home I hope that when I am finally free I will see [satanists_inductor.GetHerHim] again.
translation: 看起来就算是[satanists_inductor.GetBestName]也不能把我从牢房中救出去，真令人失望。我很好奇我们会在哪见面，我尝试去适应我的新家，希望当我自由时能再次见到[satanists_inductor.GetHerHim]。

original: So much for the power of [satanists_inductor.GetDWDevil]...

It seems that even [satanists_recruiter.GetBestName] can not reach me here in the confines of my cell. It's disappointing, as I was sort of curious to see where our meetings were going... As I attempt to get conformable in my new home I hope that when I am finally free I will see [satanists_recruiter.GetHerHim] again.
translation: 看起来就算是[satanists_recruiter.GetBestName]也不能把我从牢房中救出去，真令人失望，我很好奇我们会在哪见面。我尝试去适应我的新家，希望当我自由时能再次见到[satanists_recruiter.GetHerHim]。

original: So much for the power of [satanists_recruiter.GetDWDevil]...
The court Jester is kept around to provide general entertainment to the court. Also known as a fool it is generally not considered to be the most prestigious office at court.
translation: 宫廷小丑被留在领主左右以娱乐廷中大众。在宫廷里也被视作丑角，总之不是什么德高望重的臣属。

original: Power: §YWisdom of [From.GetMOSaint]§!\nYour wards have a chance to gain increased attribute points during their education and upon reaching adulthood have a chance to lose wicked traits and gain pious ones.
translation: 能力：§Y[From.GetMOSaint]的智慧§!\n你的被监护人在教育中有机会增加属性点，在成人时，还有机会失去恶劣的特质并获得美德。

original: I have decided to take [From.GetFirstName] along with me today as I preach to the people about [GetMOGod] and how they should try to live their lives according to [GetMOCode]. [From.GetFirstName] is attentive throughout and I am sure [From.GetSheHe] has learnt some valuable lessons about [GetMOGod] and the [Root.Society.GetName] today.
translation: 我决定今天独自与[From.GetFirstName]相处，因为我向人们传达了[GetMOGod]以及他们应该如何根据[GetMOCode]尝试过自己的生活。[From.GetFirstName]始终都很专心，我相信[From.GetSheHe]今天已经学到了一些关于[GetMOGod]和[Root.Society.GetName]的宝贵经验。

original: I am bringing [From.GetFirstName] to the local [GetMOBuilding] today, there [From.GetSheHe] meets with many of my Brothers and Sisters [GetMOPenanceMeditation] who greet [From.GetHerHim] politely. As we leave the [GetMOBuilding] my [From.GetRootRelation] says "[GetMOFarewell]" to all those [From.GetSheHe] met today. I am very proud of [From.GetHerHis] attitude to the ways of [GetMOSaint].
translation: 我今天把[From.GetFirstName]带到当地的[GetMOBuilding]，在那里[From.GetSheHe]见到了我许多做[GetMOPenanceMeditation]的兄弟姐妹，他们礼貌地迎接了[From.GetHerHim]。当我们离开[GetMOBuilding]时，我的[From.GetRootRelation]对[From.GetSheHe]今天遇到的所有人说「[GetMOFarewell]」。我对[From.GetHerHis]对待[GetMOSaint]道路的态度感到非常自豪。

original: My former ward [From.GetTitledFirstName] has finished [From.GetHerHis] education, in our final discussions we talked about following the [GetMOCode] and trying improve one's self in the eyes of [GetMOGod]. I have tried to encourage [From.GetHerHim] to do this for [From.GetHerselfHimself] and [From.GetSheHe] has attempted to take my advice, I wonder if [From.GetSheHe] made any progress.
translation: 我的前被监护人[From.GetTitledFirstName]完成了[From.GetHerHis]学业，在我们最后的谈话里提到了遵从[GetMOCode]并在[GetMOGod]的庇佑下提升自己。我曾激励[From.GetHerHim]为了[From.GetHerselfHimself]而做这件事，[From.GetSheHe]接受了我的建议，我在想[From.GetSheHe]是否有什么进展。

original: I shall ask [From.GetHerHim] how well it is going.

My former tutor [From.GetTitledFirstName] has come to ask me how well my attempts to follow the [From.GetMOCode] and improve myself in the eyes of [From.GetMOGod]. [From.GetSheHeCap] wants to know if I have had any success.
translation: 我的前监护人[From.GetTitledFirstName]询问我是否有很好地遵循[From.GetMOCode]并在[From.GetMOGod]的庇佑下提升自己。[From.GetSheHeCap]想知道我是否有所收获。

original: I will tell [From.GetHerHim] how I have followed the ways of [From.GetMOSaint].
translation: 我将告诉[From.GetHerHim]我怎么追随[From.GetMOSaint]的道路。

original: Ha! I found better things to do!
translation: 哈！我找到更好的事情做了！

original: [From.GetFirstName] came and told me all about how [From.GetSheHe] has strived to follow [GetMOCode] and become a better [From.GetManWoman]. [From.GetSheHeCap] talks vigorously of all [From.GetHerHis] prayers and time spent [GetMOPenanceMeditation] in [From.GetHerHis] strive to come closer to [GetMOGod]. [From.GetSheHeCap] seems to have had great success!
translation: [From.GetFirstName]到访了并且跟我讲述了[From.GetSheHe]有多么的努力去遵从[GetMOCode]并且努力让自己变得更好。[From.GetSheHeCap]富有活力的描述着[From.GetHerHis]祷辞和花费在[GetMOPenanceMeditation]上的时间，这些都是为了让[From.GetHerHis]离[GetMOGod]更近。[From.GetSheHeCap]看起来大获成功！

original: [From.GetFirstName] quickly changes the topic and no matter what I say [From.GetSheHe] refuses to talk about the matter... It seems [From.GetSheHe] has found "better" things to do... I am disappointed at [From.GetHerHis] lack of dedication to [GetMOGod] and [GetMOCode] and I hang my head in shame as I bid [From.GetHerHim] farewell. I failed [From.GetHerHim] as a tutor and must spend time [GetMOPenanceMeditation] to clear my mind.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]很快转移了话题，无论我怎么说[From.GetSheHe]都拒绝讨论这件事……看上去[From.GetSheHe]已经找到的「更好」的事情去做……我对[From.GetHerHim]缺乏对[GetMOGod]和[GetMOCode]的奉献精神很是失望，我在羞耻中向[From.GetHerHim]告别。作为[From.GetHerHis]导师我很失败，我需要在[GetMOPenanceMeditation]中更下功夫好让我让我平静一下。

original: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§! will have the opportunity offer a peaceful resolution by agreeing to become the tributary of §Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!.
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledFirstName]§!将有机会提出一个和平解决问题的提议：同意成为§Y[Root.GetTitledName]§!的朝贡国。

original: [tribute_war_suzerain.GetTitledFirstName] wishes to extort a flow of gold from the lands of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [tribute_war_suzerain.GetSheHeCap] is willing to send [tribute_war_suzerain.GetHerHis] soldiers to die for it. But am I as willing to send mine? I could surrender peacefully now and end this before my soldiers are potentially slaughtered, their families left to die and villages burnt to the ground... Or we fight to protect our land and drive back these [tribute_war_suzerain.Culture.GetName] invaders!
translation: [tribute_war_suzerain.GetTitledFirstName]希望从[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的土地上敲诈大量黄金。[tribute_war_suzerain.GetSheHeCap]愿意派[tribute_war_suzerain.GetHerHis]士兵来为之死战。但我愿意让我的士兵也如此吗？现在我可以在我的士兵和他们的家人被屠杀、村庄被烧毁前和平地投降……还是为保护我们的土地而战，赶走这些[tribute_war_suzerain.Culture.GetName]人入侵者！

original: I shall end this before the blood of my people flows throughout the land.
translation: 我将在臣民鲜血浸没这片土地前结束这一切。

original: We must protect what is ours! We shall fight!
translation: 我们必须保护属于我们的东西！我们要战斗！

original: Send a letter offering a peaceful resolution to this conflict by agreeing to become the tributary of §Y[tribute_war_suzerain.GetTitledName]§!.
translation: 向 §Y[tribute_war_suzerain.GetTitledName]§!送去一份关于此次争端的和平方案的书信，同意成为他们的朝贡国

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Let us resolve this conflict peacefully. In exchange for putting a stop to this war and preventing bloodshed I shall agree to your demands and the lands of [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] will pay tribute to you. All I ask is that you promise safety for my people and send your soldiers home.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]：

让我们和平地解决分歧吧。为了结束这场战争，避免更多牺牲，我同意你的要求，[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的土地将为你交纳贡品。我只要求你保证我的子民的安全，将你的军队撤回本土。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: A wise decision! I shall accept [From.GetHerHis] proposal.
translation: 明智的决定！我会接受[From.GetHerHis]提议。

original: Look at the coward beg and plead! There will be no peace for [From.GetHerHim] that easily.
translation: 看看这懦夫般的乞求！[From.GetHerHim]想要和平没那么简单！

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

You have made a wise decision, I shall accept your offer and send my soldiers home in exchange for tribute from your lands.

Signed
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]：

你做出了明智的决定，我将接受你的请求，撤回我的部队以换取来自你领土的贡品。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
To [Root.GetTitledFirstName],

Your offer is one of a coward, prepare your soldiers to meet in battle like a real warrior would.

Signed
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，

你的提议是一种懦夫的表现，让你的士兵像真正的勇士一样战斗吧！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: I had a feeling it would come to this.
translation: 我就觉得事情会变成这样。

original: I have granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Catholic Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.
translation: 我将罗马授予了她应有的统治者，从此教宗可以在与其名望相配的居所领导天主教教会。教宗即将正式入驻历史上天主教教宗办公的处所。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has granted Rome to its rightful ruler, so that the Catholic Pope may lead his Church from accommodations befitting his stature. The Pope shall soon take up his abode in the offices historically occupied by his Catholic predecessors.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]将罗马授予了她应有的统治者，从此教宗可以在与其名望相配的居所领导天主教教会。教宗即将正式入驻历史上天主教教宗办公的处所。

original: Enables §Gright-clicking§! the portraits of characters a lower tier than Duke or relative to someone a lower tier than Duke to attempt to abduct and imprison them with the help of your brethren in [From.Society.GetName], in exchange for §Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!.
translation: 允许§G右键点击§!低于公爵的角色或这个低于公爵角色的亲戚的头像，在[From.Society.GetName]兄弟们的帮助下，尝试诱拐和监禁他们，需要付出§Y[From.Society.GetCurrency]§!。

original: Today is a sad day. The dog I became the guardian of, that has loyally defended my family and I from evil spirits, has passed away. Today is a day of mourning and sorrow.
translation: 今天是难过的一天。我照看的那条狗过世了，它曾经忠实地保护我和我的家人免受恶灵的侵害。真是悲伤和哀悼的一天。

original: He was loyal until the end.
Today is a sad day. The hedgehog I took into my house that faithfully hunted down vermin has passed away. Today is a day of mourning and sorrow.
translation: 今天是难过的一天，我带回家的那只的刺猬去世了，它曾为我忠实地捕杀害虫。真是悲伤和哀悼的一天。

original: Never was there a better hunter.
Today is a sad day. The otter I took into my house that faithfully ensured the health and well-being of my realm has passed away. Today is a day of mourning and sorrow.
translation: 今天是难过的一天。我带入家里的那只水獭过世了，它曾忠实地确保了我的领地的健康和繁荣。真是悲伤和哀悼的一天。

original: Must have a realm province located on the Silk Road
translation: 领土内必须有一个省份在丝绸之路上

original: §YOpen Rally Point view§!\n\nRally points makes units automatically gather in predefined Counties. Army rally points are accessed through activating the Army Levies tab and Navy Rally Points are accessed through the Fleet Levies tab.
translation: §Y打开集结点界面§!\n\n集结点功能让单位自动聚集在之前决定的省份。陆军集结点在征召兵界面激活，海军则在征召舰队界面激活。

original: This fortified gompa protects the monastery and university that lies within it.
translation: 筑防的贡巴保护坐落其内的寺院与学舍。

original: If the §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§! is amenable to foreign relations you can send an envoy to provide the Emperor with a token of your subservience. Paying Tribute will increase your §YGrace§!.
translation: 如果§Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!有意与异邦结交，你可以派遣使者向皇帝献上顺从的象征。进贡能提升你的§Y皇恩§!。

original: Three Siege Engineers join your court. These characters are exceptional in the art of undermining fortifications using explosives and constructing siege towers to scale walls.\n
translation: 三位精于攻城技术的专家加入了你的宫廷。这几位攻城师技艺非凡，精通于使用炸药暗中破坏城防以及建造攻城塔来登上城墙。\n

original: The §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is famed for their schools of Engineering and Warfare. You can request some of their Siege Engineers to come and serve as commanders for your warmongering needs. These character all have the §YWay of the Leopard§! trait (Siege Speed: §G50%§!).
translation: §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!因为他们的战争与工程各流派而声名远播，你可以请求几名攻城专家担任你的指挥官为好战的你作战。这些角色都有§Y豹韬§!特质（攻城速度：§G50%§!）。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. War Engineer [chinese_siege_engineer_1.GetDynName] along with two of [chinese_siege_engineer_1.GetHerHis] apprentices, [chinese_siege_engineer_2.GetDynName] and [chinese_siege_engineer_3.GetDynName], have been dispatched to your court.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天子陛下[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]将和蔼地满足你的心愿。匠作大将[chinese_siege_engineer_1.GetDynName]及[chinese_siege_engineer_1.GetHerHis]两位学徒，[chinese_siege_engineer_2.GetDynName]和[chinese_siege_engineer_3.GetDynName]，也已前往你的宫廷。

original: Send my most sincere gratitude to the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle].
I will put them to use immediately!
Assign all currently open Commander Slots to the Siege Engineers - if not enough Commander Slots are available, fire currently appointed Commanders to make room for them!
translation: 围攻专家将会占用一个未使用的指挥官名额，如果没有空余的指挥官名额，请尽快空出一个来！

original: Assign all currently open Commander Slots to the Siege Engineers.
translation: 将所有目前开放的指挥官名额分配给围攻专家。

original: As the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is being ravaged by a devastating plague, you can offer to send a medically-schooled individual to go and protect the Emperor from disease and infection. This interaction can only be taken once per character.
translation: 因为§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!正在被一场毁灭性的瘟疫蹂躏，您可以送出一名受过医学教育的医生来保护皇室远离疾病和感染的威胁。这项行动一个角色只能执行一次

original: Has NOT sent a physician already

§YPhysician Requirements§!:
Must be your currently assigned Court Physician or a character with either the Renowned Physician, Scholar or Mystic traits
Must not hold any land
Must NOT be betrothed or married
Must NOT stand to inherit any titles
Must NOT have any of the traits: §YIncapable§!, §YInbred§!, or §YImbecile§!
translation:
§Y医师要求§!：
必须是你当前在职的宫廷医师或者有著名医生，学者，神秘主义者其中一个特质
不能有封地
不能订婚或已婚
不能是头衔继承人
不能有以下特质：§Y无能§!，§Y近亲缺陷§!，§Y痴呆§!

original: Has a realm county in the Chinese Region of Influence\n
translation: 这个领地省份在中国的影响范围内\n

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously received your relief expedition and put their supplies to good use. The generosity of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty will not be forgotten.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]已经欣然接收了你的救灾远征队。他们带来的物资会被好好使用。天朝不会忘记[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族的慷慨。

original: As the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is suffering from a great famine, you can offer to send a relief expedition to deliver supplies and help the Emperor in maintaining the stability of China.\n
translation: §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!正在遭受一场大饥荒，你可以提出派遣救援队来提供救援物资，并帮助皇帝维护中国的稳定。\n

original: Ask the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! to declare war on another ruler with the intent of shattering their realm. If the war succeeds, any §YKingdoms or Empires§! held by the target will be §Rforcibly destroyed§!. China only attacks realms of either §YKing or Empire tier§! which contain at least §Y40 Counties§!, as anything else would be too menial for them.
translation: 请求§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!向另一个统治者宣战，以图瓦解他们的国度。如果战争胜利，目标拥有的所有§Y王国或帝国§!都会被§R强行摧毁§!。中国只会进攻含有至少§Y40个伯爵领§!§Y的王国或帝国级别§!的国家，除此之外的都不值得他们兴师动众。

original: China can, by way of war, shatter realms they consider too big for their own good.
translation: 中国可以通过战争来粉碎他们认为过大因而无益的王国。

original: $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to Shatter the Realm of $DEFENDER$
All held Kingdoms and Empires are destroyed.
translation: 持有的全部王国和帝国都被摧毁。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], agrees with your wise judgement that [chinese_invasion_target.GetFullName] threatens to destabilize the world. The forces of the [From.Offmap.GetFullName] are already marching out of the Middle Kingdom.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n神圣的[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]同意你明智的判断，[chinese_invasion_target.GetFullName]威胁到世界的稳定。[From.Offmap.GetFullName]的将士已经准备出师。

original: Following the wicked lies of [chinese_invasion_instigator.GetBestName], the [From.Offmap.GetName] has declared war upon us with the intent of shattering our glorious realm! [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] armies are already marching towards [chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName], we must prepare for a long and bloody struggle.
translation: 听信了[chinese_invasion_instigator.GetBestName]的小人谗言，[From.Offmap.GetName]宣战并意图摧毁我们光荣的家园！[From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人大军已经发兵[chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]，我们必须准备一场长久血腥的抗争的准备。

original: Following the sage advice of [chinese_invasion_instigator.GetBestName], the [From.Offmap.GetName] has declared war upon [chinese_invasion_target.GetFullName] with the intent of shattering the [chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] [chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]! [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] armies are already marching towards [chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName], and it seems possible that this spells the end for [chinese_invasion_target.GetTitledFirstName]'s great realm.
translation: 听从[chinese_invasion_instigator.GetBestName]的金玉良言，[From.Offmap.GetName]对[chinese_invasion_target.GetFullName]宣战以摧毁[chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective][chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetTier]！[From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人大军已经出兵[chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]，这似乎已经宣告了[chinese_invasion_target.GetTitledFirstName]的末日。

original: If the §Y[offmap_china.GetName]§! is amenable to foreign relations, and you have not yet had your appeals heard in the past year, you can send an envoy to request any one of a variety of blessings the Emperor might deem you worthy of. Asking for Boons costs §YGrace§!.
translation: 如果和§Y[offmap_china.GetName]§!是适合外交的时机，且过去一年内没有提出过请求，你可以派遣使者请求皇帝赐下他认为你应得的赏赐。请求将消耗§Y皇恩§!。

original: Send a request to §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!, asking for peaceful relations with the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! and its §Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!. Having a §YPeace Deal§! ensures that the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! does not target your realm should they go on the warpath.
translation: 向§Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!发送一个请求，请求和§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!与它的§Y[Root.Offmap.Governor.GetTitle]§!保持和平的关系，拥有一个 §Y和平协议§! 确保§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! 不会在他们的征途上把你的领地当作目标。

original: The §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is famed for their learned citizens. You can request to have one of these scholars come to your court and serve as your personal physician. This character always has the §YPhysician§! trait.
translation: §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!人民的学识久负盛名，你可以请求一名当地学者来到你的宫廷成为你的私人医生。这个角色会有 §Y医生§!特质

original: Over the centuries, military geniuses of the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! have come to master the art of war. You can request to have a commander proficient in Chinese strategy join your court. This §YStrategist§! will teach your existing commanders about Chinese military tactics, granting them special §YCommander Traits§!.
translation: 在过去的几个世纪里，§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!的军事天赋使他掌握了战争的艺术。你可以要求一个精通中国战略的指挥官加入你的宫廷。这个§Y兵法家§!将会教导你现有的指挥官们关于中国的军事战术，给予他们特殊的§Y指挥官特质§!。

original: Through the rigorous imperial examinations, the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! has created a class of educated scholar-bureaucrats. You can request to have one of them serve you as an administrator. Having a §YScholar-Bureaucrat§! employed will reduce §GBuild Cost§! and §GBuild Time§!.
translation: 通过严格的科举，§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!造就了一批受过良好教育的士大夫阶级。您可以请求其中一员作为大臣为你服务。雇佣一个§Y士大夫§!会减少§G建造花费§!和§G建设时间§!。

original: The §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is the cradle of countless wonders of technology. You can request to have a Chinese master engineer join your court. A §YMaster Engineer§! will improve your demesne with powerful §GProvince Modifiers§!.
translation: §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!是无数奇妙技术的发源地。你可以邀请一位中国的将作大匠加入你的宫廷。一位§Y将作大匠§!会为你的领地提供强力的§G省份加成§!。

original: By requesting the Imperial seal our trade posts will attract merchants from far and wide to trade in exotic goods. Having an §YImperial Trade Contract§! will boost the value of your §YSilk Road Trade Posts§! by §G100%§! for §Y25 years§!.
translation: 如果能请到盖上玉玺的勘合，我们的贸易站就能招徕五湖四海的商贾，贩卖异国商品。拥有§Y互市商约§!能增加你§Y丝绸之路贸易站§!§G100%§!的价值，持续§Y25年§!。

original: The ones truly favored by §Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§! can, on behalf of themselves or a close relative, request to marry a relative of the Emperor's. Performing an §YImperial Marriage§! will grant you §G500§! §YPrestige§! as well as give you a §GPeace Treaty§! with China. The spouse of an Imperial Princess or Prince will be able to raise a regiment of §GHonor Guards§! when at war.
translation: 受§Y[Root.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!青睐的人可以替他们自己或者他们的近亲，请求与皇帝的亲属联姻。举行一场§Y皇室联姻§!将增加你 §G500§! §Y威望§!，同时与天朝签订§G和平协议§!。与公主或皇子和亲的配偶可以在战争时召集§G天朝荣誉卫队§!。

original: Was NOT made a Tributary State within the last §Y15 years§!, or original Suzerain has died
translation: §Y15年§!以内没有成为过朝贡国，或者原宗主已死

original: We shall humbly assist the Emperor in this endeavor!
translation: 我们愿为陛下效犬马之劳！

original: The craftsmen and artists of the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! are famed for creating masterful and beautiful art. You can request to have one of these artifacts sent to you. You will receive a random artifact ranging from quality §Y1§! to §Y3§!.
translation: §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!的能工巧匠以能制作出精巧美观的器物而闻名于世。您可以请求赐予一件宝物。你将会随机收到一个品质从§Y1§! 到 §Y3§!的宝物。

original: Does NOT already have all Chinese artifacts ranging from quality §Y1§! to §Y3§!
translation: 还没有拥有所有等级 §Y1§! 到等级 §Y3§! 的中国宝物
您将收到一个§Y中国宝物§!！

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously fulfilled your wish. A wondrous artifact of expert [From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName] craftsmanship will be bestowed upon you for safekeeping.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]慷慨地满足了你的愿望。一件出自[From.Offmap.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人匠人之手的惊人工艺品将被你妥善保管。

original: A small figurine depicting a former Emperor of China. Though small, it has intricate details and shows great craftsmanship.
translation: 中国古代皇帝的小雕像。它虽小，但复杂的细节展现了精湛的工艺。

original: An elaborately decorated brocade armband - it depicts five stars in the night sky.
translation: 一件精心装饰的织锦臂章，上面描绘了五星出九天之上。

original: A beautifully adorned spear with a crescent blade attached off its side.
translation: 一个饰有新月形刀片的漂亮的长矛。

original: A spear with a curved tip like a slithering snake, a both beautiful and menacing weapon.
translation: 一种有弯曲的尖端的矛，像一条爬行的蛇，是一种既漂亮又具有威胁性的武器。

original: An elaborate mechanical contraption capable of rapidly firing arrows, even when used with only one hand.
translation: 一种精巧的机械装置，即使只用一只手也能快速射出箭。

original: A fantastic bronze rendition of a majestic beast mid-stride. The graceful movement of the subject is truly inspiring!
translation: 这件青铜雕塑奇幻般诠释了一匹雄伟的骏马奔跑途中的一瞬间。这动物优雅的动态着实激励人心！

original: This beautifully bound book tells of the many fascinating aspects of Chinese medicine and its various uses.
translation: 这部装订精美的书记录了很多中国草药迷人的外观和多样的用途。

original: An ornate book bound with silk. Its beautiful formulations and elegant phrasings describe Confucian law in mesmerizing detail.
translation: 一本用丝帛装订的华丽书籍，用精妙的阐释和简练的措辞，描绘了儒家礼法中令人着迷的细节。

original: A book detailing the lives of the Emperors of one of the great dynasties of China. Not a very exciting read, but it does inspire thoughts of having a dynasty as grand as theirs.
translation: 一本详细记述中国历代皇帝起居的书。这本书读起来并不激动人心，但它确实激发了人们「大丈夫当如是也」的想法。

original: A beautiful book bound with great care. Its outlining of the general principles of economy and trade seems incredibly insightful.
translation: 一本装帧精美的华丽书籍。其中对经贸普遍原理的概述，极具洞见。

original: A beautiful painting of the horse of a former Emperor, a great steed by the name of Shanguang Tí. It is wearing an elaborately crafted silken gown, making it look most regal.
translation: 一副绘有先帝爱马的美图，上有名驹「闪光蹄」。身衣文秀，颇有帝室之气。

original: A beautiful tapestry depicting a scene from a market on the silk road. Looking at it one can almost hear the jingle of coins and the chattering of a dozen languages.
translation: 一匹精美的织锦，绣有丝绸之路上商肆的一景。看着它，仿佛都能听到各地钱币的叮当作响，万国商贾的南腔北调。

original: A magnificent tapestry showing the splendor of China and its Emperor. It depicts Chinese armies in a triumphant victory over a barbaric horde, and a grand dragon - a symbol of imperial authority - looking down at them from the clouds above.
translation: 这是一块华丽的织锦，表现了天朝和天子的辉煌。上面绣着战胜蛮夷后凯旋而归的中国军队，还有一只巨龙——帝王威严的象征——在云端俯视着这一切。

original: Must be the §YPrimary Attacker§! or §YPrimary Defender§! in a war
translation: 必须是战争的§Y主要进攻方§!或者§Y主要防御方§!

original: As the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is in a state of turmoil, you can offer up one of your most gifted commanders to go and join the [Root.Offmap.GetShortName] Army as an auxiliary officer.
translation: 当 §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! 正处于动荡期时，你可以从你最杰出的将领中挑选一位，去参加[Root.Offmap.GetShortName]军，以为助力。

original: Has NOT sent a commander in 20 years

§YCommander Requirements§!:
Must be a valid Commander with at least 12 martial
Must not hold any land
Must NOT be betrothed or married
Must NOT stand to inherit any titles
Must NOT have any of the traits: §YIncapable§!, §YInbred§!, or §YImbecile§!
translation:
§Y指挥官要求§!：
必须是一个拥有十二点以上军事能力的指挥官
必须是不拥有任何土地的
必须是没有结婚或订婚的
必须不是任意头衔的继承人
不能有以下这些特质： §Y无能§!，§Y近亲缺陷§!，或者 §Y痴呆§!

original: You have recently sent a Commander to China, if China is still in turmoil you will be able to send another one on: §Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_commander_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 你最近已经进贡过一个指挥官给中国，如果中国内乱持续，你将能继续进贡另一个指挥官：§Y[Root.chinese_grace_send_commander_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!

original: There are free-spirited nomads living in this County - now when it is under our control we will not let them be oppressed by their sedentary overlords!
translation: 这个伯爵领中存在许多自由不羁的游牧民——在被我们控制之后，我们不会让他们受定居的领主们欺压的！

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] has decided to grant the house of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] the greatest honor. [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap] niece, the [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] Princess [imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName], will become the bride of [imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天子陛下[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]现已决定将至上的荣耀赐予[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族。[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHisCap]侄女，[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetChineseComplimentAdjective]公主[imperial_marriage_spouse_2.GetFirstName]，将会下嫁[imperial_marriage_spouse_1.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: / chance per year to increase by §Y0.1§!

Nomadic realms can please the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! by sending them a continuous supply of horses. For as long as you supply horses, you will gain a ticking amount of §GGrace§! in exchange for a small penalty to your §YManpower§!. You can at any point stop supplying horses, but if you do you will not be able to start supplying them again with the same character. While you are supplying horses China is less likely to invade you.
translation: 游牧国家可以通过持续进贡马匹来取悦§Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!。只要你一直提供马匹，你就能以§Y人力§!为代价，持续的得到§G皇恩§!。你可以随时停止马匹的进贡，但直到你扮演其他角色前，你无法再次进贡。当你进贡马匹的时候中国不太可能进攻你。

original: This nomadic ruler is supplying China with horses.
translation: 这个游牧统治者正在给中国进贡马匹。

original: Has NOT previously chosen to stop supplying horses
translation: 之前没有选择停止进贡马匹

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has graciously accepted your offer of supplying [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] army with magnificent steeds.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n至尊的[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，非常优雅地接受了你进贡的[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis]带有骏马的军队。

original: If you no longer require the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!'s grace, you can choose to stop supplying horses to them. You will be unable to start supplying horses again with this character.
translation: 如果你不需要 §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! 的皇恩，你可以选择不再给他们进贡马匹。你将不能再次以这个角色进贡马匹

original: A nervous foreigner has shown up at court. Flinching at anyone who comes near [chinese_refugee.GetHerHim], the [chinese_refugee.GetManWoman] refuses to be on [chinese_refugee.GetHerHis] way, instead arguing that [chinese_refugee.GetSheHe] could serve me, as the trained [chinese_refugee.GetChineseProfession] [chinese_refugee.GetSheHe] is. "Just don't send me back out there. I cannot go back", [chinese_refugee.GetSheHe] says, jaw clenched.
translation: 一名神色慌张的外国人出现在了你的宫廷。这个[chinese_refugee.GetManWoman]面对任何靠近[chinese_refugee.GetHerHim]的人都畏缩不已，也不愿离开。[chinese_refugee.GetSheHe]坚持自己可以作为一名训练有素的[chinese_refugee.GetChineseProfession]为你效劳。「求求你别把我送回去，我不能回去。」[chinese_refugee.GetSheHe]哀求着，下颚紧咬。

original: My guards have dragged a Chinese thief before me. "[chinese_refugee.GetSheHeCap] claims to have an audience scheduled with you, my [Root.GetLordLady]", they report. "Please, forgive the ruse", the [chinese_refugee.GetManWoman] urges in a heavy accent, voice thick with emotion. "I'm a [chinese_refugee.GetChineseProfession] – any Chinese court would be ecstatic to have me! Take pity on my soul, [Root.GetMasterMistress]."
translation: 我的卫兵把一个中国小偷拖到我面前。「[chinese_refugee.GetSheHeCap]声称与您有约，要面见您，我的[Root.GetLordLady]」，他们报告。「请原谅我的这点小伎俩」，[chinese_refugee.GetManWoman]用浓重的口音激动地恳求道，「我是一个[chinese_refugee.GetChineseProfession]，任何中国朝廷得到我的辅佐都会很高兴！可怜可怜我吧，[Root.GetMasterMistress]。」

original: A suspected spy has tried to enter [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] tonight, stopped only by guards who spotted the glint of armor under [chinese_refugee.GetHerHis] cloak. When confronted, the foreigner claims to be a [chinese_refugee.GetChineseProfession], fleeing the [offmap_china.GetFullName]. Upon inspection, I notice [chinese_refugee.GetHerHis] worn expression, and an armor not only covered in dust, but dark stains of blood.
translation: 今晚，一个疑似间谍的家伙在试图进入[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]时被守卫拦下，他们发现了[chinese_refugee.GetHerHis]斗篷下武器的反光。在双方对峙时，这个外国人自称自己是一名[chinese_refugee.GetChineseProfession]，正在逃离[offmap_china.GetFullName]的追捕。在搜身时，我注意到[chinese_refugee.GetHerHis]衣着破旧，而且武器上也不止沾染了尘土，还有已经干涸的斑斑血迹。

original: A Chinese healer has taken shelter in a small village outside of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName], supposedly treating people in exchange for food, and successfully so. My courier first thought the [chinese_refugee.GetManWoman] a beggar, but rumor has it [chinese_refugee.GetSheHe] comes fleeing the current situation in the [offmap_china.GetFullName]. "It would explain [chinese_refugee.GetHerHis] ragtag appearance, my [Root.GetLordLady]."
translation: 在[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]郊外的一个小村庄里。一个中国医生在这里避难，据说在以医换食，而且进行得很顺利。我的眼线一开始认为这个[chinese_refugee.GetManWoman]是一个乞丐，但是传言说[chinese_refugee.GetSheHe]是为了躲避在[offmap_china.GetFullName]的战火。「这很好的解释了[chinese_refugee.GetHerHis]这幅衣衫褴褛的样子，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。」

original: You may stay. The [offmap_china.GetFullName] is no place for anyone right now.
translation: 你可以留下来。[offmap_china.GetFullName]现在不是能待人的地方。

original: This is not a criminal, you buffoons. [chinese_refugee.GetSheHeCap]'s a refugee!
translation: 这不是罪犯，你们这些没教养的家伙。[chinese_refugee.GetSheHeCap]是一名难民。

original: I can make use of a veteran like you.
translation: 像你这样的老手可以为我所用。

original: Why wasn't I told sooner? We need a physician here in [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]!
translation: 怎么不早点告诉我？我们[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]这儿正需要一位医生！

original: Surely this [chinese_refugee.GetManWoman] can find shelter elsewhere.
translation: 这个[chinese_refugee.GetManWoman]无疑可以在别处寻求庇护。

original: This is a waste of my time.
I'm sorry, but we can hardly afford to feed our own.
translation: 我很抱歉，但我们几乎不能喂饱我们自己。

original: I'm sure [chinese_refugee.GetSheHe] wants to be left alone.

Rumors of the military might of the [offmap_china.GetFullName] is proving to be a forceful diplomatic tool in itself – after what seems like brief negotiations, [chinese_invasion_target.GetBestName] has peacefully agreed to become a tributary state of the Middle Kingdom. Their couriers whisper that they can only hope that the relationship between the [chinese_invasion_target.GetTitle] and the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap] be a fruitful one.
translation: 关于[offmap_china.GetFullName]军事实力的传闻本身就是一种有力的外交工具——在短暂的谈判之后，[chinese_invasion_target.GetBestName]和平地同意成为中国的朝贡国。他们的信使私下议论说他们只能希望[chinese_invasion_target.GetTitle]和[offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap]之间的关系对两国有利。

original: Not even an independent realm like that of [chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName] dares stand against the full force of the [offmap_china.GetFullName]. [chinese_invasion_target.GetBestName] has instead peacefully agreed to become a tributary state of the Middle Kingdom. Time will tell whether the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap] truly favors them.
translation: 没有一个像[chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName]一样的独立国度胆敢站出来对抗[offmap_china.GetFullName]的全部兵力。[chinese_invasion_target.GetBestName]还是选择了和平地成为中央帝国的朝贡国。时间会告诉我们[offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap]是否真的从此会青睐他们。

original: [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] armies are finally retreating, after a bloody war with [the_winner.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [the_winner.GetTitledName] has shown the whole world that [the_winner.GetHerHis] leadership is one to be reckoned with! This defeat will live on in our memory, and certainly in the mind of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself].
translation: [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人大军在与[the_winner.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的血腥战斗后最终败退。[the_winner.GetTitledName]向全世界宣示了[the_winner.GetHerHis]领导力是值得注意的！这次失败将会留在我们的记忆中，当然还有[offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap][offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerselfHimself]的记忆中。

original: When the first [the_winner.Culture.GetName] armies clashed against the Chinese regiments, few anticipated this outcome. While the Middle Kingdom put in a valiant effort, it has ended in a sullen retreat, as it is finally clear that the [offmap_china.GetFullName] has lost the war against [the_winner.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. [the_winner.GetTitledFirstName] stands victorious, while agents across the world are wondering what repercussions this will have for the political map we have come to know.
translation: 当第一支[the_winner.Culture.GetName]军队与天朝的大军展开正面冲突时，没人曾预料到这个结果。尽管中国军队奋勇作战，但胜利天平的最终倾向却随着他们的败退而逐渐清晰，[offmap_china.GetFullName]输掉了这场与[the_winner.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的战争。[the_winner.GetTitledFirstName]赢得了战争的胜利，遍布世界各地的探子都很好奇这会对我们已知的政治版图产生怎样的后果。

original: The people of [the_loser.PrimaryTitle.GetName] hang their heads in grief, as their leaders return with devastating news. Since [the_loser.GetHerHis] initial order to attack, [the_loser.GetTitledName] has suffered a crushing defeat against the [offmap_china.GetFullName]. Meanwhile, [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] armies are celebrating, their victory finally declared. They are bound to, along with their [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap], instill fear in many [the_loser.Culture.GetName] a heart, for years to come.
translation: 当[the_loser.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的首领带着这毁灭性的消息回来时，人民纷然哀伤不已，在[the_loser.GetHerHis]最初的进攻命令下达后，[the_loser.GetTitledName]遭受了来自[offmap_china.GetFullName]毁灭性的打击。与此同时，[offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人大军正在庆祝他们最终的胜利。在[offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap]的率领下，在未来的几年内，他们势必会在[the_loser.Culture.GetName]的人民心中牢牢种下恐惧的种子。

original: The people of [the_loser.PrimaryTitle.GetName] probably never knew why the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap] chose to attack [the_loser.GetTitledFirstName]. Regardless, they have suffered a crushing defeat and [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] armies are journeying home to celebrate, as their victory has finally been declared.
translation: [the_loser.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的人民或许永远不会知道为什么[offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective]的[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap]陛下会选择讨伐[the_loser.GetTitledFirstName]。无论如何，他们已经经历了一场一边倒的惨败。[offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人大军胜利凯旋，向世人宣布他们的胜利。

original: The Dragon is not to be toyed with...

The [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap] must currently have more important matters to deal with than the war against [the_aggressor.GetTitledName]. Why else would [offmap_china.GetFullName] negotiate with their aggressors? Reports state that [offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName] armies are pulling back from [the_aggressor.PrimaryTitle.GetName], as a White Peace is being established between the nations.
translation: [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap]一定有比与[the_aggressor.GetTitledName]的战争更重要的事需要处理，否则[offmap_china.GetFullName]怎么会与这群蛮族侵略者谈判？报道显示[offmap_china.Ruler.Culture.GetName]人大军正从[the_aggressor.PrimaryTitle.GetName]撤出，两国间的战争无条件结束了。

original: When the [offmap_china.GetFullName] sent their armies to occupy territory in [the_defender.PrimaryTitle.GetName], few expected that the war would eventually end in a stalemate. Chinese troops are unexpectedly returning home, while the administration of [the_defender.GetTitledName] are working tirelessly to calm the people of [the_defender.Capital.GetName], still shaken by the war.
translation: 当[offmap_china.GetFullName]派兵讨伐[the_defender.PrimaryTitle.GetName]时，几乎没人会预料到战争的最后会陷入僵持。当中国的部队意外地撤退时，[the_defender.GetTitledName]的官员还在为安抚[the_defender.Capital.GetName]惊魂未定的百姓疲于奔命。

original: We survived the wrath of the Dragon...
Not all who face off against the Dragon live to tell the tale.
translation: 并不是所有对抗过巨龙的人都能活着来讲述这个故事。

original: Any non-zealous courtiers of your religion will have a chance of joining you in falsely confessing their faith.
translation: 任何与你同教的不狂热的廷臣都有可能随你一同假意改信。

original: was sent home to China by $KILLER$
Is §RNOT§! the ruler of a pretender Chinese Empire

After the recent civil war in the Middle Kingdom was crushed by the forces of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress], one of the rebels that opposed [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim], [rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName], has fled westwards with his forces. He claims that the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] dynasty is not fit to rule and that he is the true Son of Heaven and shall establish his own Empire.
translation: 中国最近的一次内战被[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]的军队平息之后，一支[rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName]率领的军队正在追击逃向西部的[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim]。他声称[offmap_china.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName]王朝已经失去天命，自己才是真龙天子。

original: I have heard more news about [rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName]. It seems he and his men are moving with haste towards [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]. The rumors say that they have set their eyes on my lands to be the starting point of their new Empire.
translation: 我听到越来越多的关于[rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName]的消息。看来他和他的人在向[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]急行军。传闻说他们想把我的土地当做他们新帝国的起点。

original: They shall get no easy fight here!
translation: 怎么可能让他们轻易地达到他们的目标！

original: [From.GetTitledName] will invade in the coming days.

The word from the traders is that [rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName] was set upon by the armies of the [offmap_china.GetFullName]. The rebel troops never stood a chance against the well supplied and loyal troops of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress].
translation: 商人们传来消息：[rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName]被[offmap_china.GetFullName]的军队所袭击。叛军永远不可能在装备精良、忠心耿耿的[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]的军队面前有获胜机会了。

original: So much for the threats of [rebel_general.GetTitledFirstName].
China will stop at nothing to show the pretenders that they are the one and only Empire of China.
translation: 中国将毫不犹豫地向觊觎者证明中华帝国的统一和唯一性

original: The $ORDER$[offmap_china.GetFullName] War to Dismantle the Pretender [Recipient.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]
[This.GetTitledName] will have [This.GetHerHis] Empire dismantled by [offmap_china.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName], the true Son of Heaven.
translation: [This.GetTitledName]将会发现[This.GetHerHis]帝国被真正的天子——[offmap_china.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]——所毁灭。

original: Word has reached you from the east that the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] has ordered [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName] to mobilize [offmap_china.Governor.GetHerHis] forces and to launch an invasion of our lands to try and force their false [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] onto us. There can only be one dragon and we shall show the [offmap_china.GetShortName] pretender that it is [chinese_invasion_target.GetTitledName].
translation: 从东方传来消息，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]已经命令[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName]调集[offmap_china.Governor.GetHerHis]军队，准备迫使我们承认那个冒牌[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]。天无二日，我们将会证明[offmap_china.GetShortName]才是真正的[chinese_invasion_target.GetTitledName]。

original: Word has reached you from the east that the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] has ordered [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName] to mobilize [offmap_china.Governor.GetHerHis] forces and to launch an invasion of [chinese_invasion_target.PrimaryTitle.GetName] to dismantle the upstart pretender. There can only be one dragon and [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], is moving to show, by force, that it is [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim].
translation: 从东方传来消息，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]已经命令[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName]调集[offmap_china.Governor.GetHerHis]部队，准备荡平自命不凡的觊觎者。天无二日，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]准备用武力证明，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim]才是真正的天命所归。

original: After the death of [From.GetTitledFirstName] [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has fallen into ruin, with no heir ready to take on the mantle of the Son of Heaven and Lord of Ten Thousand Years the Empire has collapsed. The vassals relieved as they are now free from the grasps of the [From.GetEmperorEmpress].\nFurther in the east it is reported that [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], is very pleased with this development as they are once again the only dragon to rule.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]死后，没有一个后嗣能真正继承下他的黄袍。随着这百世帝国之主的倒下，[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]也已渐渐沦为废墟。这个传承自万年之前的古老帝国轰然崩塌，[From.GetEmperorEmpress]的封臣们纷纷脱离了帝国的掌控。\n而在更遥远的东方，据说[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]十分欣见于这种局面，他们再次成为那统治中原的唯一的真龙天子。

original: After the defeat of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], at the hands of [From.GetTitledFirstName], [FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been dismantled. The vassals relieved as they are now free from the grasps of the [FromFrom.GetTitle].\nFurther in the east it is reported that [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], is very pleased with this as outcome as once again [offmap_china.GetShortName] has displayed the might of the dragon.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]击败了[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]之后，[FromFrom.PrimaryTitle.GetName]头衔已被撤销。封臣们现在已经摆脱了[FromFrom.GetTitle]的控制，获得了独立。\n据说在遥远的东方，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]对这个结果非常满意，因为[offmap_china.GetShortName]再次展现了巨龙的实力。

original: They were no match for the [offmap_china.GetFullName].

[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], is no longer the only dragon to rule. General [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] [From.GetBirthName] has completed [From.GetHerHis] conquest and has crowned [From.GetHerselfHimself] [From.GetTitledName]! [From.GetSheHeCap] claims to be the true Son of Heaven and Lord of Ten Thousand Years.\nTalk among the traders from the east say that the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName] is most angered by this pretender. The future of this new [From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName] remains in question but nobody can argue with results of [From.GetTitledFirstName]'s invasion...
translation: [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，不再是唯一能够统治的真龙天子。[From.GetOnlyDynastyName][From.GetBirthName]已完成了[From.GetHerHis]征服并已将[From.GetHerselfHimself]加冕为[From.GetTitledName]！[From.GetSheHeCap]声称自己是真正的天子和百世之君。\n来自东方的商人们说[offmap_china.Ruler.GetShortChineseEmperorName]对这觊觎皇位者恨之入骨。这位新[From.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的未来仍然前途未卜，但没有人可以对[From.GetTitledFirstName]的入侵结果进行争辩……

original: And now we bow to a dragon.
And now they bow to a dragon.

§Y*§! The value of the Silk Road is §GDoubled§!\n§Y*§! The effects of Chinese §YStrategists§!, §YScholar-Bureaucrats§! and §YMaster Engineers§! are §GDoubled§!\n§Y*§! The armies of China are significantly stronger
translation: §Y*§! 丝绸之路的价值§G翻倍§!了\n§Y*§! 中国的§Y兵法家§!，§Y士大夫§!以及§Y将作大匠§!获得§G翻倍§!的加成\n§Y*§! 中国的龙虎之师空前强大！

original: This character is known to have slain a member of their extended family - they are surely cursed for their disgraceful actions.
translation: 这名角色因杀害其所在大家庭的亲属而恶名远扬，其可耻的行为必将受到诅咒。

original: This character is known to have slain a member of their dynasty - their own family now look at them with fear and contempt.
translation: 这名角色因杀害其家族成员而人尽皆知——其自己的家人现在用着恐惧和轻蔑的眼光看待他们。

original: My actions have killed a close relative of mine! I have gained the Kinslayer trait.
translation: 我杀死了我的一位近亲！我获得了弑亲禽兽特质。

original: My actions have killed a member of my extended family! I have gained the Familial Kinslayer trait.
translation: 我杀死了我所在大家庭内的亲属！我获得了弑近亲者特质。

original: My actions have killed a member of my dynasty! I have gained the Dynastic Kinslayer trait.
translation: 我杀死了一位家族成员！我获得了弑族亲者特质。

original: Has NOT broken free from being a tributary in 30 years
translation: 在30年内还没有摆脱过朝贡

original: You will NOT be able to become a tributary of China for the next 30 years or until the ruling dynasty of China has changed.
translation: 在未来30年或中国的统治王朝发生变化之前，你将无法成为中国的朝贡国。

original: A basic set of armor made up of many small metal rings linked together.
translation: 由许多小金属环连接在一起而制成的一套基础型盔甲。

original: More advanced than chain mail, this set of armor has plates of solid metal attached among the metal rings to protect vital weak spots.
translation: 这套盔甲比锁子甲更为先进，在金属环之间附有坚固的金属板，以保护身上的重要弱点。

original: This strong and sturdy set of armor offers unmatched protection in combat. It truly is the guardian of those it encases.
translation: 在搏斗中，这套强大而且坚固的盔甲提供了无与伦比的保护。它必然能真真切切地成为主人的守护者。

original: Designed to strike fear into the hearts of men, this suit of armor safeguards its bearer so they can charge into the fields of battle.
translation: 这套盔甲始终保护着主人，让他们能在战场上安心的冲锋陷阵。

original: Forged out of the finest materials and with expert craftsmanship, this armor turns its owner into a stalwart barrier against any foe.
translation: 这套盔甲是用最精良的材料以最高超的锻造工艺打造出来的，它能把自己的主人变成可以抵御任何敌人攻击的坚固堡垒。

original: A scholar-bureaucrat is an educated member of the Chinese gentry, who has earned academic degrees by passing the imperial examinations. They will aid you with the administration of your realm by organizing the local building projects.
translation: 士大夫是中国乡绅阶级中，受过良好教育并通过了国家科举考试的一个群体。他们会帮助你安排领地建设，来帮助你管理你的领地。

original: Send out word that you are looking for a Smith to forge for you.
translation: 发出消息说你正在找一个善于锻造的铁匠。

original: Does NOT own any weapons forged by a weaponsmith
translation: 不拥有任何武器匠锻造的武器

original: Does NOT own any armor forged by an armorsmith
translation: 没有铸甲师锻造出来的盔甲

original: Does NOT own any jewels forged by a goldsmith
translation: 没有任何珠宝匠锻造出来的珠宝。

original: Decide what type of smith you wish to employ.\nThe §Yfull cost§! of the item you commission will be dependent on its §Ytype§! and §Ytier§!.
translation: 决定要雇佣何种工匠。\n你委托的物品的§Y费用§! 将由物品的§Y种类§!和§Y等级§!决定。

original: What type of smith do you wish to send word for?
translation: 你想向哪种类型的铁匠发出请求？

original: A weaponsmith to forge me a deadly weapon!
translation: 武器匠能为我锻造致命的武器！

original: You will send out word that you are in need of a §Yweaponsmith§!.
translation: 你将发出一个你需要§Y武器匠§!的消息。

original: I am in need of a new set of armor, find me the finest armorsmith around.
translation: 我需要一套新的盔甲，给我找到最好的铸甲师。

original: You will send out word that you are in need of an §Yarmorsmith§!.
translation: 你将放出需要一个§Y铸甲师§!的消息

original: Find me a goldsmith to create jewels befitting of my status.
translation: 请找一个金匠来，我要打造出符合我地位的珠宝。

original: You will send out word that you are in need of a §Ygoldsmith§!.
translation: 你将放出需要一个§Y金器匠§!的消息

original: Actually now may not be the best time...
translation: 事实上现在可能不是最好的时机……

original: I am in need of protection! Make me a strong and sturdy set of armor.
translation: 我需要保护！为我锻造一套坚固而强力的盔甲。

original: Armor provides a bonus to §YMorale Offense§!, as well as §YMartial§!, §YPersonal Combat Skill§! and §YMonthly Prestige§!.
translation: 护甲将增强在进攻中的§Y士气打击§!、§Y军事§!、§Y个人实战能力§!及§Y每月威望§!。

original: Order a [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] of the highest quality. This armor will give you §G+10%§! to §YMorale Offense§!, §G+0.75§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+2§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
translation: 订制最优质的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件盔甲会为你提供 §G+10%§! §Y士气打击§!、§G+0.75§! §Y每月威望§!、§G+1§! §Y军事§!和 §G+2§! §Y个人实战能力§!。

original: Order a good quality [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This armor will give you §G+5%§! to §YMorale Offense§!, §G+0.5§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+1§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
translation: 订制优质的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件盔甲会为你提供 §G+5%§! §Y士气打击§!、§G+0.5§! §Y每月威望§!、§G+1§! §Y军事§!和 §G+1§! §Y个人实战能力§!。

original: Order the cheapest [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]. This armor will give you §G+0.25§! §YMonthly Prestige§!, §G+1§! §YMartial§! and §G+1§! §YPersonal Combat Skill§!.
translation: 订制最便宜的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。这件盔甲会为你提供 §G+0.25§! §Y每月威望§!、§G+1§! §Y军事§!和 §G+1§! §Y个人实战能力§!。

original: This armor shall be my Guardian.
translation: 这件铠甲应该是我的守护者。

original: With this armor I shall be a Champion.
translation: 穿着这件盔甲我定是冠军。
每个人都该对典狱长抱有恐惧。

original: My [Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle] [Root.job_marshal.GetDynName] has told me about a remarkable [GetWeaponArmorSmith] residing in [neighbor_province.GetName]. [Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap] suggested that I invite the [smith.GetManWoman] to my court to see [smith.GetHerHis] work for myself. If [smith.GetSheHe] manages to impress me, I could order my own custom made item.
translation: 我的[Root.job_marshal.GetJobTitle][Root.job_marshal.GetDynName]告诉我一个出色的[GetWeaponArmorSmith]居住在[neighbor_province.GetName]。[Root.job_marshal.GetSheHeCap]建议我邀请此人来到我的宫廷为我工作。如果[smith.GetSheHe]能够让我满意，我就能订做一些为我量身定制的物品。

original: Do not invite the [GetWeaponArmorSmith] to your court.
This option is available as [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] is a smith of extremely high skill.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为[From.GetFirstName]大师是一位技艺高超的铁匠。

original: The §Ytraits§! and §Ystewardship§! of the smith will impact the outcome of your request. At extremely high levels they can be asked to forge you a true unique masterpiece.
translation: 匠人的§Y特质§!和§Y管理能力§!会影响成品。技艺高超的匠人可以为你制成大师之作。

original: Finally, the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] has been completed! [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] has brought me a sturdy box which contains the item. My hands are shaking slightly as I open its heavy lid...
translation: [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]终于打造完成了！[From.GetFirstName]大师呈上了一个盛有此物件的箱子。我的手在打开它沉重的的盖子时不住的颤抖……

original: 'I am most sorry, my [Root.GetTitle],' [From.GetFirstName] said apologetically. The [GetWeaponArmorSmith] has informed me that the precious metals and special tools needed to produce the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] I ordered are impossible to find in my own realm. 'I can send a [From.GetManWoman] on an expedition to acquire said materials, although it will be costly.'
translation: 「实在非常抱歉，我的[Root.GetTitle]」，[From.GetFirstName]满怀歉意。[GetWeaponArmorSmith]告诉我，打造我要求的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]，需要珍贵的金属和特殊的工具，可我的领地内根本找不到这些东西。「我可以派一个人不远千里收集这些材料，尽管这可能要多花点钱」。

original: Insist that you shall have the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] you ordered, despite the extra cost.
translation: 就算有额外的费用，你还是坚持得到你最初要求的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]。

original: Settle for a less impressive [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] than the one you initially ordered.
translation: 定制一把没最初所要求的[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]那么出色的武器。

original: It has been many weeks since I commissioned [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] to work for me and today my council has informed me that [From.GetFirstName] has fled from my lands to the court of [From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]! Taking the work promised to me and any gold left with [From.GetHerHim]!
translation: 自从我委任[From.GetFirstName]大师为我工作已经好几周了。今天，我的内阁告诉我[From.GetFirstName]已经悄悄逃往[From.Liege.GetTitledFirstName]的宫廷去了！[From.GetHerHim]还带走了承诺给我做的道具和剩下的金子！

original: [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] focuses on [From.GetHerHis] task and produces a superior piece of work.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]大师专注于[From.GetHerHis]任务并制作一件更好的物品。

original: As I was walking towards [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]'s smithy I could not hear the sound of progress but instead the sound of voices talking. I found [From.GetFirstName] and my [smith_event_target.GetRootRelation] [smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName] discussing different metals and their compositions. All this talk was making my head spin and definitely halting the progress on the work I have ordered...
translation: 当我朝着[From.GetFirstName]大师的锻冶场走去的时候，我没听到干活的声音，反而听到交谈的声音。我发现[From.GetFirstName]和我的[smith_event_target.GetRootRelation][smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName]正在讨论不同的金属和它们的成分。所有这些讨论听得让我头晕，而我订单的进度肯定是停下了……

original: There is no harm in [From.GetFirstName] taking some time to help [smith_event_target.GetFirstName].
translation: [From.GetFirstName]用些时间来帮助[smith_event_target.GetFirstName]没什么不好的。

original: This is not why [From.GetFirstName] is here!
translation: 这并不是[From.GetFirstName]在这里的原因！

original: During the afternoon as I went to check on the progress of [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] I walked in to see [From.GetHerHim] getting my [smith_event_target.GetRootRelation] [smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName] to help with the forging process. Together they were lifting pieces of metal and [From.GetFirstName] was showing [smith_event_target.GetFirstName] how to mold the materials into shape. Not exactly what I am paying [From.GetHerHim] for but a form of service nonetheless...
translation: 下午，我去检查[From.GetFirstName]大师的进度，我走进来看到[From.GetHerHim]让我的[smith_event_target.GetRootRelation][smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName]协助锻造工序。他们一起举起金属块，[From.GetFirstName]向[smith_event_target.GetFirstName]展示如何将这些材料塑造成形。虽然这并不是我付钱给[From.GetHerHim]的目的，但这也算是一种服务的形式……

original: I am glad [From.GetFirstName] is helping [smith_event_target.GetFirstName] to be stronger!
translation: 我很高兴[From.GetFirstName]正在帮助[smith_event_target.GetFirstName]变得更出色！

original: [From.GetFirstName]'s job is to be forging for me. Not playing with children.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]的工作就是为我锻造，而不是陪孩子们玩。

original: Having decided to check up on [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName]'s progress I strolled over to [From.GetHerHis] forge. I did not find [From.GetHerHim] working on the project I commissioned but instead working on a different task... specifically my [smith_event_target.GetRootRelation] [smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName]!
translation: 为了检查[From.GetFirstName]大师的工作进度，我来到[From.GetHerHis]锻造坊。然而[From.GetHerHim]没有在做我委托的工作，而是在干着别的活儿……确切说是在干我的[smith_event_target.GetRootRelation][smith_event_target.GetTitledFirstName]！

original: What [From.GetFirstName] does in the privacy of [From.GetHerHis] own forge is not my concern...
translation: 我并不关心[From.GetFirstName]在[From.GetHerHis]自己的锻造厂里私底下做什么……

original: Can you please focus on your work!
This is not what I pay you for! Get out and stay out!
translation: 我花钱不是叫你干这个的，给我滚出去！

original: How dare [From.GetFirstName] dishonor me like this! [From.GetSheHeCap] must be punished.
translation: [From.GetFirstName]怎敢如此侮辱我！[From.GetSheHeCap]必须被惩戒。

original: I was taking a relaxing walk this morning when suddenly I heard a scream pierce through the air! I rushed to the source and saw that it was [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] wailing in [From.GetHerHis] forge. From what I could gather, between the servants chatter and [From.GetFirstName]'s crying, there was an accident involving some molten metal! It is lucky that [From.GetFirstName] is alive. Yet this will definitely impede [From.GetHerHis]'s work...
translation: 今天早上我正在放松的散步突然我听到了一声尖叫响彻云霄！我冲向源头看见[From.GetFirstName]大师在[From.GetHerHis]熔炉边哀嚎。从我所能了解到的，在仆人们的闲谈和[From.GetFirstName]的哭泣中，我了解到这里发生了一场涉及熔融金属的事故！万幸[From.GetFirstName]还活着。但这肯定会阻碍[From.GetHerHis]工作……

original: I will help you in any way I can [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName].
translation: 我会尽全力帮助你，[From.GetFirstName]大师。

original: No cripple can finish the work! Send [From.GetHerHim] away!
translation: 没有跛子可以完成工作！把[From.GetHerHim]送走！

original: A prominent subject has petitioned me for justice: His daughter had supposedly been beaten by Marshal [From.GetTitledFirstName] while [From.GetSheHe] was their guest and the father is requesting compensation.
translation: 一位显赫的臣民向我申诉，请求公正：据说他的女儿被指挥官[From.GetTitledFirstName]打了，[From.GetSheHe]当时在他家做客，现在这位父亲请求赔偿。

original: A tributary of China will be able to raise a regiment of troops when at war, as long as the [Root.GetName] is stable and prospering.
translation: 当[Root.GetName]处于稳定期或黄金期时，中国的朝贡国可以在战争中向中国请求一支军队。

original: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. Things are returning to normal and the Middle Kingdom seems stable.
translation: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]。一切都在走向正轨，中原王朝似乎已经趋于稳定。

original: You are NOT defending against another tributary of [offmap_china.GetShortName]
translation: 你并没有在防御另一个[offmap_china.GetShortName]的朝贡国

original: [offmap_china.GetShortName] has closed its borders and halted trade on the Silk Road. This is unacceptable - the trade must flow!
translation: [offmap_china.GetShortName]关闭了国境，迫使丝绸之路上的贸易中断。这是不可接受的！贸易必须流通！

original: The $ORDER$$FIRST_ADJ$ War to Force Open the [offmap_china.GetFullName]

The §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! has isolated itself from the rest of the world.
