They have closed down trade across the Silk Road and refuse to deal with any outsiders. §Y[offmap_china.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§! must be forced to reopen their land, by negotiation or if necessary by force.
translation: §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!闭关锁国，把自己隔绝在世界之外。他们关闭了丝绸之路的贸易，拒绝同一切外人打交道。只有通过谈判或者必要的武力才可能让§Y[offmap_china.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!被迫重新开放国境。

original: You will choose a method to open the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!: Defeating them in §Ywar§!, controlling a §Ystarting point§! of the Silk Road and §Y25%§! of its wealth or by §Ynegotiating§! a treaty.
translation: 你必须选择一种方式使§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!打开国门：用§Y战争§!打败他们，控制一个丝绸之路§Y起点§!和§Y25%§!的财富或者通过§Y谈判§!签订一个条约。

original: [offmap_china.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName] has closed off the Empire and stopped all trade along the Silk Road. This is not acceptable. [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] not only harms trade for [offmap_china.GetShortName] but also for my own lands. We must make the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] open up their borders one way or another...
translation: [offmap_china.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]已经决定闭关并将取缔丝绸之路上的所有贸易，而这是不可接受的。[offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap]不仅会损害[offmap_china.GetShortName]的贸易收入，更会影响到我们自己领地。不论如何，我们必须让[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]重新打开边界。

original: War is the only way this shall be resolved!
The Silk Road is already ours, we just need to 'convince' the traders of that fact.
translation: 丝绸之路已经是我们的了，我们只需要以这个事实「说服」交易者。

original: This option is available as you control a §Ystarting point§! of the Silk Road and §Y25% of the wealth§! along it.
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你控制了丝绸之路的§Y起点§!和沿线的§Y25%财富§!。

original: You will force open trade along the Silk Road much to the anger of §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!.
translation: 你将强迫开放丝绸之路上的贸易，惹怒§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!。

original: We must proceed carefully - let us negotiate first.
translation: 我们必须谨慎行事——首先让我们谈判。

original: You will negotiate a deal with §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! to open up trade along the Silk Road.
translation: 你将会和§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!谈判来达成一份丝绸之路通商的协议。

original: On second thought, this might not be the best idea...
translation: 再想想，这也许不是最好的主意……

original: After [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], ordered that the borders be shut and trade along the Silk Road be halted, [From.GetTitledName] deemed that unacceptable and mobilized [From.GetHerHis] forces to open the Silk Road by force. The [From.Culture.GetName] troops managed to overcome and defeat the forces of [offmap_china.GetShortName] led by [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName].\nThe Son of Heaven is most displeased with this loss and, under pressure by his advisors, has had no choice but to once more open up the Silk Road to traders.
translation: 在[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]宣布关闭国境以及停止丝绸之路上的一切贸易往来之后，[From.GetTitledName]公然表示反对并且调集了[From.GetHerHis]军队，企图以武力重新恢复丝绸之路的畅通。不久[From.Culture.GetName]军队击败了[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName]率领的[offmap_china.GetShortName]军。\n失利使远在东方的天子震怒，然而，迫于群臣的压力，他不得不重新向商旅开放了丝绸之路。

original: The Silk Road is open... but at what cost?
translation: 丝绸之路开通了……但代价是什么？

original: After [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], ordered that the borders be shut and trade along the Silk Road be halted, [From.GetTitledName] deemed that unacceptable and mobilized [From.GetHerHis] forces to open the Silk Road by force. However, the [From.Culture.GetName] troops were no match for the forces of [offmap_china.GetShortName] led by [offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName].\nThe Son of Heaven is most pleased with this victory and maintains the isolation of the [offmap_china.GetFullName].
translation: 在[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]宣布关闭国境以及停止丝绸之路上的一切贸易往来之后，[From.GetTitledName]公然表示反对并且调集了[From.GetHerHis]军队，企图以武力重新恢复丝绸之路的畅通。然而，[From.Culture.GetName]军队根本不是[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitledFirstName]率领的[offmap_china.GetShortName]军的对手。\n远在东方的天子对于这场胜利相当满意，并将继续使[offmap_china.GetFullName]孤立于世。

original: It seems even a dormant dragon is a dangerous one...
translation: 看来即使是沉睡的巨龙也是危险的……

original: After [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], ordered that the borders be shut and trade along the Silk Road be halted, [From.GetTitledName] deemed that unacceptable. Using [From.GetHerHis] vast influence over the wealth of the Silk Road, [From.GetTitledFirstName], coerced the traders to return to their posts. This influx of traders into the formerly dormant trading posts was felt all the way back in [offmap_china.GetShortName] as they began transporting and selling their goods, much to the anger of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress].\nWith no way of stopping this surge of trade the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] has had no choice but to officially reopen the Silk Road.
translation: [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]宣布关闭国境以及停止丝绸之路上的一切贸易往来之后，[From.GetTitledName]公然表示了反对。凭借[From.GetHerHis]财富在丝绸之路沿线带来的巨大影响力，[From.GetTitledFirstName]胁迫商人们来到他们的商栈里。随着商人的大量涌入，他们渐渐开始运来并出售他们的商品，一度陷入沉寂的商栈仿佛让人回到了繁华的[offmap_china.GetShortName]，这令中国皇帝大为恼火。\n在对这种快速增长的贸易束手无策的情况下，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]被迫重新开放了丝绸之路。

original: And now commerce and trade return to the East.
translation: 现在商业贸易返回东方。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\nThe heavenly [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has decreed that the Empire focus its efforts on the [offmap_china.GetRandomChineseFocus].\nHence we do not have time to negotiate allowing your traders to return. I am sure you can understand why and respect this decision.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n至高无上的[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]陛下于近日颁布诏书，宣布天朝将在今后专注于[offmap_china.GetRandomChineseFocus]。\n因此，我们没有时间来与你谈判以允许你的商队恢复贸易。陛下相信你会理解并尊重这一决定。

original: I shall not press the matter...
translation: 我不应该在这件事上过分施压……

original: show your loyalty to the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim] by becoming a Tributary
translation: 以成为朝贡国的形式向[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim]展现你的忠诚

original: remove some of your traders that are disrupting our men along the Silk Road
translation: 移除一些在丝绸之路上妨碍我方人员的你们的贸易者

original: make a grand gesture to [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim] showing your honor and respect
translation: 向[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim]三拜九叩以向天子陛下展现你的崇拜与尊敬

original: send a skilled man from your court to serve [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim] personally
translation: 将一个熟练的人送去亲自为[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim]服务

original: send a beautiful woman to join [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] court
translation: 献一位美丽的女子到[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis]宫廷

original: allow the loyal servants of [offmap_china.GetShortName] at your court to return home
translation: 允许在你宫廷的[offmap_china.GetShortName]的忠诚的仆人返乡

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\nThe heavenly [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], demands that, in exchange for opening up the Silk Road, you [GetChineseForceOpenDemand].\nI am sure you can see how this will benefit both our nations and trust you to make the correct decision.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n至高无上的[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]陛下，要求你[GetChineseForceOpenDemand]，以作为对重新开放丝绸之路的交换。\n陛下相信你明白这是一个两全其美的选择，并且你会做出正确的选择。

original: That sounds like a reasonable request.
translation: 听起来像是个合理的请求。

original: I was a fool to think this was possible!
translation: 我真傻，竟然认为这是可能的！

original: These demands are absolutely unacceptable! The Silk Road will be taken by force!
translation: 这些要求是绝对不能接受的！丝绸之路将被强制占据！

original: show [This.GetHerHis] loyalty to the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] by becoming a Tributary
remove some of [This.GetHerHis] traders that are disrupting the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]'s men along the Silk Road
translation: 移除一部分干扰了丝绸之路沿途的[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]臣民的[This.GetHerHis]商人

original: make a grand gesture to [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim] showing [This.GetHerHis] honor and respect
translation: 举行一场盛大的仪式以向[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHim]展示[This.GetHerHis]荣耀和敬意

original: send a skilled man from [This.GetHerHis] court to serve the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] personally
translation: 从[This.GetHerHis]宫廷里送给[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]一个经验丰富的人

original: send a beautiful woman to join the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]'s court
translation: 将一个漂亮的女人送去[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]的宫廷

original: allow the loyal servants of [offmap_china.GetShortName] at [This.GetHerHis] court to return home
translation: 允许在[This.GetHerHis]宫廷的[offmap_china.GetShortName]的忠实臣民回家

original: Once again the Silk Road has opened! Negotiations for this began between [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], and [From.GetTitledName]. The two managed to come to an agreement in that the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] would order the reopening of trade and all [offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHe] asked was for [From.GetTitledFirstName] to [From.GetChineseForceOpenDemandChina].\nWhilst the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] may have preferred to stay in isolation, whispers from the East say that even [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] closest advisors are pleased with this peaceful outcome.
translation: 丝绸之路重开！[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，以及[From.GetTitledName]为此协商。两人达成一致，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]将会下诏重开贸易，而[offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHe]只要求[From.GetTitledFirstName][From.GetChineseForceOpenDemandChina]。\n尽管[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]本人更喜欢锁国，来自东方的流言声称即使[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis]近侍都对这个结果很满意。
我是一位出色的谈判者。

original: I am impressed this ended without bloodshed.
translation: 我为能够不流血地解决事态而感动。

original: Will NOT be able to change to the Isolationist Policy for §Y50§! years
translation: 将在 §Y50§! 年内不能改变孤立政策

original: Has NOT attempted to force the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! open in the past §Y15§! years
translation: 在过去的 §Y15§! 年中，没有强迫§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!开放

original: No other ruler is currently attempting to force §Y[offmap_china.GetShortName]§! open
translation: 目前还没有其他的统治者试图强迫§Y[offmap_china.GetShortName]§!开放

original: §Y[This.GetTitledName]§! will leave [This.GetHerHis] life at court and return home to the distant [offmap_china.GetFullName].
translation: §Y[This.GetTitledName]§!将从宫廷离开，回到在遥远[offmap_china.GetFullName]的家。

original: China is most displeased with you...

If you are victorious then the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! will Open its borders and you will be §Gfavored in trade along the Silk Road§!. However, if you are defeated it will cost you §Rmonthly prestige and grace§!.
translation: 如果胜利§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!会对外开放，你将会§G获得丝绸之路的贸易特惠§!。如果失败，你将§R每月损失威望和皇恩§!

original: You will enter into a peace deal with the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!.

This marriage will secure a peace deal during which the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! and its §Y[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitle]§! will not declare war on you. It will last for §Y50§! years or until the dynasty of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle], [offmap_china.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName], ends.
translation: 这个婚约将会使你们签订一个和平条约，使§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!和§Y[offmap_china.Governor.GetTitle]§!不能对你宣战。这个条约会存在§Y50§!年或者直到[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName]的王朝灭亡。

original: You can declare war against the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! to free yourself from your status as an §YImperial Tributary§!. If §Y[offmap_china.GetShortName]§! is currently suffering from an §Rinvasion§! or a §Rcivil war§! then you can free yourself via a §Ydecision§! in the intrigue screen.
translation: 你可以对§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!宣战来解除你与它的§Y朝贡关系§!。如果§Y[offmap_china.GetShortName]§!正在遭受§R入侵§!或者§R内战§!那么你可以通过密谋界面的§Y决议§!来获得独立。

original: The traders in these lands are enjoying the profits of a beneficial trade agreement.
translation: 这些国家的商人正在享受贸易协定所带来的红利。
在丝绸之路上受到优待

original: Thanks to their liege taking control of the Silk Road, the traders in these lands are enjoying the profits of being favored in all trade deals.
translation: 由于他们的君主控制了丝绸之路，商人们可以享受贸易优待带来的利润了。

original: So I suppose the vision was about how I was to get [From.GetDisease]. I knew something bad would happen!
translation: 所以我猜测这幻象是关于我怎么得[From.GetDisease]的。我就知道会有坏事发生！

original: So I suppose the vision was about how I was to get [From.GetDisease]... That could have been clearer, I think!
translation: 大概这幻象展示了我是怎么得[From.GetDisease]的……这样一来就明白多了！

original: I will not attend this Sadeh festival!
You send out invitations to your Manichean vassals to celebrate Bema.
translation: 你向你的摩尼教封臣发出邀请来庆祝庇麻节。

original: The [offmap_china.GetFullName] has been a thorn in our side long enough - no more!
translation: [offmap_china.GetFullName]一直以来都是我们的心头刺，现在他将不复存在！

original: Has NOT failed an invasion of China
translation: 没有在入侵中国中失败

original: All of your current §Y[offmap_china.GetCurrency]§! and §Ymodifiers§! from §Y[offmap_china.GetShortName]§! will be §Rremoved§!.
translation: 你所有现有的§Y[offmap_china.GetCurrency]§!和来自§Y[offmap_china.GetShortName]§!的§Y加成§!将被§R移除§!。

original: You have sent vast numbers of your troops East to attack the Chinese heartland.
translation: 你已经派遣大量士兵东征以攻打中国核心区域。

original: Has NOT failed an invasion of the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!
You will NOT be able to interact with the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!
Has NOT raised any vassal levies
translation: 没有调集任何封臣的征召兵

original: Your [invasion_of_china_claimant.GetRootRelation], §Y[invasion_of_china_claimant.GetBestName]§!, will become the new §Y[invasion_of_china_claimant.GetEmperorEmpress] of China§!. Any of their immediate family, who are not landed or the primary heir to a title, will join them in the Middle Kingdom.\nAny land held by the Western Protectorate will be transfered to you.
translation: 你的[invasion_of_china_claimant.GetRootRelation]，§Y[invasion_of_china_claimant.GetBestName]§!，将会成为新的§Y中国[invasion_of_china_claimant.GetEmperorEmpress]§!。他们的所有直系亲属和继承人都会跟随他去往中原。\n而西域都护府的所有领土也都将由你接管。

original: You can take certain hostile actions against the [offmap_china.GetFullName] but be wary as the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] is unlikely to tolerate such behavior. Taking Hostile Actions will likely §RAnger China§!.
translation: 你可以对[offmap_china.GetFullName]采取敌对措施，但要小心行事，因为[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]不太可能容忍这种行为。此举很有可能§R激怒中国§!。

original:
[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], has sat on [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] throne and looked down upon us for too long! The [offmap_china.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty is not fit to rule so we must tame the dragon!
I have ordered a large portion of our forces East to attack the mainland of [offmap_china.GetShortName] and in retaliation the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] has commanded [From.GetTitledFirstName] to launch a counter attack into the lands of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
Thousands upon thousands of troops loyal to the Son of Heaven march towards us.
The time of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName] Dynasty is coming to an end!
translation:
[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，已经坐在[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis]皇位上小视吾等太久矣！听闻[offmap_china.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName]王朝朝廷纲纪废弛，如今我们要驯服恶龙！
我已经召集大量的部队向东进攻[offmap_china.GetShortName]的土地，作为回应，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]征召了[From.GetTitledFirstName]向[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]发动了反击.
成千上万忠于天子的部队正在向我们进军。
[offmap_china.Ruler.GetOnlyDynastyName]王朝的天命正在走向终结！

original: Tired of how [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], sits on [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] throne and looks down upon the world, [FromFrom.GetBestName] has taken it upon [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself] to tame the dragon!\n[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap] has mustered a portion of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] forces and sent them East to invade the [offmap_china.GetShortName] heartland with the intention of claiming it for [FromFromFrom.GetBestName]!\nMeanwhile the rest of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] troops remain to fight off the inevitable counterattack from [From.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: [FromFrom.GetBestName]厌烦了[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]坐在[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis]龙椅上俯瞰整个世界，自作主张决定驯服巨龙！\n[FromFrom.GetSheHeCap]已召集了一部分[FromFrom.GetHerHis]军队并派遣他们向东入侵[offmap_china.GetShortName]的心脏地带，意图为[FromFromFrom.GetBestName]宣称该处！\n与此同时，[FromFrom.GetHerHis]军队的剩余部分则留下来对抗来自于[From.GetTitledFirstName]不可避免的反击。

original: The Middle Kingdom shall belong to House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]!
translation: 天朝上国应该属于[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族！

original: Will [FromFrom.GetSheHe] be able to successfully tame the dragon?

The forces of [From.GetBestName] have prevailed! With the troops of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] shattered and the conflicts in the Middle Kingdom finally over, the former [offmap_china.PrevRuler.GetEmperorEmpress], [offmap_china.PrevRuler.GetOnlyDynastyName] [offmap_china.PrevRuler.GetBirthName], has been dethroned and in [offmap_china.PrevRuler.GetHerHis] place [offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], now rules!\nHouse [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] has successfully invaded the Eastern lands and now they reign supreme.\nGlory to the new [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]!
translation: [From.GetBestName]的军队取得完全胜利！[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]被粉碎，中原战事平息，旧朝的[offmap_china.PrevRuler.GetEmperorEmpress]，[offmap_china.PrevRuler.GetOnlyDynastyName][offmap_china.PrevRuler.GetBirthName]已经退位，[offmap_china.PrevRuler.GetHerHis]皇位传给[offmap_china.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]继承大统！\n[From.GetOnlyDynastyName]家成功地入侵东土，君临天下。\n[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]万岁万岁万万岁！

original: And so rises a new dragon.
translation: 因此新的天子已经践祚。

original: The forces of [From.GetBestName] have been defeated! All across the [offmap_china.GetShortName] heartland they have been crushed in their many skirmishes with the troops of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress].\nNow the forces in the West, led by [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], have prevailed in their battles as well putting an end to this foolish invasion and dismantling [From.PrimaryTitle.GetName] once and for all.
translation: [From.GetBestName]的军队被击败了！在跨越[offmap_china.GetShortName]核心地区的战场上，他们被[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]的部队在一场接一场的交战中击溃。\n现在征西军在[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]的领导下，在战场上取得了胜利，同时结束了这场愚蠢的入侵，彻底瓦解了[From.PrimaryTitle.GetName]。

original: Maybe the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] sent Assassins in secret?
Has an attribute greater than or equal to §Y20§!

translation: 有一个§Y正面的§!先天特质
具有§Y正面的§!不可遗传的先天特质

original: Is a eunuch that was gifted to you
translation: 是个被作为礼物送给你的阉人。
是一位来自中国的廷臣

original: Is a high quality artifact (that is NOT cursed or from China)
translation: 是一件优质宝物（不是被诅咒或出自中国）

original: Does NOT hold a religious head title that is higher tier than §YDuke§!
translation: 不能持有§Y公爵§!以上级别的宗教领袖头衔

original: Has NOT defeated China in a war
translation: 没有在战争中打败中国
§Y继承导致的继承人宗教转换§!

original: With the death of [From.GetBestName] you are free from your status as a tributary.
translation: 随着[From.GetBestName]的死去，你摆脱了作为朝贡国的身份。

original: This character possesses a gilded prosthetic hand decorated with elaborate engravings.\n§RThis artifact will always be destroyed on death!§!
translation: 这个角色拥有一只饰有精心雕饰的镀金假手。\n§R这个宝物总会死亡时毁坏！§!

original: This character possesses a mechanical prosthetic hand made of iron.\n§RThis artifact will always be destroyed on death!§!
translation: 这个角色拥有一只铁制的机械假手。\n§R这个宝物总会死亡时毁坏！§!

original: This character possesses a very lifelike prosthetic leg. The only evidence of a missing leg is a slight limp.\n§RThis artifact will always be destroyed on death!§!
translation: 这个角色有十分逼真的假腿。能表明失去腿的证据只有轻微的跛脚。\n§R这个宝物总会死亡时毁坏！§!

original: Borders the Eastern Edge of the map

translation: 部队数量恢复了 $AMOUNT|Y$ 人
军队重新获得 $PERCENTAGE|Y%$ 的部队

original: Character Assigned a Realm-wide Job Action
translation: 角色被派遣执行全国任务

original: §Y[Recipient.GetTitledFirstName]§! must not be a loyal servant
All holdings in the province are already looted
translation: 该省的所有地产都已被洗劫一空。

original: Directly controls §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of the provinces on $ROUTE|Y$
translation: 直接控制$ROUTE|Y$上$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! 的省份§Y

original: Controls §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of the trade post locations on $ROUTE|Y$
translation: 控制$ROUTE|Y$上§Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! 的贸易站位置

original: Directly controls §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of the trade post locations on $ROUTE|Y$
translation: 直接控制在$ROUTE|Y$上§Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! 的贸易站位置

original: Controls §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of the trade posts on $ROUTE|Y$
Directly controls §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of the trade posts on $ROUTE|Y$
translation: 直接控制$ROUTE|Y$上§Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! 的贸易站

original: Directly controls §Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! of the wealth of $ROUTE|Y$
translation: 直接控制$ROUTE|Y$上§Y$COMPARISON$ $VALUE$%§! 的财富

original: Is or was the ruler of an offmap power
translation: 是或曾经是一个地图外政权的统治者

original: Has not been the ruler of an offmap power
translation: 并不是地图外政权的统治者

original: The Technology in a County has a chance to increase passively each year if there is a source of more advanced Technology, for example a neighboring County or a demesne County. The rate of spread can be boosted by a number of modifiers in the County and its Settlements, such as the Silk Road and a variety of Buildings. \n\n§YCurrent Levels and Spread Chances:§!
translation: 省份的科技每年都有机会提高，条件是相邻的省份或其他直辖领中的科技更先进。科技的传播速度和省份许多因素有关，比如丝绸之路和聚居地中的各类子建筑。\n\n§Y当前科技等级和传播几率：§!

original: Days since last Policy change is $COMPARISON|Y$ $VALUE|Y$
translation: 自上一次政策改变已经过去了$COMPARISON|Y$ $VALUE|Y$ 天

original: Days since last Status change is $COMPARISON|Y$ $VALUE|Y$
translation: 自上一次状态变更已经过去了$COMPARISON|Y$ $VALUE|Y$ 天

original: Is NOT liege, or above, over $VASSAL|Y$
Is NOT vassal, or below, under $LIEGE|Y$
Has NOT raised liege levies of $VASSAL|Y$

translation: 巴特恩 阿尔达希尔

original: The §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is overburdened with riches - why should we vie for the Emperor's grace when we could just take whatever we want!\n\nTaking this decision will temporarily §Rdisable§! all §YPay Tribute§! and §YAsk for Boon§! interactions for as long as the raid persists, and then five years after that. While Raiding China you will lose Grace but gain loot and spoils every year, a portion of your soldiers will also be unavailable for the duration of the raid.
translation: §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!不堪重富——如果我们能直接拿走，那何必讨好皇帝老儿呢？\n\n此举会暂时使所有的§Y进贡§!和§Y请求恩赐§!选项§R不可用§!，直到你停止劫掠中国五年后。当劫掠中国时，你会失去皇恩，但是会每年得到战利品，并且你的部分兵力会不可用。

original: This character is currently sending raiding parties to cross the border to China, angering the Emperor but bringing home a steady stream of loot each year.
translation: 此角色正向中国派遣劫掠者，触怒了天朝皇帝，但每年都可以获得劫掠收入。

original: Has NOT raided the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! in the last 5 years[From.GetRaidCD]

Raiding the §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§! is lucrative, but dangerous - we should withdraw our raiders from China.\n\nWe will no longer be considered a priority target, but neither will we be able to raid China again for 5 years.
translation: 对 §Y[Root.Offmap.GetFullName]§!进行劫掠收获颇丰，但同时也很危险——我们应该撤回派往中原的劫掠队。\n\n我们将不再被认为是首要的打击目标，但未来5年内我们都不能对中原进行劫掠了。

original: The [From.GetTitle] of the [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle] addresses a letter to the marauding [Root.GetTitle] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]. May your realm crumble under your incompetent rule.\n\nDo be warned that angering the heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName] is most unwise, do not act suprised when our forces come to put an end to your misguided raids.
translation: [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][From.Offmap.Ruler.GetTitle]的[From.GetTitle]向四处劫掠的[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]的[Root.GetTitle]致信。愿你的王国在你无能的统治下土崩瓦解。\n\n郑重警告你，激怒至高无上的[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]是最不明智的行为，当我们的军队来结束你们走上歧途的袭击时，还请不要惊讶。

original: I am not afraid of empty threats!
translation: 我不怕这种空洞的威胁！

original: The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] have returned home, and we will not be able to send any further raids into China.
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠队已经回家了，我们将不能再对中原进行进一步的掠夺了。

original: We shall raid again another day...
The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] have returned. With them they are carrying plenty of loot plundered from small villages on the outskirts of the Middle Kingdom.
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠队回来了。他们带回了从中原边境的小村庄里抢来的大量战利品。

original: The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] have returned. They apparently found and plundered a place of worship, bringing home plenty of loot and a valuable artifact.
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠队回来了。他们似乎找到并掠夺了一个礼拜堂，带回了大量的战利品和一件贵重的宝物。

original: An artifact? Bring it to me!

The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] have returned. This time their raids took them by the holdings of a local Han noble. In addition to gold and silk, your raiders also brought you a more personal gift, a [captured_character.GetManWoman] named [captured_character.GetFullName] - likely the [captured_character.GetSonDaughter] of the noble.
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠者回来了。这次他们洗劫了一个当地汉人贵族的领地。除了黄金和丝绸，你的劫掠队还给你带回了一个更私人的礼物，一个叫做[captured_character.GetFullName]的[captured_character.GetManWoman]——很可能是那个贵族的[captured_character.GetSonDaughter]。

original: The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] have returned. This time their raids took them by the workshop of a famous siege engineer, while there they managed to capture one of his apprentices. The apprentice, [captured_engineer.GetFullName], has been brought back to serve you.
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠者回来了。这次他们洗劫了一个围攻专家的工坊，在那里他们设法捉住了工程师的一个弟子。这个徒弟，[captured_engineer.GetFullName]，被带回来为你服务了。

original: A siege engineer of my own? Excellent!
translation: 我自己的攻城专家？这太棒了！

original: The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] have returned. On their way back home from China they came upon a caravan loaded with precious silks and porcelain - [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName] truly smiled upon them!
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠者已经回来了。从中国回来的路上，他们遇到了一个满载珍贵丝绸和瓷器的商队——[Root.Religion.GetHighGodName]真的对他们微笑了！

original: Fantastic! Bring it all to me!
A Chinese artifact is added to your inventory.
translation: 一件中国宝物被放入了你的宝库。

original: Fire an existing commander to make room for the Siege Engineer.
translation: 开除一位现有的指挥官以让攻城专家就任

original: The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] have returned - and they have brought countless treasures! They were able to identify and capture a Han noble who was traveling undercover, who they later ransomed for an exuberant amount of gold, silk and porcelain!
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠队回来了——他们带回了数不清的财宝！他们辨识出了一个微服出行的汉人贵族并劫持了他，之后用他勒索了巨额的黄金、丝绸和瓷器！

original: The treasures of the [offmap_china.GetShortName] shall all be mine!

The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] were set upon by [offmap_china.GetShortName] patrols and slain! Only a single survivor remains, and all he is doing is telling the story of their defeat...
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠队被[offmap_china.GetShortName]的巡逻队攻击了，几乎全军覆没！只有一个幸存者逃了回来，告诉了我他们惨败的消息……

original: Curse it! This must be the work of [Root.Religion.GetRandomEvilGodName]...
This character has captured a pair of panda bears and are keeping them as pets.
translation: 这个角色捕获了一对熊猫并将他们作为宠物收养。

original: The raiders we sent to the [offmap_china.GetFullName] have returned. With them they have brought a pair of... bears? The black-and-white 'bears' are not very ferocious though, and they spend most of their time fumbling about. They will make grand pets!
translation: 我们派去[offmap_china.GetFullName]的劫掠者回来了。他们带回了一对……熊？这两只黑白相间的「熊」看起来一点不凶，而且一直在到处滚滚摸摸，他们会成为我的萌宠！

original: Despite your best attempts at making them breed, your Pandas have died without producing any offspring. Truly a sorrowful day...
translation: 尽管你已经给了它们最好的照顾，你的熊猫仍然没有产下任何后代就去世了。真是悲伤的一天……

original: Not my cuddly friends! How could you leave me?
translation: 不我可爱的朋友！你怎么可以离开我？

original: As you, or one of our unlanded dynasty members that are in your court, are married to an Imperial Princess or Prince, you can raise their Honor Guard to fight for you in your current war.
translation: 如果你或一位你宫廷中的无地家族成员与一名天朝皇子或公主结婚，那么你就可以召集他们的荣誉卫队加入到你当前的战争中。

original: Is a vassal of the Western Protectorate
Approach the Adventurer, asking what they would require in order to stop raiding you.
translation: 接触冒险者们，询问他们需要什么来让他们停止对你的劫掠。

original: Has NOT negotiated with an Adventurer in the last year[From.GetNegotiateCD]
translation: 在最近一年没有与冒险者进行过谈判[From.GetNegotiateCD]

original: §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! will present an offer - if you choose to decline this offer there is nothing stopping [Root.GetHerHim] from continuing to raid your lands.
translation: §Y[Root.GetFullName]§!会提出一个提议——如果你选择拒绝，[Root.GetHerHim]将毫无阻碍地继续洗劫你的领地。
该死的§Y[raiding_adventurer.GetFullName]§!仍然不断地在劫掠我们
一个侮辱性的提议——没有协议达成！

original: Has a title §Y[Root.GetFullName]§! is interested in
You have recently asked China for a Boon, you will be able to ask for another one on: §Y[Root.jd_china_boon_cd.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 你最近已经向中国求取过赏赐了，你将能在：§Y[Root.jd_china_boon_cd.GetExpiryDate]§! 后再次求取赏赐。

original: Has NOT raised the Honor Guard in the past year
translation: 过去一年中没有召集过荣誉卫队

original: I shall spend ALL NIGHT learning complicated phrases to truly impress!
translation: 我要花一整晚来学习华丽的辞藻，我要让人印象深刻！

original: An hour or two to prepare a simple greeting should suffice.
translation: 花一两个小时准备一场简单的迎接足矣。

original: Pah! You are lying - but I will not take this further.
translation: 呸！你在撒谎——但我不会采取其他行动。

original: This character has defeated a decadence invasion - for as long as they rule the largest realm among all of their Dynasty, they will not be considered decadent.
translation: 这个角色已经击败了腐化的侵蚀——只要他们统治家族中最大的领地，他们就不会被视为腐化。

original: Has NOT already raised the Honor Guard
Has NOT been forced to change Succession Law by Liege
translation: 没有被领主强迫变更继承法

original: Is NOT forced by laws to have Elective Succession
translation: 没有被法律要求选举继承法
当前不在调动内阁成员中

original: You have recently broken free from being a Tributary of China. You will be able to ask to become one again on: §Y[Root.chinese_grace_tributary_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 你自由了，不再是中国的朝贡国了。你可以在以下时间请求再次成为中国的朝贡国：§Y[Root.chinese_grace_tributary_timer.GetExpiryDate]§!

original:
To the respectable [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
My [Root.GetLordLady], you are a [Root.GetManWoman] blessed with a beautiful family! It would honor me greatly to take care of your [marriage_child.GetDaughterSon], [marriage_child.GetTitledFirstName]. This would ensure a lasting peace between us.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致值得尊敬的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
我的[Root.GetLordLady]，您是一个拥有美丽家族的[Root.GetManWoman]！能够照顾您的[marriage_child.GetDaughterSon]，[marriage_child.GetTitledFirstName]是我的荣幸。这能够确保你我之间长久的和平。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Your heir, $HEIR$, currently follows a religion you are not allowed to play. Upon succession they will convert to the religion of your previous character.
translation: 你的继承人，$HEIR$，最近皈依了一个你不能进行游戏的宗教。继承后他们将会转回你之前角色的宗教。

original: This painting shows the flow and beauty of Chinese writing - clearly the work of a true master.
translation: 这幅作品展示了书法的流畅和魅力——很显然这是一件真正的大师的作品。

original: §Y$TARGET$§! holds unlanded characters you care about captive, it is time to free them! If you win this war these characters will be freed. You might also be able to take hostages of our own. Any freed captives will be moved to your court or to the court of their rightful spouse.\n§RBeware, $TARGET$ might execute one or more of the captives if you attack!§!
translation: §Y$TARGET$§! 扣押着无地角色，你关心这些俘虏，是时候该解放他们了！如果你赢得了这场战争，这些人将会被释放，或者你也可以将他们劫持为自己的人质。任何被释放的俘虏都将转移到你的宫廷或者其合法配偶的宫廷之中。\n§R当心，$TARGET$如果被攻击，可能会处决一个或多个俘虏！§!

original: A new Governor arrives from China each time the old one dies. The Governor is always a competent steward.
translation: 每当上一任都护去世，中原就会派来一位新任都护。都护永远是称职的管理者。

original: We were misguided in raiding you - instead we shall serve!
translation: 我们是被误导来劫掠您的——为表歉意我们将为您服务！

original: The power of the council must be increased - and if war is what it takes, then war we will have!
translation: 内阁权力必须加强——如果战争是必要的，那么我们就开战！

original: I'm glad my tribute is deemed decent.
translation: 我很高兴我的进贡被认为是得体的。

original: Bear with us, [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName], as my scribes collect all your stories...!
translation: 忍一忍，[adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]，如果我的书吏要搜集你所有的故事的话……！

original: On the eve of [adventurous_spirit.GetHerHis] return from the [the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName], [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName] and I discuss at length [adventurous_spirit.GetChineseConvoTopic].\n'I'd also like to introduce you to someone', [adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe] says, smiling.
translation: [adventurous_spirit.GetFirstName]从[the_protector_general.Offmap.GetFullName]归来的当夜，[adventurous_spirit.GetHerHim]和我详细地讨论了[adventurous_spirit.GetChineseConvoTopic]。\n「我很乐于把你引荐给某些人。」[adventurous_spirit.GetSheHe]笑着说道。

original: Is NOT married or promised to be married
Is an adult, OR a close relative who is at least 12 years old
translation: 是成人，或你的12岁以上近亲
没有§Y无能§!，§Y近亲缺陷§!，或者§Y痴呆§!

original: Has one of these traits: §YArchitect§!, §YAdministrator§!, §YStrategist§!, §YScholar§!, or §YFaqih§!
translation: 拥有以下特质之一：§Y建筑师§!，§Y管理者§!，§Y策略家§!，§Y学者§!，或者§Y法基赫§!

original: Is a close relative of yours
Is a close relative of yours, OR of your dynasty
translation: 是你的近亲，或你的家族成员

original: Is an adult under the age of §Y45§!
translation: 是小于 §Y45§! 岁的成年人

original: Does NOT have an §YAscetic§! or §YCelibate§! trait
translation: 没有§Y苦行者§!或§Y独身主义者§!特质

original: All over the realm, word has spread of your prestigious building project. While some might be skeptical, most of your vassals are openly impressed with the scale of the planned tower.
translation: 在领地里，你的著名建筑项目的消息已经传开了。虽然有些人可能对此持怀疑态度，但你的大多数封臣都对计划中的塔楼规模印象深刻。

original: At least the Protector General offers [the_protector_general.GetHerHis] condolences.
Rumored to have belonged to the renowned Wu Zetian, Empress of China, this masterfully crafted silk shroud shimmers in the light and draws the attention of all who see it.
translation: 这件据传属于赫赫有名的女皇武则天，采用上好的丝绸制作的华丽寿衣，会发出荧荧的光，吸引每一个看见它的人的注意。

original: My council informs that the Chinese [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] has sent significant forces from the heart of the Middle Kingdom, to support their outlying regions in the West. Leaning over the war table, I can only hope that my silence instills confidence in my advisors. In my own chest, I feel a mild panic rising.
translation: 我的内阁告诉我，那位中国的[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]已经从中原派出大军，来支援他们偏远的西域。倾身在战事讨论桌上，我只能希望我的沉默能给我的顾问们注入信心。在我自己的胸口，我感到一种轻微的恐慌缓缓上升。

original: Imperial Chinese troops have arrived in the §YGansu§! corridor, near the province of §YJiuquan§!.
translation: 中华帝国的部队已抵达§Y河西§!走廊，靠近§Y酒泉§!。

original: The Imperial Chinese fleet has arrived with troops from the Indian ocean, near the province of §YSamatata§!.
translation: 中华帝国的舰队载着军队穿越印度洋，抵达了§Y三摩呾吒§!省附近！

original: Through years of careful strategic planning, repeated tactical brilliance, and a measure of luck that makes believers of us all, we have managed to whittle down the enemy armies! I am almost beginning to dream of victory, when my generals inform me that the Chinese [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] has dispatched more forces to the West.
translation: 通过多年的精心战略规划，一次次的战术胜利，和运气的衡量，让我们所有人都相信了，我们已经成功削弱了敌人的军队！我几乎开始梦想着取得胜利，这时我的将军告诉我中国皇帝[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]向西方派遣了更多的军队。

original: The §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! is stable and prospering, with the arrogant [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] convinced of their invincibility - you will prove them wrong!\n\nInvading China is no easy task - you will face the full might of their armies, while suffering a §R75%§! penalty to your §YLevy Reinforcement Rate§!. Winning means placing your §YDynasty§! on the Dragon Throne, and you will also receive vast spoils of war. If you lose your realm will be §Rshattered§!!
translation: §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!稳定且繁荣，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]相信他们天下无敌——你会证明他们是错的！\n\n入侵中国并非易事——你将面对他们的全部军队，同时你的§Y征召兵补员速度§!面临 §R75%§! 的惩罚。胜利意味着你的§Y家族§!登基龙椅，你获得丰厚的战利品。如果你输了你的领土将§R四分五裂§!！

original: The period of Unrest in China has dramatically worsened
translation: 中国的动荡时代正在急剧恶化

original: The Chinese Civil War is over and the last rebel bastion has fallen, yet the turmoil in the [offmap_china.GetFullName] is not over..
translation: 中国内战已经结束，最后一个叛军堡垒也被攻破，但[offmap_china.GetFullName]的混乱还没有完全平息

original: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]. China has recently been suffering from droughts and the people are starving as a Great Famine upsets the harmony in the Divine Land. The caravans and ships of the Silk Road have virtually ceased and the great Chinese artisans are simply trying to survive. China will not be able to assist its Tributary states.
translation: [FromFrom.GetChinaPreviousStatusEnd]。中国正在被旱灾侵袭。一场巨大的饥荒带来的无数饥民正在打破这片神州的安定。丝绸之路上的商旅和船队几乎绝迹，就连那些中国最优秀的能工巧匠也仅仅只能勉强维持生计。中国已经不再能够对它的朝贡国提供协助了。

original: Adopt a system of Chinese Imperialism which has one divine Emperor ruling over multiple vassals in a system of regulations and bureaucracy.
translation: 采用中华帝国制，在这种制度下至高无上的皇帝利用官僚制度和法律法规统治着许多封臣。

original: You will take on a new Temple Name.

With the death of [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName], [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] has been thrown into disarray. Many call for me to continue in the [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] ways as my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation] had intended but I am not so sure.
translation: 随着[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]过世，[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]陷入了混乱。许多人让我保持[FromFrom.Culture.GetName]的风格，正如我的[FromFrom.GetRootRelation]以前那样，但是我不确定是不是真的要这样。

original: I will take up the [FromFrom.Culture.GetName] traditions.
No. The time of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName] ended with my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation].
translation: 不，[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的时代已随着我[FromFrom.GetRootRelation]的离去而结束了。

original: This Casus Belli allows $VALUE$ warscore from battles for attackers
translation: 这个宣战理由允许进攻方从战斗中获取$VALUE$点战争分数

original: This Casus Belli allows $VALUE$ warscore from battles for defenders
translation: 这个宣战理由允许防御方从战斗中获取$VALUE$点战争分数

original: Proselytize: §GProvince can be converted. Current religion: §!§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!
translation: 传教：§G省份信仰可被转化。当前宗教：§!§Y[Root.Religion.GetName]§!

original: Proselytize: §GIndependent ruler can be converted. Current religion: §!§Y[Root.Holder.Religion.GetName]§!
translation: 传教：§G独立统治者信仰可被转化。当前宗教：§!§Y[Root.Holder.Religion.GetName]§!
被其他玩家控制的婚姻

original: §YYou do NOT currently decide who this character can marry!§!\nEnabling §YRestrict Marriages§! means that you will have full control over who this character marries even if they are landed. The character will not accept any incoming marriage offers, with the exception of those you send. Use this to ensure that your dynastic children and grandchildren get into marriages you approve of. Do note that marriages imposed by events and decisions are still allowed to happen.
translation: §Y你现在不能决定这个角色将与谁结婚！§!\n启用§Y限制婚姻§!意味着即使他们有封地，你也将完全控制他的婚姻。角色不会接受任何结婚提议，除了您发送的结婚提议。以此来确保你的家族后代只结下你认可的婚姻。注意，由事件和决议引发的婚姻仍然会发生。

original: §YYou currently decide who this character can marry!§!\nUnrestricting Marriages means that this character will be able to once again decide for themselves who to marry.
translation: §Y你现在可以决定这个角色可以结婚的人是谁！§!\n无限制的婚姻意味着这个角色将能够再次决定与谁结婚。

original: §RRestrict Marriage can NOT be enabled as they have been a ruler for more than $YEARS$ years§!
translation: §R限定婚姻无法启用，因为他们已经统治了超过 $YEARS$ 年§!

original: §RRestrict Marriage can NOT be enabled as they do not owe allegiance to you§!
translation: §R限定婚姻无法启用，因为他们不忠于你§!

original: Can't grant kingdoms and empires to characters with a different government
translation: 不能将王国和帝国头衔授予不同政体的角色

original: Can't grant kingdoms and empires to characters with a government from a different group
translation: 不能将王国和帝国头衔授予不同政体组的角色

original: Can't receive kingdoms and empires from characters with a different government
translation: 不能接受来自不同政体角色的王国和帝国

original: Can't receive kingdoms and empires from characters with a government from a different group
translation: 不能接受来自不同政体组角色的王国和帝国

original: §Y[RecipientExtra.GetTitledFirstName]§! is too important to send away
§Y[ThirdPartyCharacter.GetTitledFirstName]§! is too important to send away
Has NOT attempted to employ a smith in the past 2 years[Root.GetSmithCD]
translation: 过去的2年中没有尝试过雇佣铁匠[Root.GetSmithCD]

original: - you can employ a smith again on: §Y[This.employ_a_smith_cd.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: －你可以再次雇佣一个铁匠在：§Y[This.employ_a_smith_cd.GetExpiryDate]§!

original: You will be able to employ a smith at another time of your choosing.
translation: 你可以选择在另一个时间雇佣一名铁匠。
传教：§Y省份信仰已被转化。§!

original: I was struck with nervous excitement when [From.GetMasterMistressCap] [From.GetFirstName] announced that the [From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon] was nearing its completion. Today I have received the [From.GetMasterMistressCap] in my throne room. As [From.GetSheHe] unveils the armor rack, I find it almost impossible to breathe. 'What will you name her, my [Root.GetTitle]?'
translation: 当[From.GetFirstName]大师宣布[From.GetWeaponsmithWeapon]即将完成时，我兴奋得不能自制。今天我在宝座室接见了大师。在[From.GetSheHe]揭开铠甲架上的遮布时，我都快不能呼吸了。「您会怎样称呼她，我的[Root.GetTitle]大人？」

original: An artifact is added to your inventory.
translation: 一件宝物被放入你的宝库。

original: Come the evening things do not go as I planned. The food and drink is not to [FromFrom.GetFullName]'s taste and [FromFrom.GetSheHe] is obviously not enjoying [FromFrom.GetHerselfHimself]. The following morning [FromFrom.GetFullName] departs, likely to not speak highly of me to the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]. There will be no foreign treasures for me today...
translation: 今晚的事没有按我的计划进行。食物和饮料不合[FromFrom.GetFullName]的口味并且[FromFrom.GetSheHe]显然没有很享受这一切。第二天早上[FromFrom.GetFullName]出发时，表示很可能不会在[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]面前说我的好话。显然今天我得不到外国的珍品了……

original: The Bön faith has adopted many aspects of the Buddhist religion. You can choose to draw even closer to your §YEastern§! subjects by personally practicing their rites and partaking in their rituals.
translation: 苯教信仰采纳了佛教的许多方面。你可以亲自奉行礼仪并参加仪式，来更亲近你的§Y东方宗教§!臣民。

original: Has a §YCounty§!, §YVassal§! or §YLiege§! of an §YEastern Religion§!
translation: 有一个§Y省份§!，§Y封臣§!或§Y领主§!信仰§Y东方宗教§!
向拉特纳犹太商人借钱

original: I will repay the gold that I owe the Radhanites.
translation: 我会还清我欠拉特纳犹太人的钱。
从拉特纳犹太人那借到了钱

original: The Radhanite merchants have cordially asked you to pay back the money you owe to them. They inform you that there is no hurry, but you can clearly tell that they are disappointed by the fact that you have yet to pay them back. It also seems that, for whatever reason, the amount of Radhanite trade going through your realm has reduced significantly...
translation: 拉特纳犹太商人诚恳地请求你偿还你欠他们的钱。他们告知你，不急，但你可以清楚地意识到他们对你还没有还钱的事实感到很失望。似乎出于某种原因，流通过你领地的拉特纳犹太人交易量已经大幅减少……

original: I should have payed them back earlier...

translation: 小型拉特纳犹太人聚居地
大型拉特纳犹太人聚居地

original: Has a Demesne County with a §YSilk Road Trade Post§!
translation: 有直辖省份存在一个§Y丝路贸易站§!

original: Your messengers tell of a traveler who recently arrived in [tavern_location.GetName]. The traveler, a [traveling_teacher.Culture.GetName] Scholar by the name of [traveling_teacher.GetFullName], is apparently requesting an audience. [traveling_teacher.GetSheHeCap] claims to be a renowned teacher, willing to impart [traveling_teacher.GetHerHis] knowledge to one of your children!
translation: 你的使者说最近抵达[tavern_location.GetName]的旅客中，一位名为[travelling_teacher.GetFullName]的[travelling_teacher.Culture.GetName]学者和旅行者似乎是在请求你的接见。[travelling_teacher.GetSheHeCap]声称自己是一位知名的老师，愿意将[travelling_teacher.GetHerHis]知识传授给你的孩子！
有趣，将[traveling_teacher.GetHerHim]带到我的宫廷里！

original: I do not have time for this.
Bring [traveling_teacher.GetHerHim] over for a secluded dinner...
translation: 邀请[traveling_teacher.GetHerHim]享用一顿僻静的晚膳。

original: You invite the traveling teacher to your court.
translation: 你邀请旅行中的老师到你的宫廷。

original: You are not interested and turn the traveling teacher away.
translation: 你不感兴趣并拒绝了旅行中的老师。

original: You invite the teacher over for a private, secluded dinner.
translation: 你邀请老师享用一顿私人的，僻静的晚膳。

original: The traveling teacher bows before you and says: 'I humbly greet the [Root.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [Root.GetFirstName] of the [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName]! My name is [traveling_teacher.GetFullName], and I come with an offer. For a modest sum I would be willing to impart one of my many skills to your [child_to_be_taught.GetDaughterSon] [child_to_be_taught.GetFirstName], for I am a scholar of both Confucian classics and surgery!'
translation: 旅行的老师在你面前鞠躬，说道：「我诚挚地问候[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetFullName][Root.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][Root.GetFirstName]！鄙人名叫[traveling_teacher.GetFullName]，我带着一个提议而来。只要合适的金额，鄙人愿意传授我某个技能给您的[child_to_be_taught.GetDaughterSon][child_to_be_taught.GetFirstName]，不谦虚地说我可是儒家经典和外科手术方面的大家！」

original: Hm, can you teach [child_to_be_taught.GetHerHim] how to read faster?
translation: 呃，你可以教[child_to_be_taught.GetHerHim]如何更快的阅读吗？

original: I want you to teach [child_to_be_taught.GetHerHim] the Confucian classics!
translation: 我想让你教授[child_to_be_taught.GetHerHim]儒家经典！

original: The basics of surgery and poetry sound useful.
translation: 手术和诗歌的基础技巧听起来很有用。

original: My [child_to_be_taught.GetDaughterSon] is dull and apathetic, could you inspire [child_to_be_taught.GetHerHis] curiosity?
translation: 我的[child_to_be_taught.GetDaughterSon]既迟钝又冷漠，你能激起[child_to_be_taught.GetHerHis]好奇心吗？

original: What you are asking is outrageous, begone!
translation: 你提出的要求简直太离谱了，滚！
拉特纳犹太人青睐商路
拉特纳犹太人主要商路

original: A well-dressed merchant has requested an audience. The [radhanite_merchant.GetManWoman] presents [radhanite_merchant.GetHerselfHimself] as [radhanite_merchant.GetMasterMistress] [radhanite_merchant.GetFullName], a representative of the Jewish Radhanite merchants, and implores: 'We are seeking to set up an office in [radhanite_location.GetName], but lack the funds. If you would sponsor us, we would be eternally grateful!'.
translation: 一位穿着考究的商贾请求觐见。这个[radhanite_merchant.GetManWoman]称[radhanite_merchant.GetHerselfHimself]为[radhanite_merchant.GetFullName]大师，拉特纳犹太商人的代表，并恳求：「我们正寻求于[radhanite_location.GetName]设立办事处，但缺少资金。假如您愿意资助我们，我们将感激不尽！」

original: More trade is a good thing, I shall sponsor you.
translation: 更多的贸易是好事，我会赞助你的。

original: We should discuss my patronage over... dinner.
translation: 我们应该讨论一下我的赞助在……晚饭时候。

original: A shoddy office will not do, you shall govern [radhanite_location_barony.GetName]!
translation: 一个劣质的办事处可不行，你将治理[radhanite_location_barony.GetName]！

original: I am sorry, but I have no gold to spare.
translation: 我很抱歉，但我没有多余的钱了。

original: The Radhanite merchants set up a rudimentary trade office.
translation: 拉特纳犹太商人建立了一个初级贸易司。

original: Offer the Radhanites the city of [radhanite_location_barony.GetName], this will displease the vassal who currently resides there.
translation: 向拉特纳犹太人提供[radhanite_location_barony.GetName]城市，这会触怒目前居住该处的封臣。

original: You are not interested and turn the Radhanite merchant away.
translation: 你对此不感兴趣，并赶走了拉特纳犹太商人。

original:
To my new liege, [Root.GetTitledNameWithNick],

Blessings upon your house! I have decided to convert to the [Root.Religion.GetName] faith so that I may rule my new subjects as wisely as you rule yours.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致我的新君主，[Root.GetTitledNameWithNick]，

祝福您全家族！我已决定改信[Root.Religion.GetName]以便我可以像您那样明智地统治我的新臣民。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You have recently sent Famine Relief to China, if China is still suffering from a Famine you will be able to send another expedition on: §Y[Root.china_send_relief.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 您最近将饥荒救援物资送往中国，如果中国仍然存在饥荒，您将能够再次送出物资在：§Y[Root.china_send_relief.GetExpiryDate]§!

original: §YDesignate Heir§!\nBy designating this character you can make them your Primary Heir, overriding the preference of your current Succession Law. You can not designate an heir if you use an Elective Succession Law.
translation: §Y指定继承人§!\n通过指定这个角色，你可以让他成为你的第一继承人，取代你当前继承法的第一继承人。如果你使用选举继承法，则不能指定继承人。

original: Is NOT already fighting a §YForce Open§! war
translation: 没有在打一场§Y强迫开放§!战争

original: You have recently stopped Raiding China, you will be able to resume raiding on: §Y[Root.china_raid_grace_cd.GetExpiryDate]§!
translation: 你最近停止了劫掠中国，你将能够恢复劫掠在：§Y[Root.china_raid_grace_cd.GetExpiryDate]§!

original: This character has recently reflected upon the life of a beloved late family member.
translation: 这个角色最近回忆起了一个深受敬爱的已故家庭成员的一生。

original: This character is hard focuses on the tasks at hand rather than dwell in the feelings of the past.
translation: 这个角色努力地专注于手头的任务，而非停留在过去的感受中。

original: Our caravan has been camped by the roadside the whole day. The sky has been pouring over us with unusually heavy rain. The whole situation has brought my thoughts to the memories of my late [target_relative.GetRootRelation], [target_relative.GetFirstName].
translation: 我们的车队已经一整天露宿道旁。天空一直在下异常的倾盆大雨。整个情况将我的思绪带到了我记忆中已故的[target_relative.GetRootRelation]，[target_relative.GetFirstName]。

original: [target_relative.GetSheHeCap] was such a pious role model.
[target_relative.GetSheHeCap] was the bravest person I've known.
[target_relative.GetSheHeCap] could always tell right from wrong.
[target_relative.GetSheHeCap] was the wisest person I've known.
You burn incense to honor their memory and step outside to wash away your tears under the crying sky.
translation: 你烧香以纪念他们的过去，并走到哭泣的天空下洗去你的泪水。

original: I can't dwell in the past, I need to carry on forward.
translation: 我不能留恋过去，我需要继续前行。

original: The pleasant accommodation of previous nights has increased this character's well being and senses.
translation: 过去几夜愉快的住宿生活增进了这个角色的健康和神志。

original: This character is still plagued by pain and body ache from being poisoned.
translation: 这个角色因为中毒仍然饱受痛苦和身体疼痛的折磨。

original: A rider approached the caravan and handed me a letter with the seal of [target_host.GetBestName]. [target_host.GetFirstName] has heard of my travels and invites our party to rest for a while in the warmth of the [target_host.GetCapitalHolding] [target_host.Capital.Capital.GetName].
translation: 一名骑手走近车队并递给我一封带有[target_host.GetBestName]印章的信。[target_host.GetFirstName]听说了我的旅行，并邀请我们的队伍在温暖的[target_host.GetCapitalHolding][target_host.Capital.Capital.GetName]里休息一会儿。

original: This could prove to be an opportunity to get even.
translation: 这可能是一个获得公平的机会。

original: You utilize your rival's hospitality to set up a risky murder attempt on them.
translation: 你利用你的对手的好客来为他们布置一个冒险的谋杀计划。

original: A warm bed and a hot meal is most welcome.
translation: 温暖的床和热的饭菜是最受欢迎的。

original: Is my old rival prepared to bury the hatchet?
translation: 我的老对手是准备要跟我和解了吗？

original: You accept the invitation to the court of [target_host.GetTitledFirstName].
I prefer my tent as accommodation.
translation: 我更愿意住在我的帐篷里。

original: A warm hearth and healthy meals has invigorated the whole company, but after enjoying the hospitality of [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] for some days it's now time to get moving on our path towards [offmap_china.GetName] again.
translation: 一个温暖的炉灶和健康的饭菜使整个队伍精力充沛，但是在享受了几天[target_host.GetTitledFirstName]的热情招待之后，现在是时候再次朝着[offmap_china.GetName]的方向前进。

original: The previous days have certainly been a delight. I never imagined that we could have so many things in common. It's with regret that I bid farewell to [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] when we decide to move on towards our goal of [offmap_china.GetName].
translation: 前几天的相处十分愉悦。我从未想到我们可以有这么多共同点。当我们决定走向我们的目标[offmap_china.GetName]时，我很遗憾的告别了[target_host.GetTitledFirstName]。

original: We are presented with a deliciously looking meal when [target_host.GetTitledFirstName] raises [target_host.GetHerHis] chalice to honor us with a toast. Longing for a good drink I take a big gulp before I notice that [target_host.GetFirstName] turns [target_host.GetHerHis] chalice upside down emptying its content on the floor, laughing manically.
translation: 我们被给予了看起来很美味的食物，[target_host.GetTitledFirstName]高举[target_host.GetHerHis]高脚杯向我们敬酒。我渴望着这上佳的饮品并喝了一大口，之后我注意到[target_host.GetFirstName]将[target_host.GetHerHis]高脚杯颠倒并倒空了里面的东西到地板上，狂笑着。

original: Thank you for being an excellent host.
Thank you but we need to be on our way.
translation: 谢谢你，但是我们需要继续前进。

original: Regaining my conciousness I find myself in the ditch to the side of the road. In my pocket I discover a letter with the firmest handwriting reading 'This is your last warning, stay out of here!'.
translation: 当我的意识恢复时，我发现自己在路边的沟里。在我的口袋中，我发现了一封写着最强硬的字迹的信件：「这是对你的最后警告，滚出这里！」。

original: I have a terrible ache in my whole body.
translation: 我的全身都疼得快不行了。

original: You turn over and empty your bowels in the ditch.
translation: 你翻转过来，往沟里清空了你的肠子。

original: 'Trust is such a delicate thing', I tell my horse galloping away in the dark night, accompanied by the sound of screams and clattering plates while panic ensues behind us. Some of my servants also had to put their life to it for the whole charade to be believable, but that is an acceptable price to pay.
translation: 「信任是如此微妙的事情。」在我骑着马在黑暗中疾驰时，伴随着恐惧的尖叫和盘子摔碎的声音，我对它这么说道。为了把这出戏编的更逼真，我的几个仆人也丢掉了性命，不过这点代价还是值得的。

original: Just as you are about to make your escape into the dead of the night you are apprehended by the Captain of the guard. Sweat started forming on the temples of your head. Any second now.\nThere's the bellowing scream of [target_host.GetTitledFirstName]'s guts exploding. For a split second you notice the shock in the face of the Captain, as someone exclaims that the [target_host.GetTitle] is dead. Then his eyes refocus on you. Without hesitation, the burly man raises his sword and cuts you in half.
translation: 就在你即将趁着夜黑风高逃掉的时候，你被守卫队长抓住了。你头顶开始冒出豆大的冷汗。时候快到了。\n[target_host.GetTitledFirstName]撕心裂肺的惨叫声传来。当有人惊呼[target_host.GetTitle]死了的那一刹那，你发现卫队长脸上满是震惊。这个猛汉转头死瞪着你，毫不犹豫的的抽出他的剑把你劈成了两半。

original: During the dinner, [target_host.GetTitledFirstName], exclaims that [target_host.GetSheHe] has a present for you. Seconds later a man with an arrow sticking out of his back is dragged into the room. With fear you immediately recognize the man from your company that you ordered to assassinate [target_host.GetFirstName]. With a finger pointed towards your head [target_host.GetFirstName] shouts 'I sentence you all to die for your treachery!'. From every corner of the room, guards with drawn weapons are closing a circle fast around your band.
translation: 晚宴期间，[target_host.GetTitledFirstName]，宣布 [target_host.GetSheHe]为你准备了一份礼物。少顷，一名背部中箭的男子被拖进了房间。惊恐的你立刻意识到他是你派去刺杀[target_host.GetTitledFirstName]的团队中的一员。[target_host.GetTitledFirstName]用一根手指直指你的脑袋大吼道：「因为你们的叛逆行为，我判处你们所有人死刑！」。卫兵们利刃出鞘，从房间的角落间冲出并将你们一行人团团围住。

original: [target_host.GetSheHeCap] should have known better than to trust me.

The journey to visit the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] of [offmap_china.GetName] and show my subservience will take months if not even years. I take my farewells to my near and dear and prepare the caravan for departure.
translation: 去[offmap_china.GetName]觐见[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]以及表示我的恭顺的旅行将会花费数月，或许数年。我向亲人和近臣告别然后准备车队出发。

original: Our company has finally reached the central lands of the [offmap_china.GetFullName]. The Middle Kingdom in all its magnificence lay before us with so much to experience.
translation: 我们的队伍终于到达了[offmap_china.GetFullName]的中心地带。中国的富丽堂皇展现在我们面前，有无数的事物等待我们体验。

original: Let us walk lest I forget about the reason for the journey.
translation: 让我们进去吧，别忘记了此行的目的。

original: I'm out on a walk in a beautiful park in the Middle Kingdom when I spot a group of people, intensely focused, gathered up around a square board with circular pieces in black and white.
translation: 我在中国的一个美丽的公园里散步，然后我看到一群人围绕着一块方形木板和许多黑色与白色的圆子，显得十分专注。

original: Let me show you how it's done.
I'll just enjoy the park instead.
The high priest started the ceremony right as I get inside the Taoist temple. The disciples enter a meditation to bring themselves into harmony with the cosmos.
translation: 当我进入道观时，观主开始了仪式。道士们进入冥想以使自己与宇宙和谐，达到天人合一的状态。

original: Study their rituals from a distance.
translation: 从远处学习他们的仪式。
大声批评他们的错误的宗教。

original: Study the symbolism used in their texts.
translation: 学习在他们的文章中使用的象征手法。

original: 'The [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] has kept [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] eyes on you', the Chief Minister says. '[offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap] is however very busy and thought it more fitting if you bowed in here instead of the occupied throne room'.
translation: 「[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress][offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis]双眼已经看到你了，」首辅大人说道，「不过[offmap_china.Ruler.GetSheHeCap]很忙，所以觉得你在这里鞠躬而不是在拥挤的金銮殿更合适。」

original: 'The [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] has kept [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] eyes on you', the Chief Minister says. 'You may enter the throne room to show your subordination, but be quick about it'.
translation: 「[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]已经注意到你了」，丞相说，「你可以入殿表示臣服，但要干净利落」。

original: The Chief Minister opens the doors to the throne room nodding for me to enter. After I've performed a deep bow in sign of subservience the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] reaches out and touches my forehead.
translation: 首辅大人打开了金銮殿的大门，点头示意我进去。在我深深地鞠躬以示谦卑之后，[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]伸手触摸了我的额头。

original: Bow before the depiction of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress].
Refuse this humiliation and storm out of the room.
translation: 拒绝这种羞辱并拂袖而去。

original: Hastily perform the kowtow before the silent [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress].
This character is currently traveling to China.
translation: 这个角色目前正在中国旅行。

original: This character has completed a journey to China to show their subordination to the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] - the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] was not impressed...
translation: 这个角色完成了去往中国的旅程并表示了他要臣服于[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]——但[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]对他没有什么印象。

original: This character has completed a journey to China to show their subordination to the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] - the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] was very pleased.
translation: 这个角色完成了去往中国的旅程并表示了他要臣服于[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]——[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]很高兴。

original: This character has completed a journey to China to show their subordination to the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] - the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] was greatly impressed!
translation: 这个角色完成了去往中国的旅程并表示了他要臣服于[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]——[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]对他留下了深刻的印象。

original: I cannot continue on my journey towards [offmap_china.GetFullName] since a state of hostility has occurred.
translation: 自从变成敌对状态以来，我无法继续我前往[offmap_china.GetFullName]的旅程。

original: I cannot continue on my journey towards [offmap_china.GetFullName] after they decided to close their borders and oust foreigners.
translation: 在他们决定封锁边界并赶走外国人之后，我无法继续我前往[offmap_china.GetFullName]的旅程。

original: I cannot continue on my journey towards [offmap_china.GetFullName].
translation: 我无法继续我前往[offmap_china.GetFullName]的旅程。

original: Has NOT already shown their subservience towards the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]
translation: 并没有表现出他们要臣服于[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]的姿态。

original: Journey to the inner lands of the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§! and bow before the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress] in an act of servitude. Performing a Kowtow will earn you §GGrace§! with the §Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!, but it will cost you §RPrestige§! to do so.
translation: 去§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!腹地的旅行和向[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]鞠躬是恭顺的行为。跪拜礼将给你赢得§Y[offmap_china.GetFullName]§!的§G皇恩§!，但是这么做也会话花费你的§R威望§!。

original: This might reflect §Rpoorly§! on you, in the eyes of the Emperor.
translation: 在天子眼中，这可能反映了你的表现§R不好§!。

original: This might reflect §Gwell§! on you, in the eyes of the Emperor.
translation: 在天子眼中，这可能反映了你的表现§G很好§!。

original: You start to travel on the imperial roads towards the celestial palace.
translation: 你开始沿着御道前往皇宫。

original: Set days of looting hostility with $WHO|Y$ to $DAYS|Y$
translation: 因劫掠而与$WHO|Y$敌对的日期设为 $DAYS|Y$

original: Not allowed to play §YTaoist§! characters without the Rajas of India DLC or the Jade Dragon DLC!
translation: 没有「印度罗阇」或者「碧玉之龙」DLC，那么将不能扮演§Y道教§!角色！

original: §Y$PLAYER$§! not allowed to play §YTaoist§! characters without the Rajas of India DLC or the Jade Dragon DLC!
translation: §Y$PLAYER$§!没有「印度罗阇」或「碧玉之龙」DLC，不能扮演§Y道教§!角色！

original: Not allowed to play §YDharmic§! religions without the Rajas of India DLC!
translation: 没有印度罗阇DLC，你不能扮演§Y达摩§!宗教！

original: §Y$PLAYER$§! not allowed to play §YDharmic§! religions without the Rajas of India DLC!
translation: §Y$PLAYER$§! 没有印度罗阇DLC，不能扮演§Y达摩§!宗教角色！

original: The §YDharmic§! religions are not playable without the Rajas of India DLC
translation: §Y达摩§!宗教角色在没有印度罗阇DLC的情况下不可扮演

original: The §YTaoist§! religion is not playable without the Rajas of India DLC or Jade Dragon DLC
translation: §Y道教§!角色在没有「印度罗阇」或「碧玉之龙」DLC的情况下不可扮演

original: Law changes cost Piety if the Council is abolished
translation: 如果内阁被废除，变更法律将花费虔诚

original: Law changes cost Prestige if the Council is abolished
translation: 如果内阁被废除，变更法律将花费威望

original: No Count or higher tier vassal of this title has a negative opinion of you
translation: 在这个头衔之下没有伯爵或更高等级的封臣对你好感度为负

original: I really must request that my [bear_character.GetRootRelation] [bear_character.GetFirstName] take up quarters not immediately adjacent to my own. I love [bear_character.GetHerHim] dearly, but the sheer volume of [bear_character.GetHerHis] snoring is becoming quite unbearable.
translation: 我必须要求我的[bear_character.GetRootRelation][bear_character.GetFirstName]住得离我远一点了。虽然我深爱着[bear_character.GetHerHim]，但是我再也忍受不了[bear_character.GetHerHis]太多太大的呼噜声了。

original: It would be rude to insist.

I brushed past [bear_character.GetFirstName] on my way to the royal stables this afternoon. Though it was an impolite thought, the close contact left me struck with just how hirsute my [bear_character.GetRootRelation]'s figure is.
translation: 在今天下午去王家马厩的路上，我与[bear_character.GetFirstName]擦肩而过。尽管这个念头很是无礼，近距离接触还是让我对我的[bear_character.GetRootRelation]的毛发厚重的身体留下了深刻的印象。

original: Good thing it doesn't run in the family.
translation: 幸运的是它没有在家族中流传下去。

original: Well, it must be practical in the winter season.
translation: 好吧，它一定会在冬季里派上用场

original: [bear_character.GetFirstName] is known to be a [bear_character.GetManWoman] of few words. No words, in fact. They say silence is golden, but sometimes a [Root.GetManWoman] finds [Root.GetHerselfHimself] in dire need of a good conversation!
translation: [bear_character.GetFirstName]被认为是一个沉默寡言的[bear_character.GetManWoman]。事实上，它一个字也不会说。人们常说沉默是金，但有时，一个[Root.GetManWoman]会发现[Root.GetHerselfHimself]极度渴望一场酣畅淋漓的交谈！

original: I will seek the clergy's council instead.
translation: 我要去那个神职人员的宫廷找找。

original: A mysterious honey-thief has been terrorizing the court of late. At seemingly random intervals, all of the honey in our royal kitchen will go missing, often with the pantry cupboards left open and the jars smashed. Thus far, no one has been able to determine the identity of this syrup stealer.
translation: 一位神秘的蜂蜜盗贼让宫廷里人心惶惶。毫无任何征兆地，王宫厨房里的橱柜被打开而罐子被砸碎，所有蜂蜜都会不翼而飞。到目前为止，仍没有人可以确认这名糖浆窃贼的身份。

original: I trust my Marshal to find the thief.
translation: 我相信我的军事总管会找到那个小偷。

original: I trust my Spymaster to get to the bottom of this.
translation: 我相信我的间谍总管能够做到这一点。

original: [bear_character.GetFirstName] sat for a portrait this week. The colours are quite vivid, but poor [bear_character.GetFirstName]'s nose came out distractingly prominent in the likeness. I had a mind to complain to the painter about their lack of proportion, but [bear_character.GetFirstName] does have a rather unusually generous nose, come to think of it.
translation: [bear_character.GetFirstName]这周要被画一幅肖像画。画面的色彩栩栩如生，但可怜的[bear_character.GetFirstName]的鼻子在画像上几乎疯狂地突起。我想要向画家抱怨他的画比例不对，但细想起来，[bear_character.GetFirstName]确实有一个相当不同寻常的饱满鼻子。
有些人可能会说它庄严。

original: At the latest banquet, after polishing off four pots of stew, three whole trout, and an entire shank of lamb, [bear_character.GetFirstName] was, as is [bear_character.GetHerHis] wont, trundling off to [bear_character.GetHerHis] chambers to retire - when [bear_character.GetHerHis] vestments caught on the raw edge of a table! Before a courtier could come to [bear_character.GetHerHis] assistance, the cloth was torn open, ripping straight up to the collar and leaving poor [bear_character.GetFirstName] utterly exposed before the entire hall!\nIf that wasn't scandal enough, the party-goers were struck mute with an astonishing realization: [bear_character.GetFirstName] was most irrefutably not a [bear_character.GetManWoman] at all... but a bear.
translation: 在最近的宴会上，[bear_character.GetFirstName]在飞快吞咽完四锅炖汤，三条鲑鱼，一整只羔羊腿之后，就按照[bear_character.GetHerHis]惯例，踱步到[bear_character.GetHerHis]房间去休息——这时[bear_character.GetHerHis]礼服被桌子边缘挂住了！在廷臣赶来帮助[bear_character.GetHerHis]之前，布料就被撕开了，裂缝直达领口，并让可怜的[bear_character.GetFirstName]完全裸露在整个大厅中！\n如果这还够不上丑闻的话，宴会来宾们默默的明白了一个令人震惊的事实：毫无疑问，[bear_character.GetFirstName]完全不是一个[bear_character.GetManWoman]……而是一头熊。

original: Is this the work of a foul sorcerer?
translation: 这是一个下作的巫师干的好事吗？

original: We need a tailor capable of beclothing the ursine form.
translation: 我们需要一位能给熊做衣服的裁缝。

original: This explains all that missing honey...
It's going to eat me! Unless I eat it first...
translation: 它会吃掉我的！除非我先吃掉……

original: Shoot it and mount its head on a wall.
translation: 射杀它，并把头装饰在墙上。

original: §RWill cause you to be considered a Kinslayer!§!
translation: §R将导致你被认为是弑亲禽兽！§!

original: $PERC$: The Attacker Controls all their Holdings
$PERC$: The Defender Controls all their Holdings
A basic set of mail horse armor to shield your trusty steed.
translation: 一套基本的马链甲来保护您可靠的马。

original: This set of horse armor is a very sturdy set of mail designed to protect its bearer.
translation: 这套马甲由非常坚固的铁锁制成，旨在保护它的穿戴者。

original: This enamoring set of golden horse armor is a masterpiece worthy of any Noble's stallion.
translation: 这套迷人的金马护甲就是一个杰作，它配得上任何高贵的马匹。

original: A strong set of armor with an intricate design, it will shield its wearer.
translation: 一套设计复杂而强大的护甲，会保护披甲者。

original: Boasting a beautiful and ornate design, this armor will keep your steed safe.
translation: 这幅装甲有着优雅且华丽的设计，并且能保障你的马匹的安全。

original: My trusty and loyal steed [From.GetFirstName] is likely to be the target of all manner of malicious attacks by my enemies to destabilize my rule... I could have my smiths forge [From.GetHerHim] a set of armor to aid in protecting my most precious companion.
translation: 我的信赖和忠诚的骏马[From.GetFirstName]很可能会成为敌人为了破坏我的统治而发起的各种恶意攻击的目标……我可以让我的铁匠为[From.GetHerHim]打造一套盔甲来帮助保护我最宝贵的同伴。

original: Only the finest armor can protect my precious [From.GetFirstName]!
translation: 只有最好的护甲才能保护我的宝贝[From.GetFirstName]！

original: A strong set of armor will keep [From.GetHerHim] safe.
translation: 一套强大的盔甲将保证[From.GetHerHim]的安全。

original: It is imperative that [From.GetSheHe] has a basic set for protection.
translation: [From.GetSheHe]迫切需要一套基本的保护措施。

original: [From.GetFirstName] will survive without a personal set of armor.
§Y*§! Follows the special Temple Name convention of naming rulers\n§Y*§! Is limited to non-elective succession laws
translation: §Y*§! 遵照命名统治者的特殊庙号惯例\n§Y*§! 仅限使用非选举继承法

original:
Under Chinese Imperialism you:
§Y*§! Can hold cities
§Y*§! Do not care if others do not follow your religion nor can you demand their conversion
§Y*§! Do not get opinion penalties with vassals of other government types
§Y*§! Can not create or usurp Empires
§Y*§! Follow the special Temple Name convention of naming rulers
§Y*§! Are limited to non-elective succession laws
translation:
在中华帝国制下：
§Y*§! 你可以持有城市地产
§Y*§! 不在乎别人是否信仰你的宗教，也不能要求他们改信
§Y*§! 不会受到封臣错误的统治类型好感惩罚
§Y*§! 无法创建或篡夺帝国
§Y*§! 遵照命名统治者的特殊庙号惯例
§Y*§! 仅限使用非选举继承法

original: 'Council!', I yell, making some courtiers scurry away from me, while others approach, slowly. I am their [Root.GetTitle], after all... 'It is time we talk about how to best preserve my ideas, for our descendants'. They nod and exchange nervous glances, while I consider my decision. What should be my legacy...?
translation: 「内阁！」我大叫道，几个廷臣匆匆跑开，其余的慢慢靠过来，毕竟我可是他们的[Root.GetTitle]……「是时候讨论为后代留下我的思想的记录了。」当我考虑我的决定时，他们点头并交换紧张的目光。我的遗赠将会是……？

original: When I inform my council of my intentions to compose a piece of literature, they nod eagerly. 'Naturally, my wise [Root.GetLordLady], anything else would be doing your people a disservice!' The council member's face reddens, as I brush off the compliment. 'What topic will you be treating?' another continues.
translation: 当我通知我的内阁我有意撰写一本书时，他们热切地点头。「当然，我智慧的[Root.GetLordLady]，没有别的能比这个对人民更有裨益！」我打断了这些恭维的话，我的阁员瞬间尴尬的脸红，「您打算选择什么主题呢？」另一位说道。

original: I had an urge today, to compose a book. When I suggest it to my council, they look a mixture of confused and amused. 'Get me the scribes!', I say, ignoring their bewilderment. 'Of course, my [Root.GetLordLady]. And what shall this great treatise be about...?'.
translation: 我今天有一个愿望，写一本书！当我向我的内阁提出这个问题时，他们看上去困惑的样子真好笑。「让我的书吏过来！」我忽略他们的困惑，大声说道。「当然，我的[Root.GetLordLady]，请问这篇伟大的著作是关于……？」

original: To compose a work of literature is not an undertaking for everyone. Having spent a lot of time thinking it over, I have summoned my closest advisors and fetched the best scribes. When they ask me what this work shall be focused on, I pause, but only for a second.
translation: 撰写文学作品并不是每个人都能胜任的。我考虑了很久，决定叫来的我最亲密的顾问和最好的书吏来讨论这个问题。当他们问起我这本书的主要内容时，我停顿了一秒，回答道……

original: I will be tackling the complexity of war... Or something along those lines.
translation: 我将论述战争的复杂性……或者是相关的内容。
你选择了一个§Y军事§!主题。\n

original: It should be about the intricacies of relationships.
translation: 这本书应该用来记录错综复杂的人际关系。

original: You choose a theme relating to §YDiplomacy§! or §YIntrigue§!.\n
translation: 你选择了一个§Y外交§!或§Y密谋§!主题。\n

original: I will write about managing a realm....
translation: 我想写一些管理领地的心得……

original: You choose a theme relating to §YStewardship§!.\n
translation: 你选择了一个§Y管理§!主题。\n

original: Something in honor of [Root.Religion.GetHighGodName], or... Something educational?
You choose a theme relating to §YLearning§!.\n
translation: 你选择了一个§Y学识§!主题。\n

original: I just want to move my readers.
translation: 我只是想打动我的读者。

original: Not an eye will be dry!\n.
I shall chronicle my family history, of course.
translation: 当然是编写家族的历史。

original: Glory to the house of [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] – you choose a theme not relating to any particular attribute.\n
translation: 荣耀归于[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族——你选择的主题无关于任何属性。\n

original: With help of their scribes, this character is currently working on a piece of literature.
translation: 在书吏的帮助下，这个角色目前正在撰写一篇文献。

original: 'My [Root.GetLordLady]' begins a note from my [Root.GetChancellorName], [advisor_target.GetTitledFirstName]. 'The writing of your manuscript has come to a halt. Our eldest scholar and most experienced scribe has passed away...'  [advisor_target.GetSheHeCap] recommends investing in more scribes, or risk a lowered quality of work.
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]啊！」我的[Root.GetChancellorName]，[advisor_target.GetTitledFirstName]提醒道，「你手稿的书写停止了，我们最年长的学者和最有经验的书吏都去世了……」[advisor_target.GetSheHeCap]建议您聘请更多的书吏，或者承受作品品质下降的风险。

original: 'My [Root.GetLordLady]' begins a note from my council. 'The writing of your tome has come to a halt. Our eldest scholar and most experienced scribe has passed away. My recommended course of action is to invest in more scribes, or risk a lowered quality of work'.
translation: 「我的[Root.GetLordLady]啊！」我的顾问提醒道，「关于您的书，我们最年长的学者和最有经验的书吏都去世了。建议您聘请更多的书吏，或者承受作品品质下降的风险。」

original: I think you will manage just fine with the resources still at hand.
translation: 我认为你手头的资源已经足够了。

original: This has a chance of §Graising§! the quality of your work.\n
translation: 这有可能§G提升§!你的写作品质\n

original: This has a risk of §Rlowering§! the quality of your work.\n
translation: 这可能会§R降低§!你的写作品质\n

original: This option is available because you have the trait §YErudite§!\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y博学§!特质\n

original: This option is available because you have the trait §YScholar§!\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y学者§!特质\n

original: This option is available because you have the trait §YMastermind Theologian§!\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y神学的大师§!特质\n

original: This option is available because you have the trait §YLunatic§!\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y精神错乱§!特质\n

original: This option is available because you have one or more of the traits §YDull§!, §YSlow§!, or §YImbecile§!\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有§Y笨拙§!，§Y迟钝§!，或§Y痴呆§!中的一个或多个特质\n

original: My scribes have provided me with the latest draft of my book. Upon reading it, I am not convinced it is moving in the right direction. I could perhaps ask [friendly_advice_target.GetTitledName] for advice on the matter – if nothing else, [friendly_advice_target.GetSheHe] is likely to feel flattered by it.
translation: 关于我那本书，书吏把最新稿件递给我。我来回地看了几遍，始终没法保证我这个思路是对的。也许我可以听听[friendly_advice_target.GetTitledName]的建议——相信我这么做的话，[friendly_advice_target.GetSheHe]一定会感到受宠若惊吧。

original: I'd rather not get anyone else involved in this highly personal work...!
translation: 这是我的作品，我不允许其他人插手！

original: Having invested myself in this literary endeavor, I have been feeling drained lately. When my scribes ask me what the next section of the book should be about, I throw my hands out in the air. How should I know? You cannot rush these things – I need inspiration!
translation: 我投身于文学创作已经有一段时间了，但我最近感觉自己的灵感已经枯竭。我的书吏询问我下一个章节时，我把手伸向空中，我怎么知道啊？你不要再逼问我这些事情了！——我需要灵感！

original: Perhaps I'll indulge in some late night festivities with my soldiers!
translation: 也许我会和我的士兵深夜纵情狂欢！

original: Spending time among the commoners could be inspirational, even if some soldiers are known be a rowdy lot...
translation: 花点时间在平民身上可以鼓舞人心，即便有些士兵非常粗鲁……

original: I could probably ask [my_doctor.GetFirstName] for some kind of... draught.
translation: 也许我可以找[my_doctor.GetFirstName]要些……药剂。

original: Your physician §Y[my_doctor.GetTitledFirstName]§! does not recommend mind-altering potions...\n
translation: 你的医生§Y[my_doctor.GetTitledFirstName]§!不建议使用心情转换药水……\n

original: I clearly just need a break...
translation: 很显然，我需要休息一下……

original: On a break from working on my book, I have been sitting for hours in the courtyard, watching knights ride at the quintain. I am certain that I am about to grasp some kind of insight from the repeated motions, yet my head is only filled with the pounding of horses hooves. Suddenly, the flicker of torches makes me realize night has fallen.
translation: 在写书过程中的闲暇时间里，我在庭院里坐了好几个小时，看着骑士们骑着马突刺靶子。我确信我能从这反复的动作中领悟到某种灵感，然而我的脑袋里只塞满马蹄声。突然，火炬的闪烁使我意识到夜幕已经降临。

original: My head is filled with thoughts of my book, so I thought I would find some kind of distraction in a collection of old letters. After some puzzlement, I realize that they are the correspondence of the realm's old chancellor. I have to take a deep breath to calm my excitement...!
translation: 我因为考虑写作的事情而感到心烦意乱，所以我抱着转换心情的想法去阅读了一些收藏的旧信。令人惊讶的是，我发现这些信是跟王国的老外交总管之间的往来信件。我深深呼吸了一下以平复自己激动的心情……！

original: Having spent all day walking the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], checking in with every department of my administration, I had been hoping for a surge of inspiration in regards to my literary endeavor. Suddenly, I happen upon a construction site, the men hard at work – perhaps they could use a hand!
translation: 我花上整天来视察[Root.GetCapitalHolding]，检查我管理机构的每个部门，希望以这种方法在文学创作的事业上获得启示。突然，我撞见了一处建筑工地，那些努力工作的工人——或许他们可以提供帮助！

original: I've been bothering my [Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]s for weeks, trying to gleam some insight into the work of proper scholars. Today, one suggested that secluding myself in prayer, at the highest peak of the [Root.GetCapitalHolding], could be a shortcut to inspiration.
translation: 我因为我的[Root.GetMyLordSpiritualName]而困惑好几周了，试图在伟大学者的著作中找到一些启发。今天，有人建议我应该在[Root.GetCapitalHolding]的最高点隐居祷告，这可能是发现灵感的捷径。

original: While my book is coming along, I still feel like there is something missing from its pages... 'We do have more records, my [Root.GetLordLady]. Details of the [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName], you might say – but we'd have to spend some time digging out in the graveyard...' the master scribes informs me.
translation: 尽管我的书就快要完成了，但我仍然觉得有什么地方不够……「我们确实有更多记录，我的[Root.GetLordLady]。你可能想要关于[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族的细节——但我们得在墓地挖上一段时间。」书吏主管告诉我。

original: I could do this all night. Maybe I should...!
I am not afraid of getting my hands dirty.
translation: 我可不害怕弄脏我的手。

original: I probably need to sleep on this.
What a preposterous idea! Surely, you jest?
translation: 多么荒谬的想法！你在开玩笑吗？

original: You develop a cold of some sort, from being out in the cold all night.\n
translation: 你在寒风中呆了一晚，得了某种风寒。

original: Everyone knows that I have spent [Root.GetTimeItTookToWriteBook] directing the work on my book, when today, I am presented with the final product. [Root.GetExpectationOfWork]
translation: 大家都知道我已经花费了[Root.GetTimeItTookToWriteBook]去写书。今天，这本书终于完成了。[Root.GetExpectationOfWork]

original: My scribes have finished the book! I shall call it [new_book.GetName]. It's a bit [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork], I'm told.
translation: 我的书吏终于完成了这本书！我会叫它《[new_book.GetName]》。有人告诉我有些[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]。

original: My scribes have finished the book! I shall call it [new_book.GetName]. It's a bit [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork], I'm told.
translation: 我的书吏已经写完了这本书！书名是[new_book.GetName]。有人告诉我有些[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]。

original: I suppose we got a little sidetracked...
This has been worth all the hard work.
Yet, perhaps I should have dedicated it to the demons in my head...?
translation: 然而，也许我应该把它献给我头脑中的恶魔……？

original: I am just glad we finished it before I left this earthly realm.
translation: 我很高兴我们能在我离开尘世之前完成它。

original: Perhaps I have found my calling?
translation: 也许我找到了我的使命？

original: the better part of a lifetime
I am admittedly, a bit disappointed in my scribes. '[new_book.GetName]' is not exactly what I had in mind.
translation: 我承认，我对我的书吏有点失望。《[new_book.GetName]》并不令我满意。

original: 'This is not bad', I murmur, to the relief of my scribes.
translation: 「还好」，我咕哝道，让我的书吏松了口气。

original: The scribes are almost crying in relief, and I am in nothing short of awe of our hard work.
translation: 书吏们宽慰得几乎要哭了，这让我对我们的辛勤工作充满敬畏。

original: Frankly, I find myself a little disappointed in my scribes, but I also blame myself. 'It's a bit [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork], is it not?' I mutter.
translation: 坦率地说，我发现我对自己的书吏们有点失望，不过我也同样感到自责。「这有点[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]，不是吗？」我嘀咕道。

original: I am not sure what I was expecting, but '[new_book.GetName]' is certainly.... something?
translation: 我不知道我在期待什么，但《[new_book.GetName]》肯定是……有些价值的？

original: 'Excellent!' I commend my scribes, while I gently leaf through '[new_book.GetName]'.
translation: 「太好了！」我称赞了我的书吏，然后轻轻翻阅着《[new_book.GetName]》。

original: I stare at the book, '[new_book.GetName]'. My scribes are silent, exchanging awkward glances.
translation: 我盯着这本书，《[new_book.GetName]》。我的书吏沉默了，我们交换着尴尬的目光。

original: '[new_book.GetName], huh?' I scratch my chin, almost surprised that work has finally been finished.
translation: 「《[new_book.GetName]》，是吧？」我搔搔下巴，惊讶作品终于完成了。

original: Smiling broadly, I can't help but swell with a sense of well-deserved pride.
translation: 我无法抑制内心产生的巨大自豪感而露出了一个大大的笑容。

original: It's not exactly what I expected...!
§Y[new_book.GetName]§! has been added to your Treasury.\n
An extensive instruction manual for the aspiring swordsman, written by [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName].
translation: 一本由[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]撰写，给希望成为剑客的人提供全方位指导的手册。

original: A humble instruction manual for the aspiring bowman, written by [Root.GetTitledName].
translation: 为有抱负的弓箭手写的一本简单的指导手册，[Root.GetTitledName]著。
