original: The ingenuity of [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] military, as seen through the eyes of a [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] in charge of them. An inspiration to any military unit.
translation: [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]军事上的创造力，透过执掌他们的[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]的视角观察。这对所有军事单位都具有启发性。

original: A down-to-earth retelling of a young [From.OriginalOwner.GetManWoman] joining the army. Surprisingly moving.
translation: 一位年轻[From.OriginalOwner.GetManWoman]参军的接地气故事，十分的令人感动。

original: An in-depth accounting of contemporary armor types and best practices.
translation: 深入研究当代盔甲类型和实用性最佳者。

original: Drawing upon [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] own experiences within the military, this is mostly a recounting of various battles.
translation: 主要根据[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]军旅经历，描绘了各式各样的战役。

original: Drawing upon [Root.GetHerHis] own experiences within the military, this is mostly a recounting of various battles in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
translation: 主要根据[Root.GetHerHis]自己的军旅经历，描绘了[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的各式各样的战役。

original: Composed by [Root.GetBestName] as an instruction manual for close combat fighting, this book is a reliable source of information for anybody interested in the fighting style of a [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] duelist.
translation: 由[Root.GetBestName]创作，用作近距离战斗指导手册，任何对[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]决斗者的战斗风格感兴趣的人，都可以把此书看作可靠的信息来源。

original: A compilation of several chapters, each focusing on different weapons and fighting techniques that were common in the era of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName].
translation: 汇编了几个篇章，每章重点介绍[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]时代常见的不同武器和战斗技巧。

original: This manuscript instructs and describes [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] swordsmanship in detail, with comprehensive step-by-step illustrations.
translation: 这份手稿详细地描述了[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]的剑术，并附有详尽的步骤插图。

original: This tome dedicates chapter upon chapter to highlighting the strengths of [Root.Government.GetName] tactics of war. A subjective matter, some argue.
translation: 这部著作每一章都强调了[Root.Government.GetName]战术的优越性。有些人认为这是主观看法。

original: This tome contains multiple chapters highlighting the many strengths of [Root.Government.GetName] tactics of war. While educational, critics argue that it's a bit [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork].
translation: 这本书有多个章节突出强调了[Root.Government.GetName]战争策略的诸多优势。虽能使人获益良多，但是有些批评者们认为此书有一点[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]。

original: In this manuscript, [From.OriginalOwner.GetName] discusses [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] least favorite things about meeting a personal enemy on the field.
translation: 在这份手稿中，[From.OriginalOwner.GetName]谈论到在战场上遇到[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]仇人是最令其讨厌的事情。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] has long feuded with [dedication_target.GetBestName]. In this rare and personal history, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] spends page upon page listing noteworthy events and lessons from their complicated relationship.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]长期与[dedication_target.GetBestName]不和。在这本罕见而私人的历史记录中，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]花费了大量的笔墨，从他们之间复杂的人际关系出发，罗列了许多值得注意的事件和教训。

original: Lessons Taught Me By My Enemy

[From.OriginalOwner.GetName] has long feuded with certain people. In this rare and personal history, [From.OriginalOwner.GetSheHe] spends page upon page listing noteworthy events and lessons from several complicated relationship.
translation: [From.OriginalOwner.GetName]长期与某人不和。在这本罕见而私人的历史记录中，[From.OriginalOwner.GetSheHe]花费了大量的笔墨，从几段复杂的人际关系出发，罗列了许多值得注意的事件和教训。

original: [Root.GetTitledName] has long feuded with [dedication_target.GetBestName]. In this rare and personal history, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] spends page upon page listing noteworthy events and lessons from their complicated relationship.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]长期与[dedication_target.GetBestName]不和。在这本罕见而私人的历史记录中，[Root.GetTitledFirstName]花费了大量的笔墨，从他们之间复杂的人际关系出发，罗列了许多值得注意的事件和教训。

original: Lessons Taught Me By My Enemy, by [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]
This tome discusses the relationship between [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] and [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] worst enemies...
translation: 这本书探讨了[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]和[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]最糟糕的敌人之间的关系……

original: This tome describes the famed rivalry between [Root.GetTitledFirstName] and [dedication_target.GetTitledFirstName], and there are several lessons on personal combat to be gleamed from its pages. The surprising thing is how many of their duels seem to have taken place in various bedchambers...
translation: 这部著作描述了[Root.GetTitledFirstName]和[dedication_target.GetTitledFirstName]之间著名的爱恨情仇，从字里行间可以翻出一些关于个人战斗的心得教训。他们之间发生在不同的寝宫里的决斗似乎多得令人惊讶……

original: A manuscript describing falcons and hunting with them. Their grace, according to [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName], unparalleled, but for the motions of the sky itself.
translation: 介绍猎鹰以及如何和他们狩猎的手稿。据[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]所说，除了天空本身，它们的优雅运动无与伦比。

original: Ordinary Beasts and How to Avoid Them
translation: 常见野兽与如何避开它们

original: 'Their intellect matches their societal status' begins this collection of curious and somewhat mocking observations on the behavior of animals and [From.OriginalOwner.GetCapitalHolding] guards, and the similarities they share.
translation: 这部著作从「智力与社会地位相符」出发，收集了对动物和[From.OriginalOwner.GetCapitalHolding]卫兵行为的新奇又有点嘲弄意味的观察，以及两者之间的相似之处。

original: An epic retelling of hunting a legendary white beast, and how [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName] claims to have succeeded in it.
translation: 一部关于猎杀传说中的白色野兽的史诗故事，以及[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]是如何成功的。

original: An epic retelling of hunting the legendary white [Root.GetRegionalBigAnimal], and how [Root.GetTitledName] claims to have succeeded in it.
translation: 记述了狩猎传说中的白色[Root.GetRegionalBigAnimal]的过程，以及[Root.GetTitledName]是如何成功的一篇史诗。

original: Written by the great hunter [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName], this is a treatise on the topic of the beasts that roam [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] lands – and how to best them, using your own cunning and bravery.
translation: 由伟大的猎人[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]所著，这是一个主题为游荡在[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]土地上的各种野兽的论著，以及如何凭借自己的狡猾和勇敢来战胜它们。

original: A rare treatise on the art of combat with daggers.
translation: 关于匕首战斗技艺的罕见论述。

original: This book contains all the political dos and don'ts needed to make it in a modern court. Written by [From.OriginalOwner.GetBestName], it has been critiqued for being a bit too centered on [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] culture.
translation: 这本书列举了在现代宫廷所有应做的政治工作和不该做的事情。由[From.OriginalOwner.GetBestName]撰写，它因为过于关注[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]的文化而受到批评。

original: Written by [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName], this book is a must for any up and coming diplomat.
translation: 这本书是由[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]所著，对于所有现在以及将来的外交家们都是必备之物。

original: Written by [Root.GetTitledFirstName], this book is a must for any up and coming diplomat, and a good follow-up to the first volume of the series, by [other_author.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 这本书是由[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]所著，对于所有现在以及将来的外交家们都是必备之物，是[other_author.GetTitledFirstName]对该系列第一卷的良好续作。

original: Written by [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName], this is a continuation and in some ways an in-depth analysis of the other two volumes in the 'Court Etiquette' series.
translation: 由[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]撰写，这是对「宫廷礼仪」系列中其他两卷的延伸探讨和深入分析。

original: An art-form in itself, writing a proper letter can be a challenge, whether it be to your sister or your liege – these pages offer advice.
translation: 本身就是一种艺术形式，写一封正确的信可以是一个挑战，无论是写给你的姐妹还是你的君主——这本书可为你提供建议。

original: A book, supposedly written by [Root.GetBestName]. Critiqued by many as somewhat [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork].
translation: 一本书，据说由[Root.GetBestName]所著。被许多人评论为有些[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]。

original: A sought-after classic, some argue that [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] in fact did not write this [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerselfHimself]. The illustrations are beautiful though.
translation: 一个受欢迎的经典，有人认为实际上这并不是[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName][From.OriginalOwner.GetHerselfHimself]写的。不过插图很漂亮。

original: Essentially a long letter to a dear friend of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]. Critics occasionally debate as to whom this was intended to impress.
translation: 本质上是一封写给[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]的挚友的长信。评论者偶尔会辩论这封信是打算感动谁的。

original: Essentially a long letter to the [dedication_target.GetHusbandWife] of [Root.GetTitledName]. Critics occasionally debate as to whom this was intended to impress.
translation: 本质上是一封写给[Root.GetTitledName]的[dedication_target.GetHusbandWife]的长信。评论者偶尔会辩论这封信是打算感动谁的。

original: Essentially a long letter to the lover of [Root.GetTitledName]. Critics occasionally debate as to whom this was intended to impress.
translation: 本质上是一封写给[Root.GetTitledName]的爱人的长信。评论者偶尔会辩论这封信是打算感动谁的。

original: A lengthy ode to marriage, and the importance of family.
translation: 一首冗长的婚姻颂歌，并叙述了家庭的重要性。

original: A lengthy ode to marriage, and [dedication_target.GetFirstName], the [dedication_target.GetHusbandWife] of [Root.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 一首冗长的有关婚姻和[Root.GetTitledFirstName]的[dedication_target.GetHusbandWife][dedication_target.GetFirstName]的赞歌。

original: A lengthy treatise on the discomforts of marriage, and the importance of finding love wherever you can.
translation: 关于婚姻苦恼的长篇论文，以及无论在何处都要寻找爱的重要性。

original: By [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName], in honor of [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] great love, few can believe the sincere and passionate words which flow from the pages of this tome.
translation: [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]为了纪念[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]真爱所作，这本巨著的字里行间流露出令人难以置信的纯粹与热情。

original: Written as a collection of poems, the tips presented by [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName] are sometimes classy, occasionally crass, but always revealing about the intricacies of [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] living and loving.
translation: 作为一本诗集，[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]展示的写作技巧有时很优美，有时却有些粗俗，但总的来说揭露了[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]在生活和感情方面的错综复杂。

original: In this autobiographical novel, [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName] writes candidly about [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] life as ruler.
translation: 在这部自传体小说中，身为统治者的[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]坦率地写出了[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]一生。

original: In this autobiographical novel, [Root.GetTitledName] writes candidly about [Root.GetHerHis] life as ruler. It also contains sections on [Root.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak].
translation: 在这部自传体小说中，身为统治者的[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]坦率地写出了[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]一生。它还包括了一些片段，主要关于[Root.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]。

original: Also known as the 'Song of [From.OriginalOwner.GetFirstName]', this is a long poem, written in dactylic hexameter, set during a great ancient war.
translation: 这是一首长诗，别名《[From.OriginalOwner.GetFirstName]之歌》，用六音步长短短格的韵体写就，情景设定在一场伟大的古代战争。

original: Drawing upon similar works, this poem is a wild tale of the adventures of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]. Probably not based on true events.
translation: 这首诗是[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]的冒险故事，借鉴了类似的作品。可能并不是基于真实的事件。

original: Drawing upon the work of [other_author.GetTitledFirstName], this poem is a wild tale of the adventures of [Root.GetTitledName]. It is however, as a sequel, a little [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork].
translation: 这首诗是[Root.GetTitledName]的冒险故事，借鉴[other_author.GetTitledFirstName]的作品。但是作为续集，有一点[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]。

original: A number of old [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] gubernatorial contracts, carefully collated and analyzed.
translation: 一些陈旧的[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]统治者的契约，被仔细整理和分析。

original: How to Make Allies and Influence Vassals
An instructional manuscript on how to interact with men and women of [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] aristocracy. Sadly, more entertaining than educational.
translation: 关于如何与[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]人贵族的男女进行互动的指导性手稿。遗憾的是，娱乐意义甚于教育意义。

original: An educational work cleverly disguised as a [From.OriginalOwner.GetFatherMother]'s conversation with [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] [From.OriginalOwner.GetDaughterSon].
translation: 以[From.OriginalOwner.GetFatherMother]与[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis][From.OriginalOwner.GetDaughterSon]的对话的形式写就的颇具教育意义的作品。

original: A helpful primer on etiquette among the [From.OriginalOwner.RelHead.Culture.GetName] people, from proper dress to styles of address.
translation: 一部不错的[From.OriginalOwner.RelHead.Culture.GetName]礼仪启蒙读本，涉及从着装到称呼的各个方面。

original: A helpful primer on etiquette among the [Root.RelHead.Culture.GetName] people, from proper dress to styles of address. [Root.RelHead.GetTitledName] is known to have approved of this work.
translation: 一部不错的[Root.RelHead.Culture.GetName]礼仪启蒙读本，涉及从着装到称呼的各个方面。据信[Root.RelHead.GetTitledName]已经认可了这部著作。

original: A study on the practices of various [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] courts, with emphasis on the proper displays of power, servitude, and allegiance.
translation: 一项关于[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]不同宫廷权术的研究，重点在于权力，奴役和忠诚的正确展现。

original: A study on the practices of various [Root.Government.GetName] courts, with emphasis on the proper displays of power, servitude, and allegiance.
translation: 一项关于[Root.Government.GetName]不同宫廷权术的研究，重点在于权力，奴役和忠诚的正确展现。

original: This weathered book is crammed full of daily notes from the life of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]. It appears every meal was meticulously documented. Some ask why. Others, why not?
translation: 这本褪色的书中写满了来自[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]生活的日常笔记。看起来每顿饭都有精心的记录。有人问为什么要这么做。其他人却说，干嘛不呢？

original: A surprisingly long list of things supposedly ingested by the author, [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]. Public opinion on this work varies.
translation: 作者[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]所吃过东西的惊人之长的列举。公众对他的作品争议巨大。

original: A surprisingly long list of things supposedly ingested by the author, [Root.GetTitledFirstName]. Public opinion on this work ranges from appalled to 'somewhat [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]'.
translation: [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]所吃过东西的惊人之长的列举。有读者认为十分诱人，有的人却觉得这书「有些[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]」。

original: Rumors has it that this tome was originally intended to be about food and cookery. It mostly isn't.
translation: 有传言说，这本书最初的关注点是食品和烹饪。然而内容大多不是。

original: 'There are so many types!' This edition contains illustrations, by [OriginalOwner.GetTrueReligionAdjective] scholars.
translation: 「各种各样的都有！」这个[OriginalOwner.GetTrueReligionAdjective]学者的版本包含许多插图。

original: Few know about [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]'s love for vegetables. What a conversation starter!
translation: 很少有人知道[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]对蔬菜的热爱。多么适合作为闲谈的话题！

original: While interested in a number of things, [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] decided to write about fruit, exotic and everyday ones. It's a bit long, according to critical reception.
translation: 兴趣广博的[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]决定阐述五湖四海的水果。批评家认为这有点长。

original: While interested in a number of things, [Root.GetTitledFirstName] decided to write about fruit, exotic and everyday ones. It's a bit [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork], according to critical reception.
translation: 兴趣广博的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]决定阐述五湖四海的水果。根据评论界的反应，这有点[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]。

original: This beautiful leather-bound tome is a curious rarity for any collector of oddities. Read it for an insight into the disorganized mind of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 这种美丽的皮革制品对于任何恶趣味收藏家来说都是一件珍品。阅读它来透视[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]的混乱内心。

original: While critiqued as a little brief, the content of this book might allow an administrator to keep better track of edible resources, as well as their kitchen staff.
translation: 尽管比较简短，但本书的内容可以让管理者更好地理清食物资源以及厨房员工。

original: Sometimes a [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] has to use whatever resources [From.OriginalOwner.GetSheHe] has available. It cannot always be pickled boar-heads!
translation: 有时候，[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]不得不用[From.OriginalOwner.GetSheHe]能找到的任何材料。不可能总是吃盐渍野猪头！

original: An intriguing tale of a kitchen boy who falls in love with a princess. [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] always claimed it was based on a true story.
translation: 厨房男仆爱上公主的有趣故事。[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]总是声称这是基于一个真实的故事。

original: This discreet, pocket-sized little tome contains a variety of recipes, ranging from delicious drinks to some curious anti-dotes for common poisons.
translation: 这款小巧精致的口袋书里写有各种配方，从美味的饮料到一些常见毒药的解药。

original: Any administrator would be lucky to get their hands on this tome, filled with house-holding tips for a more economic administration and distribution of essential resources.
translation: 任何能够掌握这部著作的管理者都很幸运，这本书写满了经济管理和基本资源分配的持家技巧。

original: There were always rumors surrounding the appetites of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName], as [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] unconventional tome reveals, in grueling detail, and not for the faint of heart.
translation: 总是有关于[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]嗜好的谣言，正如[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]不同寻常的巨著所揭示的，细节繁杂，并且不适合胆小的人阅读。

original: Written by [From.OriginalOwner.GetFirstName] of the [From.OriginalOwner.GetOnlyDynastyName], this is supposedly a collection of dishes and delicacies favored by [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] family.
translation: 由[From.OriginalOwner.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族的[From.OriginalOwner.GetFirstName]撰写，据推测是[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]家族青睐的菜肴和美食的合集。

original: 'All things in moderation', [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] begins [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] treatise on culinary house-holding. The typical inhabitant of [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] court is rumored to have found the text a bit much.
translation: [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]以「凡事都有节制」开始了[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]关于居家烹饪的论述。据说典型的[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]宫廷成员认为这些论述有一点过犹不及。

original: 'All things in moderation', [Root.GetTitledFirstName] begins [Root.GetHerHis] treatise on culinary house-holding. The typical inhabitant of [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName] is rumored to have found the text a bit [Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork].
translation: [Root.GetTitledFirstName]以「凡事都有节制」开始了[Root.GetHerHis]关于居家烹饪的论述。据说典型的[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]的居民认为这些论述有一点[Root.GetPublicOpinionOfWork]。

original: What did the wealthy [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] nobility in [From.OriginalOwner.Capital.GetName] eat during the time of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]? This tome contains all the details.
translation: 在[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]的年代，在首都[From.OriginalOwner.Capital.GetName]，有钱的[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]贵族们享用怎样的饮食？这本书包含了全部的细节。

original: What did the wealthy [Root.Culture.GetName] nobility in [Root.Capital.GetName] eat during the time of [Root.GetTitledFirstName]? This tome contains all the details, neatly organized in sections and subcategories, such as 'The Careful Housekeeper', 'Many Ingredients' and 'The Sea'.
translation: 在[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]的年代，在首都[From.OriginalOwner.Capital.GetName]，有钱的[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]贵族们享用怎样的饮食？这本书包含了全部的细节，整齐地分为不同章节，比如「细心的管家」、「繁多食材」、「大海」。

original: Aptly named 'The Book of Dishes' this culinary tome contains over a hundred recipes, and provides a fascinating insight into [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] gastronomy.
translation: 名为《菜谱大全》这部食谱包含超过一百种配方，并在[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]美食方面提供了精辟独到的见解。

original: While not only containing an impressive collection of typical [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] recipes, this book is a source of dietary advice and instructions, intended to inspire mental wellness and improve the health of its readers.
translation: 本书不仅包含了一系列令人印象深刻的典型[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]食谱，也包含了许多饮食建议和指导，旨在改善其读者的身心健康状况。

original: Intended for the experienced chef, and containing over a hundred recipes, 'The Book of Good Food' is a classic in the [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] household, or for anyone interested in emulating the eating habits of the aristocracy.
translation: 《美食书》专为有经验的厨师准备，包含超过一百种食谱，是面向[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]家庭的经典之作，也适合有兴趣模仿贵族饮食习惯的人。

original: Intended for the experienced chef, and containing over a hundred recipes, 'The Book of Good Food' is a classic in the [Root.Culture.GetName] household, or for anyone interested in emulating the eating habits of [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective] aristocracy.
translation: 《美食书》专为有经验的厨师准备，包含超过一百种食谱，是面向[Root.Culture.GetName]家庭的经典之作，也适合有兴趣模仿[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetAdjective]贵族饮食习惯的人。

original: Describing in details the wonder of local building practices, as well as prescriptions for the planning and design of military camps and structures, both large and small.
translation: 详细描述了当地建筑实践中的奇观，以及大大小小的军营和建筑物的工程图，附有规划和设计。

original: It is not certain whether [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName] wrote this [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerselfHimself], but artisan builders and craftsmen alike agree on the high quality of these instructions.
translation: 还不确定是否真的是[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName][From.OriginalOwner.GetHerselfHimself]写的，但工匠和建筑师们都一致认可这份指南的价值。

original: Rumor has it [From.OriginalOwner.GetFirstName] was not entirely satisfied with this manuscript. While oddly amusing a read, it is clear that the [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] never held a fishing rod in [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] life.
translation: 据说[From.OriginalOwner.GetFirstName]对这本手稿并不满意。尽管读起来十分欢乐，但显然[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle][From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]这辈子没有真正握过钓竿。

original: A Treatise of Fishing with an Angle

Hawking, hunting, and heraldry – some of the most popular recreational activities for any person of noble birth. This treatise covers everything from informative sections on different fishing waters, to angler etiquette.
translation: 训鹰，狩猎或是研究纹章？一些最受欢迎的娱乐活动总是适合贵族们。这篇论文涵盖了从不同水域的鱼类情况，到垂钓礼仪的所有有关钓鱼的内容。

original: It is no secret that the stars affect every living thing around us. In this book [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] presents [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] theories on the best methods of growing healthier plants and better tasting food, with their aid.
translation: 星星对我们周围的任何生命都有影响这件事并非秘密。在这本书中，关于通过星星的帮助，种植更为健康的植物和更好的食物的最佳方法，[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]阐述了[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]理论。

original: On the topic of various habits worn by the servants of [From.OriginalOwner.Religion.GetHighGodName], [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] appears well-informed, as this tome describes in detail similarities, as well as differences, between monastic orders.
translation: [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]似乎十分了解[From.OriginalOwner.Religion.GetHighGodName]的仆人们所穿着的各种修士长袍，因为这本大部头中详细的描述了各种隐修会的相似点与区别。

original: Written by [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName], this unassuming book is a collection of verses occasionally rhyming, while the cadence does not really follow any contemporary standard.
translation: 由[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]所著，这本风格谦逊的书收集了一些偶然押韵的诗节，尽管韵律不符合当下的标准。

original: [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName] paints a glorious picture of [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerselfHimself], in this supposedly autobiographical tale of religious introspection.
translation: 在这个据称是自传式的宗教内省故事中，[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]描绘了[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerselfHimself]的一幕光荣画面。

original: A well-worn book, containing poems and hymns intended for religious ceremony. The imagery is beautiful, the metaphors captivating.
translation: 一本用旧了的书，包含用于宗教仪式的诗歌和赞美诗。意象美妙，比喻迷人。

original: Essentially a transcript of the sections [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName] found the most important in [From.OriginalOwner.Religion.GetScriptureName].
translation: 本质上，这份手稿是[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]对于[From.OriginalOwner.Religion.GetScriptureName]当中其认为最重要部分的摘抄。

original: This tome is a historical chronicle of [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] religious buildings, written through a lens of aesthetic appreciation and artist's humility. It also contains some practical advice on construction methods and processes.
translation: 这是一本关于[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]宗教建筑的编年史，从美学的欣赏和艺术家的品味的角度上写就。它也包含了一些建造方法和工艺上的实用建议。

original: An informative and practical manuscript full of instructions for some of the most common religious ceremonies within the [From.OriginalOwner.Religion.GetName] faith.
translation: 信息丰富且实用的手稿，写满了[From.OriginalOwner.Religion.GetName]信仰中最常见的宗教仪式知识。

original: A compendium of myths. In honor of the ancestors, as well as the sky gods, [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] dedicated a lot of [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] soul to this collection of myths.
translation: 一本传说合集。为了纪念祖先和天神们，[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]在这本传说合集上花费了[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]大量心血。

original: A beginner's manuscript in learning the language spoken by the [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName], containing exercises for all ages.
translation: 初学者学习[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]语的手稿，包含适合全年龄的练习。

original: Based on the previous book in the series, this manuscript is a solid continuation for anyone invested in learning the [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] language.
translation: 这份手稿基于本系列的前作，是一本给所有投入精力学习[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]语的人的实用续篇。

original: Focused less on exercises than the previous manuscripts in the series, the [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] language get a close examination, in this treatise by [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]. The section on dialects is particularly well composed.
translation: 比起之前更注重练习的系列前作，[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]的这部论著，对[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]语的研究更为深入。方言部分写得尤其精彩。

original: Everything you had ever wondered about the [From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName] spoken language, neatly composed into sections on history, myths, advanced exercises as well as personal anecdotes from the life of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName].
translation: 你想要了解的[From.OriginalOwner.Culture.GetName]口语的全部内容，包括历史，神话，高阶练习以及[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]生活中的个人轶事，都被整齐地分章节阐述。

original: While it said that the [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] found great comfort in the nonsensical tales of this book, the local religious authorities are known to frown upon the work.
translation: 尽管据说[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]在这本书的荒诞故事中找到了极大的慰藉，但是当地的宗教首领对这个作品是出了名的不满意。

original: Inspired by the ancient Romans, [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] delves into the more philosophical aspects of society, and in particular regarding [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] own role in it, as a modern [From.OriginalOwner.GetManWoman] and [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle].
translation: 受古罗马启发，[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]深入研究了社会的哲学方面，特别是自己作为一个现代[From.OriginalOwner.GetManWoman]与[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]在其中扮演的角色。

original: While Pliny the Elder described his 'Naturalis Historia' as a work of the natural world and life, in this book [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName] instead discusses at length 'the veil beyond' and the death of all things living...
translation: 老普林尼把他的《自然史》描述为自然世界和生活的著作，但是与之相反，在这本书里[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledName]花了大量篇幅讨论「上界之幕」和所有生灵的死亡。

original: This supposedly autobiographical work tells a moving tale of a young [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] struggling with temptation. It also offers some advice on how to avoid and deal with such issues, before it's too late.
translation: 这被认为是年轻的[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]的自传，是一个与诱惑抗争的感人故事。它也提供了一些建议，教你如何趁还不算太迟的时候去避免和处理这些问题。

original: 'The Book of Healing' strives to inspire and enlighten the mind. As a result you will find a wide range of topics covered in this encyclopedia, ranging from the natural sciences, to theological discussions on the topic of [From.OriginalOwner.Religion.GetHighGodName]'s existence.
translation: 《治疗论》致力于启迪心智。这本百科全书里涵盖了广泛的内容，从自然科学，到关于[From.OriginalOwner.Religion.GetHighGodName]存在的神学讨论。

original: While on the grisly side, the descriptions are, according to contemporary scholars, fairly accurate.
translation: 虽然有可怕的一面，但是根据当代学者的说法，描述相当准确。

original: Whether your affliction be external or internal, this medical text has at least one chapter of interest to you.
translation: 无论你的痛苦是外在的还是内在的，这篇医学文章至少有一章你会感兴趣。

original: Once composed by [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName], this personal notebook is filled with poems, all tackling the isolation and solitude of [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] tormented existence. One can only assume that the [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] found the words comforting.
translation: 这本由[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]所作的个人记录中有大量的诗词，都是在探讨[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]苦难人生中的避世与孤独。我们只能认为这些诗是[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]的慰藉。

original: A manuscript full of wisdom and idioms, from 'Hold your horses!', tracing back to Roman antiquity, to the more recent and commonly used 'You can lead a horse to water, but you can't make it Pope'.
translation: 一份充满了妙语与典故的手稿，从古时罗马的「勒住你的马！」（悠着点），到最近才出现的惯用语「你可以牵着一匹马让它喝水，但你不能让他成教宗（谐音拉屎）」

original: Dressing the tallest members of your aristocracy can be a challenge. This instruction manual for tailors and seamstresses will make your life easier.
translation: 让你宫廷里个子最高的人穿着得体可是一件很难的事情，这本裁缝指导手册让您对此得心应手。

original: While perhaps well-intended, this work reads as a stale lecture on what a member of the [From.OriginalOwner.GetOnlyDynastyName] family should and should not do.
translation: 或许是出于好意，这部作品讲述了[From.OriginalOwner.GetOnlyDynastyName]的家庭成员应该做和不应该做的事情，通篇都是那一套陈词滥调。

original: This collection of names lists all the noteworthy members of [From.OriginalOwner.GetOnlyDynastyName], as well as their spouses. Note that illegitimate children are mysteriously missing from the records.
translation: 这本名册里面列出了所有[From.OriginalOwner.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族值得一提的人物和他们的配偶。注意私生子并不包含在记录中。

original: A [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] must do all in [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] power to highlight the glories of [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] house. This tome sets a decent standard.
translation: 一个[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]必须尽其所能来为[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]家族争取荣耀。这本书立下了不错的标准。

original: A [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] must do all in [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] power to highlight the glories of [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] house. This tome sets a great standard.
translation: 一个[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]必须尽其所能来为[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]家族争取荣耀。这本书立下了伟大的标准。

original: A [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] must do all in [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] power to highlight the glories of [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] house. This tome sets a spectacular standard.
translation: 一个[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]必须尽其所能来为[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]家族争取荣耀。这本书立下了超凡的标准。

original: Any contemporary family of [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] are honored to find their name included in this extravagant chronicle of their house – even if it is only the [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle] [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerselfHimself] who features in the illustrations.
translation: 任何[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]的家人们都为自己的名字出现在这本奢华的家族编年史中而感到荣幸——即使只有[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle][From.OriginalOwner.GetHerselfHimself]在其中有详细的描写。

original: As [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName] never mentions the name of the adventurous spirit portrayed as [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] relative, scholars are unsure as to the origins of this gripping tale.
translation: 由于[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitledFirstName]从来没有提到过[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]拥有冒险精神的亲戚的名字，学者们不确定这个扣人心弦的故事的起源。

original: The family history of [From.OriginalOwner.GetBestName] is framed in almost mythological light, and begins with the story of the [From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]'s own mother being kidnapped by [From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis] father... Truthfulness aside, it is seen as a fascinating manuscript.
translation: [From.OriginalOwner.GetBestName]的家族史近乎神话传说，它起始于[From.OriginalOwner.GetTitle]的母亲被[From.OriginalOwner.GetHerHis]父亲所诱拐……坦白地讲，算得上一本引人入胜的手稿。

original: Provided §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! possesses some knowledge of the world, you can choose to compose a work of literature.
translation: 如果§Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!有一些关于这个世界的想法，那么可以选择写一本书。

original: Choose a topic worthy of discussing.
translation: 选择一个值得探讨的主题。

original: Has NOT explored all topics available to you
translation: 还没有探索所有可用的主题

original: Has NOT already put all available scribes to work
Has an Education trait, OR a related attribute above §Y10§!
translation: 拥有一个教育特质，或者对应能力大于 §Y10§!

original: 'Halt!', comes a stern voice as we are approaching a bridge.\n'I am [other_ruler.GetTitledName]. We are currently guarding the road to the [offmap_china.GetFullName]... You, my fine [Root.GetLordLady], need to pay the bridge fee.' The smirk on the [other_ruler.GetManWoman]'s face makes me hesitate.
translation: 「站住！」，我们快走到桥上时一个尖锐的声音说。\n「我是[other_ruler.GetTitledName]。我们正在守卫这条通往[offmap_china.GetFullName]的路……您，尊贵的[Root.GetLordLady]，需要付一点过桥费。」那个[other_ruler.GetManWoman]脸上的诡笑让我犹豫了。

original: You and your entourage are let through.\n
translation: 你和你的随行人员都可以通过。\n

original: We will have none of that.
You hurl a spear at the [other_ruler.GetTitle] before [other_ruler.GetSheHe] has time to finish smirking.\n
translation: 在[other_ruler.GetTitle]还没来得及完成傻笑前，你向[other_ruler.GetSheHe]投掷了长矛。

original: I won't give in to idle threats. Guards, my sword – now!
translation: 我不会屈服于无来由的威胁。卫兵，把我的剑给我，现在！

original: you making it out alive and carry on with your journey.\n
translation: 你活了下来，继续走上了你的旅程。\n

original: you getting away, but becoming injured!\n
translation: 你躲开了，但还是受伤了！\n

original: being slain in personal combat with §Y[From.GetTitledFirstName]§!!\n

'Aaah, fellow travelers!' a military [other_ruler.GetManWoman] exclaims, emerging alongside a group of soldiers from the trees surrounding our camp. 'I am [other_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]. We are here to escort my [Root.GetLordLady] to [Root.GetRandomChineseRegion].' [other_ruler.GetSheHeCap] gestures for [Root.GetHerHis] troops to join my entourage for the evening.
translation: 「啊，同行的旅行者们！」一个[other_ruler.GetManWoman]军人大声喊道。一大群士兵从树后出现，包围了我们的营地。「我是[other_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]。我们来护送[Root.GetLordLady]到[Root.GetRandomChineseRegion]。」[other_ruler.GetSheHeCap]示意让[Root.GetHerHis]部队加入我，一起过夜。

original: Oh, [other_ruler.GetTitledFirstName]! There's... been a change of plans.
While you obviously did not hire these mercenaries, you caravan might benefit from some more military protection.\n
translation: 虽然你没有雇佣这些雇佣军，但你的车队会得到更强大的军事力量的保护。\n

original: I think you have me confused with someone...
translation: 我想你把我和别人弄混了……

original: You explain the situation. The mercenaries are disappointed, but soon leave you and your people alone.
translation: 你解释一下情况。雇佣军很失望，但很快就不打扰你和你的人了。

original: This character has two burly soldiers following them around.
translation: 这个角色身边有两个身材魁梧的士兵。

original: A group of soldiers have blocked the route for our caravan. 'Please, we have not eaten in months', a tall [other_ruler.GetManWoman] pleads, before taking another step forwards: 'I am [other_ruler.GetTitledName]. You will let us dine with your people tonight...!' The threat sounds empty, as the leader struggles to remain upright.
translation: 一群士兵挡住了我们商队的路。「求你们了，我们好几个月都吃不上饭了。」一个高个[other_ruler.GetManWoman]恳求道，随后向前走了一步：「我是[other_ruler.GetTitledName]。你必须让我们今晚和你们一起吃饭……！」这种威胁听起来太空洞了，尽管他们的头目尽力维持着自己的仪容。

original: No need for posturing, [other_ruler.GetTitle]. We have enough food for everyone.
translation: 没有必要虚张声势，[other_ruler.GetTitle]。我们有足够的食物分给大家。
§Y[other_ruler.GetTitledName]§!和[other_ruler.GetHerHis]士兵们十分欣赏您的慷慨。\n\n

original: The [offmap_china.GetFullName] clearly does nothing for you... You should work for me!
translation: [offmap_china.GetFullName]对你根本不上心……你应该为我工作！

original: §Y[other_ruler.GetTitle]§! abandons [other_ruler.GetHerHis] mercenary way of life and joins your court instead.\n\n
translation: §Y[other_ruler.GetTitle]§!放弃了[other_ruler.GetHerHis]雇佣兵生活，转而加入到你的宫廷之中。\n\n

original: We cannot afford to take pity on strangers...!
translation: 我们承受不起同情陌生人的代价……！

original: The mercenaries get out of your way.\n

As the days drag on, I find myself thinking back to [Root.Capital.Capital.GetName], wondering what is happening in the [Root.GetCapitalHolding]. And how is [person_missed.GetTitledFirstName] faring, without me there? When can I return home to [person_missed.GetHerHim], when my journey to the Middle Kingdom never seems to end?
translation: 日子一天天过去，我发现我自己不禁想起了[Root.Capital.Capital.GetName]。[Root.GetCapitalHolding]现在怎么样了？[person_missed.GetTitledFirstName]没有我来陪伴，现在过得怎样？我什么时候才能回家见到[person_missed.GetHerHim]？这趟去中国的旅程什么时候是个头？

original: Halt! I need to send a letter to my dear [person_missed.GetFirstName].
translation: 停！我需要送一封信给我亲爱的[person_missed.GetFirstName]。

original: Halt! I need to compose some thoughts to my friend...
translation: 停！我需要给我的朋友写一些想法……

original: Guards! I need to send a letter to my [person_missed.GetHusbandWife].
translation: 卫兵！我需要送一封信给我的[person_missed.GetHusbandWife]。

original: Guards! I need to send a letter to my [person_missed.GetFatherMother].
translation: 卫兵！我需要送一封信给我的[person_missed.GetFatherMother]。

original: Halt! My [person_missed.GetSonDaughter] needs a letter from me.
No, my retinue needs their [Root.GetTitle] riding, alongside them.
translation: 不，我的随从们需要他们的[Root.GetTitle]与他们齐头并进。

original: You make a stop for the evening. Your [person_missed.GetRootRelation] will receive a letter with your thoughts and well-wishes.\n
translation: 你忙了一晚上终于结束了。你的[person_missed.GetRootRelation]将会收到一封表达你的思念与祝愿的信。

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me a letter. Apparently, the journey to the Middle Kingdom is long and [From.GetSheHe] misses me terribly. 'You always have interesting things to say, like when we spoke about [From.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak], remember?'
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]给我寄了封信。很明显，去中国的旅程太长了，[From.GetSheHe]十分想念我。「你总是有很多有趣的故事，就像我们上次讨论时一样，你还记得吗？关于[From.GetRootMatchingPersonalityStreak]」

original: [From.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me a letter. 'The journey to the Middle Kingdom is long', and [From.GetSheHe] has found [From.GetHerselfHimself] missing me terribly. 'I hope we can spend more time together, in the future' [From.GetSheHe] states.
translation: [From.GetTitledFirstName]给我寄了封信。很明显，去中国的旅程太长了，[From.GetSheHe]十分想念我。「我希望我们以后相处的时间能多一点。」[From.GetSheHe]说。

original: Having reached the glorious capital of the [offmap_china.GetFullName], it only takes a few days before a group of ministers approach me, offering to read and discuss chapters from the 'Writings of Master Guan'. They think I, as a [Root.Religion.GetName], will be particularly interested by the section on 'revolving the vital breath'.
translation: 到达[offmap_china.GetFullName]辉煌的首都后，过了几天，一群大臣前来拜访我并主动提出和我阅读与讨论《管子》中的章节。他们认为，我作为一名[Root.Religion.GetName]信徒，将会对「抟气」的部分特别感兴趣。

original: Of course! I would love to hear more about your political philosophy.
translation: 当然！我想更多地了解你的政治理念。

original: The ministers are excited by your enthusiasm!\n
translation: 大臣们被你的热情所鼓舞！\n

original: Actually, I'm already well familiar with 'the Guanzi', my lords.
translation: 实际上，我已经很熟悉《管子》了，我的大人。

original: The ministers are impressed by your knowledge.\n
translation: 你的知识使大臣们敬仰。\n

original: Nonsense! I want to look around the palace – perhaps a tour?
translation: 废话！我想看看宫殿四周——要不出去走走？

original: The ministers see to that you are accompanied through the public areas of the capital.\n
translation: 大臣们注意到你们在首都公共场合相伴经过。\n

original: Only one can claim to be the Lord of Ten Thousand Years.
translation: 能称万岁的只能有一个人。

original: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]. [Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing].\n\nThe heavenly [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName], is most sorry to hear about the death of [FromFrom.GetTitledName], your [FromFrom.GetChineseCharacterRole], and offers you [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] most sincere condolences.
translation: [Root.GetGovernorLetterGreeting]。[Root.GetChineseLetterBlessing]。\n\n天命[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetLongChineseEmperorName]，对[FromFrom.GetTitledName]，你的[FromFrom.GetChineseCharacterRole]的去世表示深深的悲痛，对你致以[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis]最深切的慰问。

original: My guards and I have been making our way through a bustling market this morning. There is ample supply of every meat and game, and trinkets and baubles abound...! Here and there we encounter soldiers, along with dignitaries from other foreign courts. There is clearly no shortage of business for these traders.
translation: 今早，我和卫兵一直穿行于熙熙攘攘的市场。在这儿，每种肉类和游戏都有充足的供应，饰品和小装饰品到处都是……！我们哪里都能遇到士兵，以及其他外国宫廷的权贵。显然这些商人不缺生意。

original: You eagerly partake in the local cuisine.\n
translation: 你急切地品尝了当地的美食。\n

original: I am here to trade! You there, let's talk business.
translation: 我是来做生意的！那边那个，我们来谈谈生意吧。

original: You offer you patronage to the local traders, allowing you to bring home a §YChinese artifact§!...!\n
translation: 你向当地的商人提供了赞助，你可以把一件§Y中国宝物§!带回家了……！\n

original: Guards... You keep that trader occupied...
You proceed to steal from one of the local traders, allowing you to bring home a §YChinese artifact§!...!\n
translation: 你继续从一个本地商人那里偷东西，这让你带回来了一件§Y中国宝物§!……！\n

original: I think I've had enough for one day.

Our caravan has been approached by a smooth-faced [chinese_trader.Culture.GetName] [chinese_trader.GetManWoman], claiming to be a renowned trader. After finally getting my attention [chinese_trader.GetSheHe] beckons me over to [chinese_trader.GetHerHis] own horse, where something is strapped to its saddle. 'Name's [chinese_trader.GetBestName], my good [Root.GetLordLady]! Might my latest acquisition interest you?'
translation: 我们的商队路经一位表现得很友好的[chinese_trader.Culture.GetName][chinese_trader.GetManWoman]，其声称自己是一位有名的商人。[chinese_trader.GetSheHe]最终吸引了我的注意，示意我到[chinese_trader.GetHerHis]马匹前，那马鞍上绑着一些东西。「我的名字是[chinese_trader.GetBestName]，我的好[Root.GetLordLady]！或许我最新的商品能让您有些兴趣？」

original: Ooh, that looks [chinese_artifact.GetArtifactDescriptor]. Let me take it off your hands!
translation: 哦，这看起来很[chinese_artifact.GetArtifactDescriptor]。拿来让我看看！

original: You're certainly a charmer... I could use someone like you.
translation: 你真是个富有魅力的人……你这种人一定有利用价值。

original: The [chinese_trader.GetManWoman] eyes you up and down, before shrugging in agreement.\n§Y[chinese_trader.GetTitledName]§! joins your court.\n
translation: 这位[chinese_trader.GetManWoman]上下打量了你一番，然后耸了耸肩膀同意了。\n§Y[chinese_trader.GetTitledName]§!加入了你的宫廷。\n

original: Guards. I'm suddenly in the mood for a gift...
translation: 卫兵。我突然想要一份礼物……

original: You order your guards to cut down the trader and steal the goods for you.\n
translation: 你命令你的卫兵去砍了商人并为你偷货物。\n
商人，阿谀奉承令你显的毫无价值。

original: You have better things to do.\n
translation: 还有更重要的事情等着你去做。\n

original: The old man starts telling you that Ka'b ibn Malik reported that the Messenger of Allah, may Allah bless him and grant him peace, said 'Two hungry wolves loose among sheep do not cause as much damage as that caused to a man's deen by his greed for money and reputation.
translation: 老人开始告诉你，卡尔布·伊本·马利克报告说，安拉的使者（愿安拉保佑并赐福之）说，「放任两只饥饿的狼在羊群间所造成的伤害都不及一个人对金钱和名声的欲望对他的信仰所造成的伤害大。」

original: This character is not really in the mood for creative pursuits.
translation: 这个角色现在并没有进行创作性追求的心情。

original: Is NOT currently awaiting your spouse from the [offmap_china.GetFullName]\n
translation: 目前不在等待你从[offmap_china.GetFullName]来的配偶

original: You will found a new Empire in the West, inspired by the splendor of the [offmap_china.GetFullName].\n
translation: 受到[offmap_china.GetFullName]的辉煌文化的鼓舞，你将在西方建立一个新的帝国。\n

original: Chinese Imperialism, much like the ordinary Feudal government, revolves around vassals owing fealty to their liege. It is inspired by the efficient administration of the mainland [offmap_china.GetFullName], and promotes peaceful dialog over religious differences.
translation: 中华帝国制与普通封建制甚为相同，皆是围绕着领主和封臣之间的誓言。该政体受到了[offmap_china.GetFullName]本土高效的行政机关的启发，并促进了不同宗教间的和平对话。

original: We will have a feast in [From.GetHerHis] honor! But what will my subjects think?
translation: 我们将参加[From.GetHerHis]盛宴！但是我的臣民们会怎么想呢？

original: Children can be assigned a guardian for a proper upbringing. The choice is important, because the mentor will tend to pass on their skills, traits, religion, culture and type of education to the child.
translation: 孩子可以被分配到适当的教养监护人。这选择是非常重要的，因为导师会倾向于把他们自己的技能、特质、宗教、文化和教育类型传递给孩子。

original: A guardian can be entrusted with your child. A guardian's religion and culture as well as some traits can affect your child's upbringing.
translation: 可对你的孩子委托一个监护人。监护人的宗教和文化以及一些特质会影响孩子日后的成长。

original: Has both the same Culture and Religion as the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]
translation: 与[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmperorEmpress]有着同样的文化和宗教信仰

original:
To the clever [Root.GetTitledFirstName],
I have considered your offer together with my closest advisors, and I am afraid to say I am not entirely pleased with the terms. [selling_province.GetName] is a fine county, but not worth the price you demand. May I suggest a more reasonable sum of [From.province_offer.GetValue] gold pieces?

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
致睿智的[Root.GetTitledFirstName]，
我已经同我最亲近的顾问考虑过了你的提议，我抱歉的告诉你我对这些条款不是很满意。[selling_province.GetName]是一个上佳的伯爵领，但还不值你开的价格。我可以提议一个更好的价格，[From.province_offer.GetValue]金钱可以吗？

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: ponder the wisdom of Master Lao-Tse
This will likely affect their mental health...\n
translation: 这可能会影响他们的精神健康……\n

original: The study of [Root.Religion.GetScriptureName] will be my priority from now on.
translation: 对[Root.Religion.GetScriptureName]的学习将会成为我的重点事项。

original: Also known as the 'Song of [Root.GetFirstName]', this is a long poem, written in dactylic hexameter, set during a great ancient war in [Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName].
translation: 这是一首长诗，别名《[Root.GetFirstName]之歌》，用六音步长短短格的韵体写就，情景设定在[Root.PrimaryTitle.GetName]的一场古代战争。

original: This will §Gincrease§! the chance of receiving a better artifact from the envoy, as the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] §Glikes [This.GetLike]§!
translation: 这会§G增加§!从使节那里收到更好的工艺品的几率，因为[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]§G喜欢[This.GetLike]§!

original: This will §Rdecrease§! the chance of receiving a better artifact from the envoy, as the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] §Rdislikes [This.GetDislike]§!
translation: 这会§R减少§!从使节那里收到更好的工艺品的几率，因为[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]§R讨厌[This.GetDislike]§!

original: [Root.GetMourningBehavior]. Yet life goes on, and a letter from [the_protector_general.GetTitledFirstName] was received today. It expresses the condolences of the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap], assuring that the [offmap_china.GetFullName] mourns with us.
translation: [Root.GetMourningBehavior]。生活总是要继续。今天我收到了[the_protector_general.GetTitledFirstName]的一封信。信里表达了[offmap_china.Ruler.GetEmpressEmperorCap]的慰问，表示[offmap_china.GetFullName]与我们共同哀悼。

original: 'The world is worse off without your [FromFrom.GetRootRelation] in it'.
translation: 「如果没有你的[FromFrom.GetRootRelation]，这个世界会变得更糟」。

original: You read the words carefully, taking them to heart, and order that a letter of thanks be sent back.\n
translation: 你一字一句的读着，想把这些话印在心里，并且叮嘱一定要回寄一封感谢信。\n

original: I cannot bear to read it...!
translation: 我根本读不进去这种玩意……！

original: I think I am done dwelling on the past.
translation: 我想我已经沉溺于过去了。

original: You decide to still take comfort in the gesture.\n
translation: 你决定保持这个姿势，聊以自慰。

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is no longer with me, and I still feel it, in my bones
translation: 虽然[FromFrom.GetTitledName]不再陪伴我了，可我仍然能够在我的骨髓中感受到他的存在

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is not around anymore, and I still don't understand why [FromFrom.GetSheHe] had to leave
translation: [FromFrom.GetRootRelation]不在我们身边了，我还是不明白[FromFrom.GetSheHe]为什么要离开

original: Even if I have done my best to accept that [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is gone, it still pains me
translation: 即使我尽了最大的努力去接受[FromFrom.GetTitledName]的离去，但这仍然使我痛苦

original: I hate to admit how accustomed I was to having my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation] [FromFrom.GetTitledName] around
translation: 我不愿承认自己习惯与[FromFrom.GetRootRelation][FromFrom.GetTitledName]在一起

original: Sometimes, when I think about my late [FromFrom.GetRootRelation], my blood begins to boil over the meaninglessness of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] passing
translation: 有时，当我想起已故的[FromFrom.GetRootRelation]，我的血液便开始为[FromFrom.GetHerHis]毫无意义的离去涌动

original: Even if death touches everyone's life, I can't stop dreaming about seeing my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation] again
translation: 虽然人终有一死，但我总是不时梦见我的[FromFrom.GetRootRelation]

original: Sometimes, I still see [FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName] – in the corner of my eye, or far off in a crowd. I'd know [FromFrom.GetHerHis] silhouette anywhere
translation: 有时候，我仍然能在眼角余光里或在人海深处看见[FromFrom.GetTitledFirstName]。我到处都能见到[FromFrom.GetHerHis]轮廓

original: [FromFrom.GetTitledName] is no longer with me, and I am only slowly coming to grips with the reality of it
translation: [FromFrom.GetTitledName]不再与我同在，我只能逐渐面对现实

original: A servant informs me that we have a visitor. Cursing the early hour, I roll out of bed and make my way to the main hall. The envoy bows deeply, stating that the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective] [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle] wishes to express [offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis] condolences, by gifting me something that used to belong to my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation], [FromFrom.GetTitledName].
translation: 仆人告知我有客人来访。我咒骂着对方这么早来打扰，从床里钻了出来，走向大堂。使者深深地鞠躬，然后陈述起[offmap_china.Ruler.GetChineseComplimentAdjective][offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]希望送给我一些曾经属于我[FromFrom.GetRootRelation]，[FromFrom.GetTitledName]的东西，来表达[offmap_china.Ruler.GetHerHis]哀悼。

original: I humbly accept the gift from the [offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle].
translation: 我恭敬地接过了[offmap_china.Ruler.GetTitle]的赏赐。

original: §Y[chinese_artifact.GetName]§! is added to your Treasury.\nIt will always remind you of your [FromFrom.GetRootRelation].\n
translation: §Y[chinese_artifact.GetName]§!放入了您的宝库。\n它总是会让你想起你的[FromFrom.GetRootRelation]。\n

original: Please, take it away – it would only serve as a reminder of [FromFrom.GetHerHis] death.
translation: 请把它拿开——这只会令人想起[FromFrom.GetHerHis]死。

original: You decide to focus on other things in life instead.\n
translation: 你决定将注意力转移到生活中的其他事物。\n

original: My servants have finished cleaning out my [FromFrom.GetRootRelation]'s chambers and I have come to take a final look. [Root.GetMourningBehavior]. 'My [Root.GetLordLady], we found this', one of the servants says, interrupting my thoughts and handing me a small book.
translation: 我的仆人们已经收拾干净了我[From From theGetRootRelation]的房间，于是我来做做检查。[Root.GetMourningBehavior]。「我们发现了这个，我的主人」，一个仆人说话间打断了我的思绪并递给了我一本小册子。

original: Wait – this must have belonged to [FromFrom.GetHerHim]...!
translation: 等下——这一定是属于[FromFrom.GetHerHim]的东西……！

original: Do you take me for a sentimental fool?
You tell the servants to get rid of the item.\n
translation: 你叫佣人把这个东西弄走。\n

original: A favored item from [Root.GetTitledName]'s childhood, sent to [Root.GetHerHis] family in [Root.Liege.Capital.Capital.GetName], upon [Root.GetHerHis] death.
translation: 在[Root.GetHerHis]去世后，[Root.GetTitledName]童年时最喜欢的一个物品，送到了位于[Root.Liege.Capital.Capital.GetName]的[Root.GetHerHis]家族。

original: This looks like a personal notebook.
translation: 这本书看起来像某个人的笔记本

original: The collected writings of [Root.GetTitledName], documenting everything from travels in the [offmap_china.GetFullName], to finding one's place in the [Root.Liege.GetCapitalHolding] of [Root.Liege.Capital.Capital.GetName], and [Root.Liege.Culture.GetName] court. And the family [Root.GetSheHe] built there.
translation: [Root.GetTitledName]文集，详细记录了从自己的[offmap_china.GetFullName]之旅，到在[Root.Liege.Capital.Capital.GetName]的[Root.Liege.GetCapitalHolding]以及[Root.Liege.Culture.GetName]宫廷寻找容身之处，还有[Root.GetSheHe]家族的诞生地等内容。

original: You do not risk embarrassing yourself and let the translator do their job. §Y[chinese_guest.GetTitledName]§! returns home.\n
translation: 你不打算冒丢人的风险，而是让一个翻译官来做这件事。§Y[chinese_guest.GetTitledName]§! 回了家。\n

original: You have impressed your guest, and [chinese_guest.GetTitledName] returns home, most pleased. §Y[FromFrom.Liege.GetTitle] [FromFrom.Liege.GetDynName]§! will hear about your hospitality.\n
translation: 你的待客之道给宾客留下了很深的印象，[chinese_guest.GetTitledName]满意地回去了。§Y[FromFrom.Liege.GetTitle][FromFrom.Liege.GetDynName]§!将会传颂你的热情好客。\n

original: §Y[chinese_guest.GetTitledName]§! returns home offended. §Y[FromFrom.Liege.GetTitle] [FromFrom.Liege.GetDynName]§! will hear about your appalling manners.\n
translation: §Y[chinese_guest.GetTitledName]§!气愤地回家了。§Y[FromFrom.Liege.GetTitle][FromFrom.Liege.GetDynName]§!会听说你的令人发指的行径。\n

original: §Y[FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName]§! appreciates your efforts, and soon returns home to §Y[FromFrom.Liege.GetTitle] [FromFrom.Liege.GetDynName]§! with a positive report.\n
translation: §Y[FromFrom.GetJobTitle][FromFrom.GetDynName]§!赞扬了你的努力，并且在你回到§Y[FromFrom.Liege.GetTitle][FromFrom.Liege.GetDynName]§!的家时呈上正面的报告。\n

original: You made a fool of yourself in front of your guest, and §Y[FromFrom.GetJobTitle] [FromFrom.GetDynName]§! returns home, offended.\n
translation: 你在宾客面前显得愚不可及，§Y[FromFrom.GetDynName][FromFrom.GetJobTitle]§!带着被冒犯的怒火回了家。\n

original: §Y[From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]§! returns home offended. [From.GetHerHisCap] [From.Liege.GetMasterMistress], §Y[From.Liege.GetTitle] [From.Liege.GetDynName]§!, will surely hear of this.\n
translation: §Y[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetDynName]§!气愤地回家了。[From.GetHerHisCap][From.Liege.GetMasterMistress]，§Y[From.Liege.GetTitle][From.Liege.GetDynName]§!，肯定会得知此事。\n

original: §Y[From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetDynName]§! returns home, having interpreted your polite comment about the weather as an elegant compliment to the §Y[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!. Words of your wisdom and eloquence are sure to reach [From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis] ears!
translation: §Y[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetDynName]§!归乡后，将你在交谈中关于天气的客套话解读为对§Y[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetMediumChineseEmperorName]§!的一种优雅的恭维。你的智慧和雄辩直言一定能够传到[From.Offmap.Ruler.GetHerHis]耳朵里！

original: Has a trade route in common with $PROV|Y$
No dynasty found - one will be generated upon the start of the game
translation: 未发现家族，游戏开始时将随机生成家族。

original: $WHAT|Y$ is destroyed and removed from $WHO|Y$'s Treasury.\n
$CHILD|Y$ is the right age to potentially be a child of $PARENT|Y$
translation: $CHILD|Y$是在可以成为$PARENT|Y$的孩子的合适年龄

original: You cannot dismiss someone who recently used a favor to get appointed
translation: 你不能解雇近期用人情交换职位的人。

original: Having refused to give up my title to [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
translation: 我拒绝听从[From.GetTitledFirstName]的命令并交出我的头衔，所以被迫举起了叛乱的大旗。

original: Having refused to give up my rightful vassal to [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
translation: 我拒绝放弃我的合法封臣[From.GetTitledFirstName]，所以被迫举起了叛乱的大旗。

original: Having refused to have my clan absorbed by [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
translation: 我拒绝让我的部族被[From.GetTitledFirstName]所吞并，所以被迫举起了叛乱的大旗。

original: Having refused to have my clan split by [From.GetTitledFirstName], I am now forced to raise the banner of rebellion.
translation: 我拒绝听从[From.GetTitledFirstName]的命令将我的部族拆散，所以被迫举起了叛乱的大旗。

original: The room starts spinning and you black out.
translation: 房间开始旋转，你失去了意识。

original: My council informs that the Treasure fleet of the Middle Kingdom has been spotted outside of the Bengal Bay carrying a significant land force, to support their outlying regions in the West. Leaning over the war table, I can only hope that my silence instills confidence in my advisors. In my own chest, I feel a mild panic rising.
translation: 据我的顾问透露，来自中国的宝船舰队携带了大量陆军，用以支援他们的西方边境，现已经穿过了旁伽罗湾海域。我倚靠在战争桌上一言不发，只希望我的沉默能给我的顾问带来一点信心。但在我心中，我依然感到了一丝恐慌。

original: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! has a high chance to gain §YBrooding§!\n§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! has a low chance to gain §YTimid§!
translation: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!有很高的几率获得§Y沉思§!\n§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!有很低的几率获得§Y怯懦§!

original: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§! has a high chance to gain §YTimid§!\n§Y[From.GetFirstName]§! has a low chance to gain §YBrooding§!
translation: §Y[From.GetFirstName]§!有很高的几率获得§Y怯懦§!\n§Y[From.GetFirstName]§!有很低的几率获得§Y沉思§!

original: Send more supporting troops to increase the size of [From.GetFirstName]'s band.
translation: 派出更多的支援部队来扩编[From.GetFirstName]的队伍。

original: Decreases the payment factor for $TITLE$ by $VALUE1|Y%$ to §Y$VALUE2$%§!.

translation: 已经去世的角色不能结婚。
处于囚禁状态时不能结婚。
处于藏匿状态时不能结婚。
没有土地的统治者不能结婚。
§R准备就绪时无法使用角色设计器§!

original: This option is available due to your high §YPrestige§!\n
translation: 这个选项可用是因为你拥有足够高的§Y威望§!\n

original: The outcome of the search will depend on the §YSkills§! and §YTraits§! of your §Y[From.GetJobTitle] [From.GetFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 搜索的结果取决于你§Y[From.GetJobTitle][From.GetFirstName]§!的§Y技能§!和§Y特质§!。\n

original: The outcome of the search will depend on the §YSkills§! and §YTraits§! of your §Y[Root.GetJobTitle] [Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!.\n
translation: 搜索的结果取决于你§Y[Root.GetJobTitle][Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!的§Y技能§!和§Y特质§!。\n
